story:
A charging cable that bonds onto itself when coiled. Simply Coil, Squeeze and the cable Bonds neatly into a bunch.    

 

Coil. Squeeze. Bond!

 

Armadillo-style (using one hand)

 

PULL to uncoil!

 

Or do you prefer to THROW to uncoil?

 

Need a shorter cable? No problem!

 

 

Tired of messy and tangled cables?

 

 

 

 

No additional fastener or fancy magnets needed to keep your cables tidy and tangle-free! You can easily manage BondCable neatly on your desk, in your drawer, bag or pocket. No more messy cables lying around!

Even more tired of replacing damaged cables?   

Charging cables get damaged and replaced more often than they should. They undergo excessive wear-and-tear from being twisted, bent and pulled when we use or store them untidily.

 

 

 

Flexible yet strong PVC flat cable

Messy and entangled cables suffer from extra tension and frictional stresses when they are twisted and pulled at force. A Flat-profile cable minimizes twisting and stress on the cable. With its self-bonding cable management, the BondCable is able to achieve extremely high reliability and durability ratings.  

The Bondcable is USB-IF compliant with specified test requirements and procedures observed. It has been tested against a series of Weighted Bending Tests (1.1 lb / 500 g, 120° for 10,000 cycles) and Plug-unplug Tests (10,000 times) without any failures. 

 

 BondCables are manufactured with the latest charging specifications available for Apple, Android and other devices. This includes the latest certified Apple Lightning C94 USB-C and C48 USB-A, HW SuperCharge (5V 4.5A) and USB-C Fast-Charge (20V 3A).   

 

 

 

The BondCable is meant for usage at home, in the office or on-the-go; whether you are an everyday mobile worker, a savvy traveler, or simply someone who likes your stuff neat, uncluttered and organised.

For the everyday worker, the savvy traveller and that neat freak friend

 

Fits any bag, pocket and drawer

 

BondCable saves both time and space

 

Twist and tangle-free

 

Good cable management = longer lasting cable

The BondCable is easy to manage and to keep in good condition; so not only will it last much longer than your regular cables, it will also keep your bags and everyday-carry items neat and tangle free!  

 

 

All BondCables are USB-IF compliant and support the latest fast-charging standards and data transfer. Our lightning cables are MFi certified and produced by Apple-certified manufacturers! 

 

 

The BondCable bonds onto itself through its specially-designed cable profile. Made from high tensile and compression strength PVC, the grooves on the cable catches onto the protrusions, with opposing frictional forces bonding them together.  

 

 

The compressible grooved profile (Actual pre-production sample shown)

 

 

To back/order more than 5 BondCables, please add S$15 per BondCable to your pledge amount.

 

BondCables will be shipped via bulk-mail at a subsidized postage rate world wide specially for our backers. However, we will not be able to ship to some countries as the COVID-19 pandemic has impacted international movement of goods with additional border controls and restrictions implemented at/to these countries (as of June 2020).

We are unable to ship to the following countries: 
Andorra, Antigua and Barbuda, Anguilla, Netherland Antilles, Bonaire, Curacao, St.Eustatius, St Maarten, American Samoa, Aland Islands, Azerbaijan, Bosnia Herzegovina, Barbados, Benin, Yemen, Bermuda, Bolivia, Dutch Caribbean and Caribbean Netherlands, Bahamas, Bhutan, Bouvet Island, Belize, Central African Rep, Cook Island - New Zealand, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Cyprus, Djibouti, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Fiji, Falkland Island, Micronesia, Faroe Islands, Grenada, French Guiana, Guernsey Island and Alderney, Gibraltar, Greenland, Gambia, Guinea Rep, Guadeloupe (including St Barthelemy), Guam, Guinea Bissau, Guyana, Honduras, Croatia, Haiti, Canary Island (SPX only), Isle of Man, Jersey, Jamaica, Kiribati, Comoros, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Kosovo, Kuwait, Cayman Island, Saint Lucia, Leichtenstein, Sri Lanka, Lesotho, Libya, Monaco, Moldova, Montenegro, St Martin, Marshall Island, Mali, Mongolia, Mariana Island, Martinique, Mauritania, Montserrat, Malawi, New Caledonia, Norfolk Island, Nicaragua, Nepal, Nauru, Niue, Panama, Peru, French Polynesia, Papua New Guinea, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, Palestine, Pacific Islands (Palau), Paraguay, Rwanda, Solomon Island, Svalbard and Jan Mayen, Sierra Leone, San Marino, Suriname, Sao Tome & Principe, Swaziland, Turks & Caicos Island, Chad, French Southern Territories, Tajikistan, Tokelau, Timor-Leste, Turkmenistan, Tonga, US outlying Islands, Uruguay, The Vatican City State, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Venezuela, British Virgin Islands, US Virgin Islands, Vanuatu, Island Of Wallis (Wallis & Futuna Islands), Samoa, Curacao (Netherlands), Sint Maarten (Netherlands), Kosovo, Mayotte, Zaire (Congo Republic), Botswana, Corsica, Iraq, Maldives, South Africa, Tunisia, Cuba, Curacao, Serbia, Zimbabwe

 

 

BondCables are production-ready in our factory and what you see in the images are actual pre-production samples and NOT prototypes. The BondCable is a "not smart, but clever" product, so there are minimal manufacturing concerns. All our backers can expect smooth production and delivery!  

 

 

To read more about BondCable, head over to these awesome sites:

Yanko Design, The Straits Times, Geeky Gadgets, Nylon, HardwareZone, MusicPhotoLife, Backerkit, Techable (Japanese)

 

 

How it started: from candy to cable

The BondCable was inspired through daily experiences and observations of things around us. While working on ideas to coil and manage cables effectively, the design team casually observed someone with a long Sakeru belt candy. Noticing the grooves on the long candy, the designers were struck by the idea of having self-bonding grooves on a flat cable. The BondCable was thus born!    

Process and explorations

 

Our development team spent over 18 months working meticulously with the manufacturer refining the grooved profile, tolerances, material hardness and reliability of the BondCable. Through iterative prototypes testing, evaluation and revision, we are finally at a production-ready outcome.   

 

Sketches and ideation​

 

Work in progress

 

 

Testing prototypes

 

Even the connector can bond to the cable now!

We have fabricated all the necessary molds and tooling and have conducted pre-production trials successfully. With your orders and support, we will commence the mass production of BondCable and make them available to backers followed by retail and distribution channels within a few months. 

 

 

 

The BondCable packaging will be environmental friendly - no glue, 100% recyclable and degradable. It is designed with sufficient material to cover and protect the product for shipping and at the same time minimizing the carbon footprint left onto our planet.

 

 

 

 

About Us: CleverThings

 

 

Smart Phones, Smart Watches, Smart Cars, Smart TV, Smart Homes…

Enough Smart Things.

We are CleverThings.

As stated in our brand tagline ‘Enough Smart Things’ , we are tired of hearing and using the word smart and decided to create clever products instead. CleverThings is a series of products that uses physical and tactile design solutions instead of technology to solve everyday problems. 

The BondCable is the inaugural product from CleverThings, a new brand concept initiated by Design Insight, a design studio with over 16 years of experience in the design and development of consumer products.

 

 

Batch Orders & Global Retailers

CleverThings welcomes global distributors or retailers - please contact us at cleverthings@designinsight.com.sg to enquire about it.

Batch orders - We can also customize BondCables with your company/brand logo based on a minimum quantity of 500. Please also contact cleverthings@designinsight.com.sg

 

Have any questions?

Any questions regarding the distribution of Bond Cable or the product itself ? Feel free to email us at cleverthings@designinsight.com.sg

Note: 

With the current adversity and uncertainty in the world, shipping and delivery timings may vary. But don't worry! We will do our very best and work with our shipping service provider from the start to make sure our backers receive their BondCables in time :)

 

Partners

We are proud and happy to work with the followings partners to make this campaign come alive.  

 

 

Risks and Challenges

This is our first in-house crowdfunding campaign. However, we have helped many other companies and brand names transform ideas into products in many successful crowdfunding projects! We have more than a decade of experience in design, product development and manufacturing. Thus, we are confident that we can deliver this clever product to all our backers, retailers and distributors seamlessly.

story:
Hi. I am Hideaki Seike from Adplus.

Elephant Steady is a stabilizer for iPhone which were able to raise $80,000 in Kickstarter and Campfire.

Currently the Elephant Steady is only available in black color. Black is an ideal color for photographing equipment and household electric appliances. However, I think there should be more colors for this product to let users enjoy taking movies.

In Kickstarter, we had set a stretch goal of adding colors if we reach $100,000. But we could not meet the goal. I still wish that the Elephant Steady could be available in different colors and be a more attractive product.

We want to raise the rest $20,000 in INDIEGOGO and accomplish the stretch goal of adding more colors. Please help us bring the Elephant Steady in many colors to all over the world.

Get your favorite color!

Once the pledge hits $100,000, five different colors will be available in addition to the black color.

Please select your favorite color from below and like the elephant steady.

When getting your reward, you will be able to choose your most favorite color from the six colors(black and five other colors that were most popular).

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.671474146263435.1073741830.645159552228228&type=3

 

About Elephant Steady

Elephant Steady is the world’s smallest stabilizer grip for iPhone which enables you taking movies without camera shake. By installing this grip, you will be able to take movies with high quality. By loading the small high performance motor and using the application to control it, we were able to get rid of the logic board. This enabled us to come up with the beautiful unprecedented design.

 

 

 

Your iPhone detects it’s inclination and fixes the camera shake immediately. With this elephant steady, you can take movies without shakes as if you were using a costly device.

 

You can use it easily anytime anywhere

Elephant Steady is very compact that it could fit into your pocket.
Once you set your iPhone and plug in the headphone jack, it's ready to be used!

 

Features of Elephant Steady

Stabilizer using iPhone functions

By using the gyro sensor built in your iPhone, the app controls the grip’s motor. Appreciate with this simple structure, we could accomplish the goal of keeping it in a low price and high reliability operation.

 

World’s smallest motor stabilizer

With this new structure, we were able to make the size compact compared to the general motor stabilizers. As a result, elephant steady is both successful at portability and excellent functionality.

 

Camera App Exclusive for Elephant Steady

Elephant cam is available for free. You can control the motor and take your movie using this app. In addition, we are planning to add more functions in the future.

 

Other features

 

 

Electronics

Above is the drawing of the Elephant Steady's working principle. The Elephant Steady is connected to iPhone using the headphone minijack. The iPhone App,Elephant Cam, controls the two motors using pulse code. You can contorl the ON/OFF by the power switch. The motor's power is supplied by the lithium-ion battery. The tilt control button uses the headphone's volume control signal and transmit to the iPhone App, Elephant Cam. With the iPhone's gyro sensor and tilt control button's signal, the Elephant Cam detects the suitable angle and controls the motor.

 

WHERE WE'RE AT

 

 

Prototype Video

This is a prototype. The stabilization is being done properly. We are doing our best to make it better. We are now developing to make it possible.

 

From backers' opinions

 

Spec Sheet

  • iPhone models : iPhone4S , 5 , 5s, 5c , 6 , ipod touch 5th generation
  • OS Version : iOS7 or later
  • Recharge Time : 1 hours
  • Height : 150 mm
  • Width : 49.5 mm
  • Depth : 50.5 mm
  • Tilt Angle : 90°
  • Roll Angle : 90°
  • Material : Polycarbonate
  • Estimated Price : $99 (USD)

Elephant Steady by ADPLUS on Sketchfab

2-Axes 2 Motor of Elephant Steady by ADPLUS on Sketchfab

 

Perks

The retail price will be about $100, so with the Indiegogo perks, you will save about 20% on your Elephant Steady.
You will also get the perks before it is sold officialy.

Funders from the US and Japan are free of shipping costs. We will use Amazon.com to ship within the US. 

However, Funders from country outside of the US and Japan need to pay extra $20 for shipping cost.

 

 

About GIZMON SMART CLIP

Here are some lens and filters with unique effects such as fish eye lens, macro lens and CPL filter. With it's new design, it works with many devices.
http://gizmon.com/gizmon-smartclip/

 

Schedule

 

About us

We import photographic equipments.
We also introduce and sell cameras from overseas to Japanese camera-lovers.We want to introduce new ways of taking photos.

Adplus co,ltd. (JAPAN)
5-5 Hachiojimachi Chuo-ku Kumamoto-City Kumamoto 860-0831 Japan
http://www.adplus-jp.com
info@adplus-jp.com
Duties Contents: Planning, manufacturing and sales of photographic equipment

 

Risks and challenges

In carrying out our project, we will absolutely do our best to fulfill our promise to the supporters. However, when we are developing such new products, we are always attended with risks.

The most concerning factor we have is that how much we can make the motor move smoothly. We put efforts on making sophisticated programs to keep the servomotor’s moving smooth and the body size compact and light. Also to give high endurance, we test and improve the products repeatedly.

We promise to clear all the risks and challenges, and complete the “elephant-steady” as it is on the project now. Currently, we are collecting data using the prototype model and planning to release our first “elephant-steady” around February, 2015.

We will do our best to give out the awards to our supporters as soon as possible. In addition, if there happens to be some trouble and we are obliged to delay the shipping of the awards, we will definitely announce what is going on and how things will go.

We take pride in producing and selling iPhone accessories, and are looking forward to launching our innovative products to you.

 

FAQ

Do you plan to make the Elephant Steady compatible with Android devices?

Regarding Android device, the pulse code output from the headphone jack differs by model. For this, it needs extra works to adjust the program. We are currently planning to choose some Android smartphones and develop applications for them.

 

Do you plan to make the Elephant Steady 3 axes?

This stabilizer works only by the headphone jack to reduce the production cost and make the body size compact. Also the Elephant Steady uses stereo 2 channel of the headphone jack and controls the 2 motors. With this current system, we could only make it 2 axes.

 

Are there any plans to angle the headphone plug?

Yes, we plan to angle the headphone plug and make it more slim.

 

Is the Elephant Steady compatible with iPod touch 4?

The Elephant Steady uses gyro sensor and enable photographing movies with HD quality at the same time. For this, it needs high management device. 
If you actuate on your iPod touch 4, you may end up with taking low picture quality movie. However, we will try our best to make it compatible with iPod touch 4.

 

Can I use it with my iPhone cases on?

We are planning to improve the claw parts, where it holds your smartphone. If your case was thin, you can use it with your case on.

 

Can the Elephant Steady really stabilize the smartphone with it's small size?

The Elephant Steady uses 2 motors, meaning 2 drives and 2 axis. 
The motor we're going to use has 1.7kg/cm of torque. 
It can stabilize your smartphone even with your cases on.

 

How will the sound be recorded?

The sound will be recorded through your iPhone's microphone.

 

How will the external microphone be fixed?

Although Elephant Steady uses the headphone jack to connect with iPhone, there are three ways to record voice with the "Elephant Cam" 
1. Use the microphone built in your iPhone 
2. By using headphone splitter, you can fix the external microphone with mini plug type.
3. By using the lightning connector, you can fix the external microphone.

 

Please tell me about the shipping cost.

Not only Japan but also backers from the US are free of shipping cost. 
However, backers from country outside of the US and Japan need to pay extra $20 for shipping cost.

 

Is it compatible with iPhone6?

Yes, it is compatible with iPhone6.
There is an adjuster function on the grip which makes is possible for many types of iPhones to be used. 
The grip can hold smartphones up till 8cm wide.

Risks and challenges
In carrying out our project, we will absolutely do our best to fulfill our promise to the supporters. However, when we are developing such new products, we are always attended with risks.
The most concerning factor we have is that how much we can make the motor move smoothly. We put efforts on making sophisticated programs to keep the servomotor’s moving smooth and the body size compact and light. Also to give high endurance, we test and improve the products repeatedly.
We promise to clear all the risks and challenges, and complete the “elephant-steady” as it is on the project now. Currently, we are collecting data using the prototype model and planning to release our first “elephant-steady” around February, 2015.
We will do our best to give out the awards to our supporters as soon as possible. In addition, if there happens to be some trouble and we are obliged to delay the shipping of the awards, we will definitely announce what is going on and how things will go.
We take pride in producing and selling iPhone accessories, and are looking forward to launching our innovative products to you.
 
FAQ
Do you plan to make the Elephant Steady compatible with Android devices?
Regarding Android device, the pulse code output from the headphone jack differs by model. For this, it needs extra works to adjust the program. We are currently planning to choose some Android smartphones and develop applications for them.
 
Do you plan to make the Elephant Steady 3 axes?
This stabilizer works only by the headphone jack to reduce the production cost and make the body size compact. Also the Elephant Steady uses stereo 2 channel of the headphone jack and controls the 2 motors. With this current system, we could only make it 2 axes.
 
Are there any plans to angle the headphone plug?
Yes, we plan to angle the headphone plug and make it more slim.
 
Is the Elephant Steady compatible with iPod touch 4?
The Elephant Steady uses gyro sensor and enable photographing movies with HD quality at the same time. For this, it needs high management device. 
If you actuate on your iPod touch 4, you may end up with taking low picture quality movie. However, we will try our best to make it compatible with iPod touch 4.
 
Can I use it with my iPhone cases on?
We are planning to improve the claw parts, where it holds your smartphone. If your case was thin, you can use it with your case on.
 
Can the Elephant Steady really stabilize the smartphone with it's small size?
The Elephant Steady uses 2 motors, meaning 2 drives and 2 axis. 
The motor we're going to use has 1.7kg/cm of torque. 
It can stabilize your smartphone even with your cases on.
 
How will the sound be recorded?
The sound will be recorded through your iPhone's microphone.
 
How will the external microphone be fixed?
Although Elephant Steady uses the headphone jack to connect with iPhone, there are three ways to record voice with the "Elephant Cam" 
1. Use the microphone built in your iPhone 
2. By using headphone splitter, you can fix the external microphone with mini plug type.
3. By using the lightning connector, you can fix the external microphone.
 
Please tell me about the shipping cost.
Not only Japan but also backers from the US are free of shipping cost. 
However, backers from country outside of the US and Japan need to pay extra $20 for shipping cost.
 
Is it compatible with iPhone6?
Yes, it is compatible with iPhone6.
There is an adjuster function on the grip which makes is possible for many types of iPhones to be used. 
The grip can hold smartphones up till 8cm wide.

story:
Our colleague was trying to plug a USB disc to his iMac, not being able to find the port,  he stood up  and turned his iMac around; at that moment, he knocked over his glass and water poured all over the desk. Most of his documents were ruined, and he wasted most of the morning cleaning up the mess.

iMac is beautiful and elegant. But sometimes finding the port for your USB devices isn't easy. 

Got a USB hub already? 
They just left our desks looking cluttered.

Then we thought, what if we are able to connect USB devices easily, increase the amount of ports that one has access to, and at the same time, make it look like it belongs there?

So, we invented Huback.


Now, Huback has your back! 
It is THE USB HUB that belongs to iMac.

Huback is a fully integrated 3.0 USB hub for your iMac. That means no more turning your iMac around! We carefully designed it so it attaches easily and clips onto the front of your iMac firmly.

So this means that YOU now have the option of connecting up to 4 devices at the same time! Connect USB disks, 2.5" external hard drives, card readers, USB fans or lights, and transfer your data using Huback. All of this while only occupying 1 USB port giving you more space to plug in other devices!

  • USB 3.0 high-speed interface
  • Backwards compatible with USB 1.1
  • Holds onto iMac tightly
  • 4 USB ports yet take only one from iMac
  • Support data transfer
  • For iMac 21 & 27 inch, late 2012 & later models


"Less is more", said Mies Van Der Rohe, one of the fathers of modern design. That is what keeps popping up in our heads everyday we come to our office. Therefore, we bring you simplicity in its purest form helping you enhance your user experience with the iMac.


Love Huback? Back us!

    The Huback is the result of a year and a half of discussing, designing and testing. It wasn't easy, but we did it. Not only did it solve our problem, but we believe that this is the ultimate solution for all you iMac users.

    Now, we’d like to invite all you contributors out there, to be part of the Huback launch, which we are starting right here, exclusively, on Indiegogo.

    Be a pioneer, and own some of the first Hubacks in the world.

    And show your friends, how less, is more.


    Production & Delivery

    We have been through the prototyping stages, and now we are  working on engineering test  samples, FCC/CE/RoHS certifications and preproduction reviews. The scheduled production & delivery date is set as follows:

    • Mass Production: Late October, 2014 
    • Delivery: November, 2014 

      *We'll have early delivery if everything goes perfectly as expected. 

      *We will sincerely make every effort to provide the perk but the delivery date is not guaranteed. (PayPal policy)


      Perfection: A Never-Ending Road

      The product speaks for itself. Generation by generation, we will always stay on the path, to making it better. Let us know what you think about Huback — so with your help we can really achieve something close to perfection.

      • Comment here on Indiegogo.

      • Send your feedback to: ozakiteam@ozaki.com.tw

      *Huback has multiple patents pending in major countries on its structural designs and heat dissipating solutions.

      *All the trademarks, product names, company names, logos, copyright works or any other intellectual property appearing above are the property of their owners respectively.

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Jaime and I am currently a business student studying innovation & entrepreneurship, and I have a vision to rid the world of wait lines and give people back their time! 

History

About a year ago, I had to renew my passport and when I made it down to the nearest passport office, I came to realize that I was going to be there for a while as there were an overwhelming amount of people in line.  As I was sitting in the waiting room waiting for my number to be called, I began thinking that there must be a better way then this. It was 2011 at the time and I knew that today’s technology presented ways to change the way we wait for services.

Product Intro

After much research, design, and development, I bring you Q-Me; an easy to use application built for businesses faced with long wait lines. It allows for their customers to be placed into a virtual, mobile queue rather then having to physically wait in line. As they approach the front of the virtual line, they will receive a page via text message notifying them to make their way back to the establishment.

Designed to be used from any device with a reliable Internet connection, this intuitive platformallows for unlimited flexibility within an establishment; from managers with PCs, to front staff with tablets, to guests with mobile devices.

Additional Features: Text Message promotions, wait line analytics, forecastes wait times. 

Q-Me also won an award for "Most potential for commercialization of an information and technology product" here in Alberta at a recent technology conference.

Online: http://www.q-me.co

Contributions & Impact

Q-Me is currently a working application, which was tested at an Earl’s Restaurant location, however the market needs to hear about it! I have done everything thus far and spent all my money on R&D. I need your help with other aspects of launching a product! Part of your contributions will go towards establishing a sales & marketing team so that Q-Me can enter aggressively penetrate the market. The remaining amount will go towards further developing the app’s feature set to better serve you :-D 

By contributing to this project, you are not only helping a business student launch a product, but you are doing your part in helping change the world. The foundation of Q-Me is giving people back their time, and time equals money. Apply Q-Me on a global scale, and you have a very different way of life, hints the product’s slogan of “live Life Differently”.

If I don’t reach my entire $25,000 goal, the funds will either go towards further development, or solely sales & marketing. Not both.

Track Record

Although I am still a business student, I also already own my own agency called Hollow Earth Media. We provide mobile advertising technology, strategy, and implementation for enterprises of all sizes.  Although Q-Me is a software product, my experience and networks in the mobile arena give me confidence in successfully launching Q-Me and gaining traction in the Hospitality industry to start off with.

Can’t Contribute? You can still help enormously!

As mentioned, part of the contributions will be going towards sales and marketing, but what better form of marketing then word of mouth?

If you know someone that owns or manages a busy restaurant or any business faced with long wait lines, please tell them about Q-Me! This type of help is just as valuable as actual contributions.

story:
INSPIRATION

Today’s Smartphones no double with much powerful camera resolution, your are not only bring along your mobile phone but personal camera everyday. How wonderful if lets you control your smartphone’s camera without having to hold it in your hand. Ever wanted to snap a picture of yourself or a group, but didn’t want to have that goofy “I held this with my own hand” look that so many online photos have? Or can't able to capture whole group of families or friends together without missing anyone who responsible to takes the photo.Smart Remote Shutter lets you control your iPhone taking Photo/ taping Video from a distance even 20 meters away to snap your shot..

 

Besides, I will never loss my iPhone anymore and easy to find my devices anywhere, never missing to carry mu keys anymore.

 

 

 

 

 

 

New color in red (Updated on 17 Mar 2013)

 

1. Never Lose Your valuable belonging again, it keep you from losing your Money.

Help you to secure your iPhone 4S/5 or New iPad and an your beloved item is missing and moved away from you. My family and I lose our keys or finding where is my phone sometime, so we decided to do it for finding my stuff and protecting belonging.

 

A. Pressing the App of iPhone, Smart remote shutter triggered with alarm sound so you can find your keys or wherever attached.

B. Pressing the Smart remote shutter button, then your iPhone triggered with alarm sound so you can find your iPhone easily

C. If you forget your wallet, the App will remind and play your favorite song and the Smart remote shutter will beep before you get too far.

This App and Smart Remote Shot will address to resolve your concerns regarding situation such as:

1:Your purse might be stolen while get on the train.

2:Your briefcase might be missing at the train station.

3:Your iPhone might be taken away while eating out in a restaurant.

4:Your kids might be run away in playground.5.Press the Smart Remote Shot button to find you iPhone

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

2. How It Works of Remote Shutter

Smart Remote Shutter is a remote controller using a Bluetooth 4.0 which allow you to connect your iPhone4S, iPhone5, iPad Mini, iPad3.Using Bluetooth to pair to your device, Smart remote Shutter gives you “complete control over the camera of the target device, press one to take photo and long press to video recording 

 

 

 

 

 

It propose can runs for eight months on an included battery and has a 20 meters range.

 

DESIGNED FOR BOTH MEN AND WOMEN

Smart Remote Shutter features a modern, stylish design and is sized perfectly for both men and women. The diamond sharp delivers the good looking performance and comfort that is expected of a Necklace or sexy keychain to be worn every day.

DETAILED SPECIFICATIONS

It was designed to provide next generation functionality, while still maintaining the uncompromising characteristics you expect from a digital belonging. 

  • Propose 8 months battery life with replaceable coin cell battery (CR2032) 
  • Water resistant
  • Sized ( 48mm length, 35mm wide and 12mm thickness)
  • Range: up to 20 meters (open area)

 

WHERE THE MONEY GOES

We have finalized the hardware design and produced the initial Smart Remote Shutter working samples. Low power management did develop about a year. The outfit tooling is underway, but we need your help to finalize our software development and go into mass production. Here is how we will invest the funding we receive:

  • App Software Development. We have started the software development but the majority of the funding requested will be applied to complete final App software coding and testing with different devices
  • Engineering Support. Additional engineering support is required to finalize the design details for internal hardware and case design
  • Mass Production. We need your support to secure procurement of the long lead components and meet the minimum order quantities required by the factories.
  • Bluetooth, FCC, CE, certificate approval
  • Future Software Development. After completed the iPhone Apps, MP and deliver to backers. Once Android 4.3 version release, we wish to start the software development supporting most update version for Android Smartphone, as 4.3 should be gonna upgrade very soon. All shipped Smart Remote shutter target to compatible.

With your support we expect to have the first production in your hands by May. We are excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and please pass on word of this project to others.

 

ABOUT hook:

hook is a new UK Smart accessory brand. Currently producing a series of products that utilize the most advance technology with BT Smart, small form factor hardware, most power saving than any others.We are Smartphone bigot, and Smart Remote Shutter is combative project for our company. We have validated the design and functionality in our first working samples shown in the video, but we need your support to finalize the development and get the product into production at our existing factory and launched in May.

 

Risks and challenges

Without risk of Hardware, firmware and mechanical tooling.

- The challenges will be the RF reception in different circumstance like at home, open area etc. It is time consuming to fine tune in different scenario.

- App graphic design should be more attractive and user friendly

story:
Welcome cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors - the next generation of mobile coverage.  Simply put, if you get a scratch in your screen, through a cellhelmet™ Screen Protector - we'll replace the glass.

Thanks to our success with the cellhelmet™ case for iPhone, we're now expanding the cellhelmet™ brand across multiple devices, in the form of scratched glass coverage.

"When you're spending $20 for a piece of plastic, you better get some assurance that it's going to protect your device from scratches."     

                            -Bryan McHenry - cellhelmet™ Co-Founder

cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors.  A one of a kind product - the only protector on earth to include scratched glass coverage.  Good for US and Canadian residents only.

  • Available for most devices (including iPhone 5/iPad Mini*) - scroll down to see our complete and growing list.

Retailing at $19.99/$29.99.  Extremely competitive pricing, with unheard of scratched glass covearge.

One full year.  The cellhelmet™ Screen Protector scratched glass coverage is good for one full year.  The year begins the minute that your product is received.  Each pack of screen protectors is specific to one device and is non-transferable.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors must be registered within 30 days of purchase at www.cellpig.com/cellhelmet-screen-protectors/.

Proven and unparalleled customer support.  Who ever said you can't have customer support for screen protectors?  Seriously?  We have 24/7 support, which is always answered by a human (if not, someones cooking dinner).  Questions about how to apply your protector?  We're there.  Scratched glass?  We're there.  We're already doing it with the cellhelmet™ case for iPhone.  Don't believe us?  

  • Better Business Bureau
  • StellaService.com

Quick and easy repairs.  Scratched your glass through your cellhelmet™ Screen Protector?  Call 1-888-814-5968 and a customer service representative will guide you through the process (24/7).  Simply send in your device and it will be repaired within 3 business days, after which it will be overnighted back to your address, at our expense.  All claims are subject to a $25/$35 (phones/tablets) handling fee and devices must be shipped in with the failed screen protector.

Guaranteed repairs.  We have teamed up with 39 of the largest and most recognized repair facilities in the United States.  If your glass should suffer a scratch, we'll have it replaced quickly at one of our expert repair facilities.

PET material.  When you're offering scratched glass coverage, it's very important to use some pretty tough materials.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors are crafted from PET - the same stuff that plastic bottles are made from. 

High clarity.  When applied correctly, you'll never even notice the cellhelmet™ Screen Protector is there.  Seriously, they're that transparent.

No mess before or after.  Apply your cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors without any liquids and never have a sticky residue left behind, after they're removed.

Flawless touch.  Touch screens are meant to be touched.  Touch your touch screen, just like you touched it before.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors will never interfere with the touch response of your touch screen.  Touchy, touchy, touchy. 

NO AIR BUBBLES!  Watch the video in the gallery, if you've ever had issues with air bubbles under your screen protector.  We promise it won't happen with your cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors.  Seriously.  Watch.

Don't wait.  We'll be launching and shipping (that's right, we'll be shipping) cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors in September - our manufacturer has already been lined up and our packaging is currently being created.  This isn't one of those campaigns where you'll wait a year for your product.  And by the way, we update our Funders quite often, so prepare yourself - you're going to be in the loop.

Made to last.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors are made to last.  In fact, we put a one year guarantee on every one we sell.  Damaged screen protector?  We'll replace it - you only pay S&H of $2.99.  As long as you're still within the one year of scratched glass coverage, we'll make sure that your screen protector is in good shape.

Why IndieGoGo?  Simple answer for this one.  Community.  Quality products aren't just made from quality materials.  Customer service and a strong community make companies succeed.  Grow with us and become a part of the cellhelmet™ revolution!

Guaranteed protection for the following devices.

  • Amazon Kindle Fire
  • Apple iPad 1
  • Apple iPad 2
  • Apple iPad 3/The New iPad
  • Apple iPad Mini *(when dimensions are available)
  • Apple iPhone 3G
  • Apple iPhone 3GS

*cellhelmet Screen Protectors are not indestructible and should be handled with care. Reckless behavior may result in a damaged device. We recommend that you always have a case on your device. All claims are subject to a $25/$35 (phones/tablets) handling fee. The failed screen protector must be included with your device, when shipped in for repair, to confirm damage consistency. The cellhelmet Screen Protector scratched glass coverage only applies to screen scratches. Screen breakages and cracks are not covered by the cellhelmet Screen Protector scratched glass guarantee, nor are damages or issues with the rest of the device. The cellhelmet Screen Protector scratched glass guarantee will last one year from the date of original purchase. Must be a resident of the United States or Canada to be eligible for the cellhelmet Screen Protector scratched glass coverage. cellhelmet Screen Protectors may be purchased outside of the United States or Canada, but will not include any scratched glass covearge. The cellhelmet Screen Protector scratched glass coverage must be registered within 30 days of purchase, by the customer, at http://www.cellpig.com/cellhelmet/registrationform.html Failure to register a cellhelmet Screen Protector within 30 days of purchase will void all scratched glass coverage. We reserve the right to deny any claim. Damages assessed as abuse will be denied. Costs associated with shipping a device in for repair are the responsibility of the customer. Claims resulting in a screen repair are unlimited. cellhelmet Screen Protectors cannot be returned after the registration code has been revealed. All returns must go through the store where cellhelmet Screen Protectors were purchased. cellhelmet coverage is non-transferrable and can only be tied to one device. cellhelmet Screen Protectors are not to be purchased for the repair/replacement of a previously damaged device. We recommend that you backup your data before sending a device in for repair - we are not responsible for lost data. Passcodes must be turned off prior to repair, in order to verify device and test functionality. Damaged devices will not be returned, when a replacement device is issued. Some repairs may void the manufacturers warranty. Replacement cellhelmet Screen Protectors will be issued free of charge - a flat $2.99 will be charged for shipping and handling, at the time of replacement. Find detailed and complete cellhelmet™ Screen Protector Terms and Conditions at http://www.cellpig.com/conditions - we reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. Questions? Contact us at 1-888-814-5968 or via contact@cellpig.com.. cellhelmet and cellpig.com are trademarks of Kane and McHenry Enterprises, LLC. All mentioned brands/phones/devices are the property of their respective owners - NO ASSOCIATION IS CLAIMED. © 2012 Kane and McHenry Enterprises, LLC - All Rights Reserved.

story_txt:
Welcome cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors - the next generation of mobile coverage.  Simply put, if you get a scratch in your screen, through a cellhelmet™ Screen Protector - we'll replace the glass.

Thanks to our success with the cellhelmet™ case for iPhone, we're now expanding the cellhelmet™ brand across multiple devices, in the form of scratched glass coverage.
"When you're spending $20 for a piece of plastic, you better get some assurance that it's going to protect your device from scratches."     
                            -Bryan McHenry - cellhelmet™ Co-Founder

cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors.  A one of a kind product - the only protector on earth to include scratched glass coverage.  Good for US and Canadian residents only.

Available for most devices (including iPhone 5/iPad Mini*) - scroll down to see our complete and growing list.
Retailing at $19.99/$29.99.  Extremely competitive pricing, with unheard of scratched glass covearge.
One full year.  The cellhelmet™ Screen Protector scratched glass coverage is good for one full year.  The year begins the minute that your product is received.  Each pack of screen protectors is specific to one device and is non-transferable.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors must be registered within 30 days of purchase at www.cellpig.com/cellhelmet-screen-protectors/.
Proven and unparalleled customer support.  Who ever said you can't have customer support for screen protectors?  Seriously?  We have 24/7 support, which is always answered by a human (if not, someones cooking dinner).  Questions about how to apply your protector?  We're there.  Scratched glass?  We're there.  We're already doing it with the cellhelmet™ case for iPhone.  Don't believe us?  

Better Business Bureau
StellaService.com
Quick and easy repairs.  Scratched your glass through your cellhelmet™ Screen Protector?  Call 1-888-814-5968 and a customer service representative will guide you through the process (24/7).  Simply send in your device and it will be repaired within 3 business days, after which it will be overnighted back to your address, at our expense.  All claims are subject to a $25/$35 (phones/tablets) handling fee and devices must be shipped in with the failed screen protector.
Guaranteed repairs.  We have teamed up with 39 of the largest and most recognized repair facilities in the United States.  If your glass should suffer a scratch, we'll have it replaced quickly at one of our expert repair facilities.
PET material.  When you're offering scratched glass coverage, it's very important to use some pretty tough materials.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors are crafted from PET - the same stuff that plastic bottles are made from. 

High clarity.  When applied correctly, you'll never even notice the cellhelmet™ Screen Protector is there.  Seriously, they're that transparent.
No mess before or after.  Apply your cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors without any liquids and never have a sticky residue left behind, after they're removed.
Flawless touch.  Touch screens are meant to be touched.  Touch your touch screen, just like you touched it before.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors will never interfere with the touch response of your touch screen.  Touchy, touchy, touchy.  
NO AIR BUBBLES!  Watch the video in the gallery, if you've ever had issues with air bubbles under your screen protector.  We promise it won't happen with your cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors.  Seriously.  Watch.
Don't wait.  We'll be launching and shipping (that's right, we'll be shipping) cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors in September - our manufacturer has already been lined up and our packaging is currently being created.  This isn't one of those campaigns where you'll wait a year for your product.  And by the way, we update our Funders quite often, so prepare yourself - you're going to be in the loop.

Made to last.  cellhelmet™ Screen Protectors are made to last.  In fact, we put a one year guarantee on every one we sell.  Damaged screen protector?  We'll replace it - you only pay S&H of $2.99.  As long as you're still within the one year of scratched glass coverage, we'll make sure that your screen protector is in good shape.
Why IndieGoGo?  Simple answer for this one.  Community.  Quality products aren't just made from quality materials.  Customer service and a strong community make companies succeed.  Grow with us and become a part of the cellhelmet™ revolution!

Youtube Media Test

A Tough Tool For Every Trade

Blackview has years of experience of rugged smartphones. As the world's best rugged phone maker, Blackview has a rock solid reputation as an innovator and a rugged smartphone producer. We had an epic unveiling of our new BV9700 Pro - “Transformers" themed MTK P70 multi-functional rugged phone during MWC 2019 (Mobile World Congress 2019). We poured our heart into designing BV9700 Pro in order to provide you with the best rugged phone ever and we are bringing it to life now.
If you work in tough envioronment or if you are an engineer, a mechanic, a farmer, a medic, a firefighter, or an outdoor person, Blackview BV9700 Pro is the one for you.

Blackview Is Featured In

 

A Tough Phone Built To Handle Challenges

Blackview BV-phones are built rugged and carry MIL-Spec 810G rating. They will survive drops, water, dusty and sandy environments; They can easily handle vibrations and extreme temperature changes; They all have powerful batteries and toughened display screens to make  it through a long day.

The BV9700 Pro goes a step further, because it’s certified for safe use in most extreme environments.

Waterproof

Designed to perform to high standards even in the wettest environments. With wet finger tracking, you can use the screen in the rain or when wet.

Drop Proof

Drop-proof & shockproof, BV9700 Pro is made to be rugged and tough. Built to Mil-Spec 810G, this phone will keep you going all day.

Dustproof & Oil Proof 

Dustproof & oil proof, Blackview BV9700 Pro is built to survive. The design and rugged features of the BV9700 Pro is IP68 & IP69K certified, ensuring protection against dust that may harm the equipment.

Rugged Certified

They are all IP68 rated phones, and BV9700 Pro is also IP69K certified.  This means not only can you submerge these phones, they can also withstand close-range high pressure and high temperature water jets.

With strong Corning® Gorilla® Glass screens, glove-on and wet finger tracking you will be able to use this tool in tough environments, in the wettest conditions, and with gloves on.

A Rugged Phone With Special Effects

Sure, it’s cool to say our BV9700 Pro has a "TRANSFORMERS" design but other than giving it some great street cred, we also make BV9700 Pro a genuinely useful tool for our customers.

People working in the construction trades like electricians, plumbers, surveyors, engineers, mechanics, and sports, outdoor adventure lovers or those with demanding jobs or lifestyles with constant exposure to environmental hazards and especially those who often break their phones will see the multifunctions and real value in this device.

BV9700 Pro Key Benefits

Different from the former BV phones, BV9700 Pro comes with a  Night Vision Camera, Air Quality Monitor, Heart Rate Monitor in addition to the rugged features. It really works as a tool for every trade.

Night Vision Camera

BV9700 Pro is paired with a small night vision camera that is very compact and lightweight. It can be clipped on to your belt, collar, pocket or other places where bulky camera is not suitable. It can be easily placed on backpacks, cars, motorcycles, etc. More helpful especially to the traffic police patrol at night.

The night vision camera makes clear image or video even in the dark environment.

Monitor the Air Quality with BV9700 Pro

Stay informed of the air quality in your area. BV9700 Pro could be used to measure the indoor air quality in your environment. It could also be used to measure the ambient temperature and humidity level. BV9700 helps you stay alert to the unhealthy Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) level in your work environment (especially useful if you handle solvents, work in paint shops or plastics manufacture, other manufacturing factories).

Monitor your heart rate & Train intelligently with BV9700 Pro 

   
Strap BV9700 Pro onto your arms and start monitoring your heart rate when you exercise. Find the right intensity zone for you and train intelligently with BV9700 Pro. With the heart rate sensor integration, BV9700 Pro will help you use collected heart rate data to guide your workouts and reach the best results. What's more, BV9700 Pro is also dust-proof and water-proof, you can use it for all kinds of activities, including running, cycling, swimming and more.
 

P70 Processor Makes The Phone Performs Faster

As the world's first use Helio P70 octa-core chipset and Andriod 9.0 Pie rugged smartphone, BV9700 Pro is incredibly strong and intelligent that it delivers 13% more performance than its predecesor the P60. P70 reduces power counsumption by 30%, improves heat cooling by 20%, adds 7% longer time for the user  than the P60. The AI Processing efficiency is 10% to 30% higher than the previous gereration's P60.

 

Global 4G Network Support

              

A Hardworking Phone Built Rugged

This is one hard working phone that won’t let you down. And its performance, usability and reliability mean you are getting a phone that gets the work done and provides value for money.

 Construction Site 

Car Maintenance and Repair

Power Station Maintenance 

Firefighter

 

Referral Competition

 

Together To Reach the Goal Faster

BV9700 Pro Unboxing

 

BV9700 Pro Extreme Rugged Tests

 

Full Specs Of BV9700 Pro

 

Design & Phototype

 

BV9700 Pro In Production

 

Timeline

 

Blackview Team

Risk & Challenge

Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures that must be managed. However, with this being our third Indiegogo campaign, we can confidently say that we are already familiar with the Crowdfunding process. Most importantly, the electronic product design and production are no strangers to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you in the loop. Thanks for supporting us! Due to different countries' laws and regulations of custom duty, there are chances that backers need to pay custom duty.

BV9700 Pro Extreme Rugged Tests

 
Full Specs Of BV9700 Pro Design & Phototype BV9700 Pro In Production Timeline Blackview TeamRisk & ChallengeTime is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures that must be managed. story:
Check our review of the CherryPack

                       

 

CherryPack

The World's first Nano-Based Power Bank

       

The Only Power Bank You Will Ever Need

There is always a point in our days where we are "busy." That is why we eliminated any needs for another power bank by allowing for a Multi-Device charger without losing charging speeds. Now, you can charge three devices at the same time; wired or wireless, while our competitors can't even charge two devices. We've thrown in a USB Qualcomm for fast and efficient 3.0 charging speeds, a USB-C to allocate for newer devices and an 18w output, 15w of pure, wireless charging, and of course, a MicroUSB for those devices that depend on them. One CherryPack can charge your phones, computers, headphones, watches - all the essential tech needed.

Bringing your iPhone and AirPods? Not an issue. What about my laptop and Samsung? We've got you covered. All combinations are adaptive to our power bank. They just need to include one of the following - USB-C, Qi, USB 3.0, MicroUSB

 

This isn't even close to the number of devices CherryPack supports; we just figured you will have a gadget similar to one shown!

We are adopting the latest Scientific Advancements in Nano-Technology...

Nano-Technology is not a word you hear every day, and there is a good reason for that. The science is so new that discoveries in Nano-Tech are happening this very moment. The CherryPack has utilized Nano-Tech in out suction cups to arrange the atmospheric atoms engulfed by the suction to the perfect amount of air pressure. This provides stability and strength in the cups, while still being able to be removed when wanted to.

                              

Nano-Technology in action on the CherryPack

 

On top of this, wireless charging is on the CherryPack, and provides 15w of action straight from the box. There is no reason to bring an iPhone or Android cable on your next time going out, trip, or any activity with the CherryPack.

\

This is the backbone to the CherryPack. A truly revolutionary design starts with backers like you supporting the project. This allows us to utilize Nano-Technology in other ways in all future products.

 

                                                    

We know that some of you will want to know what Nano-Technology brings to our product and any future ones.  If you want to learn more, you can watch the following video.

Who needs wires when you can Wirelessly Charge!?

Yes, that is correct. The CherryPack provides 15w wirelessly while every other power bank and pad struggle to achieve 10w. We know that time is of the essence in everyone's life, so we made Fast-Charging wirelessly an essential counterpart to our Nano-Tech Suction Cups. This instant pairing makes the CherryPack truly unique and one of a kind.

 

A showcase of the Qi Charging aspect

To add on, we have passed Qi Certification, meaning our product has gone through the most rigorous testing by the battery industry. This ensures the safety and security of every CherryPack ever made.

AirPod Users - we know your pain, and we are here to change it.

We know for a fact AirPods aren't easy to charge on the go. Having to bring an extra cable along is a hassle that will change, starting now. The Qi pad on the CherryPack allows for a fast, 15w wireless output to your AirPods Case, charging the case from 0 to 100 in under 30 minutes.

                                 

                               

Demonstration of AirPods and AirPod Pros

Only the highest grade batteries are used

When it comes to the battery, it is not something to cheap out on. That is why we have passed the intensive guidelines set by the battery industry and certified to say we did. Here at Cherry, we value your safety over our products, and we know this is the component that matters the most.

CherryPack in use for Airpods and a MacBook

10,000 mAh

Fitting multiple days worth of energy is difficult considering the size of the CherryPack.Our batteries are rated for 10,000 mAh or about 2.5x iPhone charges from 0-100 (to find the specification for your device, do 10,000/your device's charge). When considering other competitors, we may not be the most powerful battery, but there is no power bank that does not require wires beside us. There will never be a need to bring those tangled and long wires with the CherryPack, we have eliminated them.

The charging speeds of the CherryPack are the fastest in the market wirelessly. We support all Fast Charging requirements for all new iPhone and Android devices, allowing us to the full power of 15w to deliver energy straight to your phone. 

Ports for all Essential Devices

Your devices are bound to have one of the following; USB 3.0, USB C, MicroUSB, or Qi (Specific Specs in the "Specs" category). Out of all these ports, you can utilize three at the same time without losing power speed. The CherryPack makes it so that this is the only and last charger you will ever need to commute your daily life. Change starts now by adopting new and more efficient technology.

                                      

Showcase of the three ports

Weight
220g
Dimensions
3.9 x 2.6  x 0.9 in
Outputs and Inputs
Qi, USB 3.0 Quantum, MicroUSB, USB-C
Battery
10,000 Mah

Input/Outputs

MicroUSB- 5v / 2A. 9V / 2A
USB-3.0- 5V / 3A, 9V / 2A, 12V / 1.5A
USB-C -5V / 3A, 9V / 2A, 12V / 1.5A
Qi - 5V / 1A, 9V / 0.83A, 9V / 1.12A

Safety Mechanisms

Overheating, overcharging, short circuits, temperature regulation

Battery Cycles

1000 cycles of discharge and charge

Lifetime

Ranges from 2-3 years depending on use

Enclosure

PVC embedded structure with no-fingerprint backplates=

Charging times

Full Charge from 0-100% - 3.5 hours (USB-C)

Charge to 80% from 0% - 2 hours (USB-C)

One Year Warranty and Replacement for the CherryPack

All of our products include a warranty that protects your purchase of Cherry products in the event of a defect. This may include refunding your purchase or replacement of your product with a similar or comparable item. This warranty is only available to customers who purchased their items from Cherry or a marketplace or seller authorized by Cherry. Our friendly and responsive support team is happy to assist you with your warranty-related inquiries. Please contact us for more information.

The duration of this warranty may vary from one product to another, but some policies remain the same:

- The warranty period starts on the date the item is purchased from Cherry or an authorized retailer.
- The warranty does not cover accidental damage, normal wear, and tear, theft, or confiscation of your Cherry products.
- Warranty service does not extend the product's warranty beyond the coverage period established by the date of your purchase.
- The warranty will be invalidated if the product has not been used in accordance with the product documentation.
- The warranty is only valid for purchases made directly from Cherry or through the following authorized dealers. For purchases made through online marketplaces like Amazon and eBay, the warranty is only valid if the seller for that listing is either Cherry or one of the aforementioned authorized dealers.
- To verify your purchase and to better serve you, we may require information about your order (including date of purchase, order ID/number, and the name of the retailer) and, when applicable, your product's serial number. Warranty service may not be carried out if this information is not available.
- The Cherry Care Team will make a final determination regarding the warranty service.
- Your warranty is non-transferable.
Please review your product's documentation for information about the duration of warranty protection.

 

As seen above, we will begin fulfillment in May, about a month after the fundraising ends. This is due to the time to place an order with our manufacturer, arrival to our warehouse, shipment to US or international based providers to reach you. For US residents, you should expect your CherryPack in around two weeks after our funding is over; as for international orders; they will arrive within a month with tracking provided.

                                                       

If you were with us at the beginning and have seen our ads, you qualify for our promotion we laid out. If you haven't you can still do so by joining our mailing updates at ProjectCherry.com! As for perks, we are offering chargers in terms of quantity; if you want to make a custom order or are interested in wholesale, you can send an email to contact@projectcherry.com titled "Custom Order"

Qi Certified wireless charging products deliver a safe and reliable wireless charging experience. Products marked as Qi Certified have passed rigorous, independent laboratory tests for safety, interoperability and energy efficiency. Alternative claims like “Qi compliant,” “Qi compatible” or “Works with Qi,” suggests a product has not undergone proper Qi certification testing.

RoHS is a product level compliance based on the European Union's Directive 2002/95/EC, the Restriction of the Use of certain Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment

FCC mark is a certification mark employed on electronic products manufactured or sold in the United States which certifies that the electromagnetic interference from the device is under limits approved by the Federal Communications Commission.

CE marking is a certification mark that indicates conformity with health, safety, and environmental protection standards for products sold within the European Economic Area.

It's clear - The CherryPack is something you can trust in your everyday life. We have been certified and compliant with all rules laid forth by these agencies and governments, and we do not plan on changing that, nor will we.

“The best way to predict the future is to create it,” - Peter Drucker.

Cherry founded on a basic principle - Turning our revolutionary ideas into everyday products you will use. Our values are clear; bring forth a lifelong commitment to the quality that you deserve. Being the underdog in Seattle, the city that holds the world's biggest tech giants - Amazon and Microsoft is not easy. For each and every day since the concept of the CherryPack began, our team has been at work with it for countless hours each day. We sacrificed a normal life to begin our passion for innovation and gave up our lifestyle to work on our dreams. This is why we hope you will support us throughout our journey in the campaign and all future projects. 

We started this idea with no funding; which is why we rely on contributions like yours to keep innovations rolling in. Your purchase is used to fund manufacturing and all future projects we will hold on Indiegogo.

Based out of Seattle, WA, Cherry was started by just one founder, and we have since expanded our staff to a skilled set of entrepreneurs based in almost all parts of the world.
story_txt:
Check our review of the CherryPack                        CherryPackThe World's first Nano-Based Power Bank       The Only Power Bank You Will Ever NeedThere is always a point in our days where we are "busy." That is why we eliminated any needs for another power bank by allowing for a Multi-Device charger without losing charging speeds. Now, you can charge three devices at the same time; wired or wireless, while our competitors can't even charge two devices. We've thrown in a USB Qualcomm for fast and efficient 3.0 charging speeds, a USB-C to allocate for newer devices and an 18w output, 15w of pure, wireless charging, and of course, a MicroUSB for those devices that depend on them. One CherryPack can charge your phones, computers, headphones, watches - all the essential tech needed.Bringing your iPhone and AirPods? Not an issue. What about my laptop and Samsung? We've got you covered. All combinations are adaptive to our power bank. They just need to include one of the following - USB-C, Qi, USB 3.0, MicroUSB This isn't even close to the number of devices CherryPack supports; we just figured you will have a gadget similar to one shown!We are adopting the latest Scientific Advancements in Nano-Technology...Nano-Technology is not a word you hear every day, and there is a good reason for that. The science is so new that discoveries in Nano-Tech are happening this very moment. The CherryPack has utilized Nano-Tech in out suction cups to arrange the atmospheric atoms engulfed by the suction to the perfect amount of air pressure. This provides stability and strength in the cups, while still being able to be removed when wanted to.                              Nano-Technology in action on the CherryPack On top of this, wireless charging is on the CherryPack, and provides 15w of action straight from the box. There is no reason to bring an iPhone or Android cable on your next time going out, trip, or any activity with the CherryPack.\This is the backbone to the CherryPack. A truly revolutionary design starts with backers like you supporting the project. This allows us to utilize Nano-Technology in other ways in all future products.                                                     
We know that some of you will want to know what Nano-Technology brings to our product and any future ones.  If you want to learn more, you can watch the following video.Who needs wires when you can Wirelessly Charge!?Yes, that is correct. The CherryPack provides 15w wirelessly while every other power bank and pad struggle to achieve 10w. We know that time is of the essence in everyone's life, so we made Fast-Charging wirelessly an essential counterpart to our Nano-Tech Suction Cups. This instant pairing makes the CherryPack truly unique and one of a kind. A showcase of the Qi Charging aspectTo add on, we have passed Qi Certification, meaning our product has gone through the most rigorous testing by the battery industry. This ensures the safety and security of every CherryPack ever made.AirPod Users - we know your pain, and we are here to change it.We know for a fact AirPods aren't easy to charge on the go. Having to bring an extra cable along is a hassle that will change, starting now. The Qi pad on the CherryPack allows for a fast, 15w wireless output to your AirPods Case, charging the case from 0 to 100 in under 30 minutes.                                                                Demonstration of AirPods and AirPod ProsOnly the highest grade batteries are usedWhen it comes to the battery, it is not something to cheap out on. That is why we have passed the intensive guidelines set by the battery industry and certified to say we did. Here at Cherry, we value your safety over our products, and we know this is the component that matters the most.CherryPack in use for Airpods and a MacBook10,000 mAhFitting multiple days worth of energy is difficult considering the size of the CherryPack.Our batteries are rated for 10,000 mAh or about 2.5x iPhone charges from 0-100 (to find the specification for your device, do 10,000/your device's charge). When considering other competitors, we may not be the most powerful battery, but there is no power bank that does not require wires beside us. There will never be a need to bring those tangled and long wires with the CherryPack, we have eliminated them.The charging speeds of the CherryPack are the fastest in the market wirelessly. We support all Fast Charging requirements for all new iPhone and Android devices, allowing us to the full power of 15w to deliver energy straight to your phone. Ports for all Essential DevicesYour devices are bound to have one of the following; USB 3.0, USB C, MicroUSB, or Qi (Specific Specs in the "Specs" category). Out of all these ports, you can utilize three at the same time without losing power speed. The CherryPack makes it so that this is the only and last charger you will ever need to commute your daily life. Change starts now by adopting new and more efficient technology.                                      Showcase of the three portsWeight220gDimensions3.9 x 2.6  x 0.9 inOutputs and InputsQi, USB 3.0 Quantum, MicroUSB, USB-CBattery10,000 MahInput/OutputsMicroUSB- 5v / 2A. 9V / 2AUSB-3.0- 5V / 3A, 9V / 2A, 12V / 1.5AUSB-C -5V / 3A, 9V / 2A, 12V / 1.5AQi - 5V / 1A, 9V / 0.83A, 9V / 1.12ASafety MechanismsOverheating, overcharging, short circuits, temperature regulationBattery Cycles1000 cycles of discharge and chargeLifetimeRanges from 2-3 years depending on useEnclosurePVC embedded structure with no-fingerprint backplates=Charging timesFull Charge from 0-100% - 3.5 hours (USB-C)Charge to 80% from 0% - 2 hours (USB-C)One Year Warranty and Replacement for the CherryPackAll of our products include a warranty that protects your purchase of Cherry products in the event of a defect. This may include refunding your purchase or replacement of your product with a similar or comparable item. This warranty is only available to customers who purchased their items from Cherry or a marketplace or seller authorized by Cherry. story:
In 2016 we launched the original LyfieEye and shipped and delivered to our backers 100% on time. We are working with world class logistic partners and look forward to getting LyfieEye200 to every backer on time, again!

World’s First 360⁰ VR and AR Camera

The LyfieEye200 360⁰ camera captures stunning 360-degree HD images, videos and livestreams to social media. It also integrates seamlessly with the companion apps to create VR and AR experiences.

Here we walk you through LyfieEye200 and its features:

 

Additional Goodies With Your Pre-Order!

We’ve partnered with VeeR VR, one of the largest VR content hubs by both content and creator volume, to bring additional goodies to those who back our campaign on Indiegogo! 

With this collaboration, all LyfieEye200 cameras pre-ordered during the Indiegogo campaign will enjoy a customized VeeR Mini-Packet that includes the VeeR Mini-Glasses and VIP Membership Cards. 

  • VeeR Mini-Glass: a great accessory to view VR content on-the-go.
  • VeeR VIP Card: allows you exclusive access and download of thousands of Ultra HD VR content. 

LyfieEye200 Competitor Analysis 

Small, Lightweight and Feature-Packed

As the smallest 360 camera in the world, LyfieEye200 is lightweight and packed with features.

As Seen In:

"[LyfieEye200] offers a number of AR/VR features for Android users who want to get more mileage out of their smartphone photography adventures" - Android Community

"The LyfieEye200 will change the way people think about VR and AR as the tiny powerhouse works with LyfieRoam and LyfieStroll, a duo of innovative apps that are used to create captivating experiences on the fly." - Photography Blog

Click here for the press kit

See LyfieEye200 In Action

Credit: Beebom
 

Get HD Images & Videos

With dual fish-eye lens (>180° Field Of View per lens) and real-time image stitching, LyfieEye200 captures full 360° images, so nothing and no one is out of shot. With 3K stills and videos, the camera boasts professional resolution at an everyday price. 

 

Easily Edit & Share On Social Media

With the LyfieView app, quickly edit images, videos and upload directly to social media.

 

Livestream & Share Instantly

Livestream parties, gigs and festivals to popular 360° live streaming platforms - Facebook and YouTube.

 

Intuitive Apps

The LyfieEye200 is made to be simple to use. Once connected to an Android device launch the companion LyfieView200 app to get the perfect immersive shot. The app also features image and video editing tools so that users can create visual masterpieces.

Incredible VR Experience with Cutting-Edge AR Technology

The LyfieEye200 takes 360⁰ content to the next level with additional LyfieRoam and LyfieStroll apps. Through this we’re bringing the “Pokemon Go” experience to real life so everyone can create VR worlds and immersive AR experiences.

Virtual Reality with LyfieRoam

LyfieRoam (a separate app) captures the world in still images and builds a Virtual map from these pictures

  • Quickly build VR spaces after capturing 360⁰ images.
  • Accurately measure the distance between captured areas.
  • Easily add notes or points of interest directly into the VR space. Include text, photos, videos or hyperlinks.
  • Automatically create VR maps.

Augmented Reality with LyfieStroll

LyfieStroll (a separate app) uses video capture with Deep Learning Technology to create fully immersive environments.

  • Add notes or points of interest where you are. Include text, videos, or 3D models.
  • Upload AR data you’ve built to the cloud
  • Download to view others’ AR information from the real world.  

The duo LyfieRoam and LyfieStroll apps makes it possible for anyone to create virtual worlds and augmented reality maps, both indoors and outdoors. Scan any area, insert text, videos or 3D models to virtually ‘float’ in front of your favorite places or a specific area to augment reality.

 

How it works

 

Do More With Additional Accessories

LyfieEye200 can also be used as a 360 webcam which users connect to laptops via accessories, like LyfieFoot, to capture 360° video or livestream for longer periods of time.

 

What’s In The Box

The LyfieEye200 comes with a line of accessories to create astonishing image and video moments. Never miss an essential moment and always capture the complete 360 scene with the LyfieEye200. Please check the accessories on your perk before checking out.

  1. LyfieEye200
  2. LyfieFoot (Laptop Connection)
  3. LyfieLinkC2C (Type C Extension)
  4. LyfieC2A (USB-C2A)
  5. LyfieC2U (USB-C2B)
  6. LyfieCableC2C (USB-C2C)
  7. LyfieStand (Table Stand)
  8. Lyfie Pouch

 

PERKS:

 

TECH SPECS:

 

Early Concepts:

Our team got tremendous feedback after launching LyfieEye and delivering that to hundreds of backers. Now we're back with LyfieEye200, the culmination of cutting-edge technology and direct user feedback. Built entirely for the ease and convenience of our customers, our designs have been tested and proven. We’ve been working to perfect the technology and make sure it’s just right for you.

On Track to Deliver:

Who We Are:

eCapture Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2016 with the vision to bring beautifully designed, high-quality and accessible cameras to consumers around the world. It launched LyfieEye, the world’s first 360° camera for Android smartphones in 2017. The company continues to create ground-breaking, easy-to-use, and affordable technology products to power Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR) and spherical 360° content.

Help Out By Sharing With Friends:

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is LyfieEye200?

LyfieEye200 is the world’s smallest and lightest 360⁰ camera that captures stunning 360-degree HD images, videos and livestreams to social media. It is also designed to integrate seamlessly with its companion apps to create VR and AR experiences.

What is the LyfieEye200 compatible with? 

The LyfieEye200 is compatible with any phone that is Android 5.0 or higher and Windows 7 or higher. 

Is the LyfieEye200 compatible with Type-C connector？

Yes, it is compatible with both a micro USB and a Type-C connector.

Where will the 360° images and videos be stored？

360° images and videos will be stored directly on the user’s Android device.

How can I share the images and videos with my friends？

With one click users can share the 360° photos and videos immediately with friends via social media.

Does LyfieEye200 support livestreaming？

Yes, LyfieEye200 can livestream from the Android smartphone to popular live platforms such as YouTube and Facebook.

What is the resolution of the LyfieEye200 camera？

LyfieEye200 is featured with a resolution of 2880x1440 for images and videos.

Can I edit the photo and video before sharing？

Photos and videos can be edited within the LyfieEye200 app. 

Can I view the 360° photos and videos with VR Glass？

Yes, use VR Glass or cardboard for a truly immersive experience.

Do I need to install apps to use with the LyfieEye200？

Yes, please download the LyfieView200 app from the Google Play Store. LyfieRoam and LyfieStroll can also be found on the Google Play Store to create immersive VR and AR experiences.

How long can the battery last when recording a video?

The LyfieEye200 does not include battery inside. So it depends on the phone battery and memory.

Does it work with iPhones?

LyfieEye200 is only compatible with Android Phones. Our team is working on creating this 360 experience for iPhones so please join our mailing list to be notified.
