story:
Active on Marketplace:
https://www.indiegogo.com/products/mogo-travel-premium 

 

MoGo - Movie on the Go - x4 sharper than VR headsets

 

MoGo-Travel 1.b. versions are available in Stock !!!  Shipment each 2 weeks. Improvements:

  1. Soft tissue on nose bridge adding comfort in big nose case also makes eyeglasses resting point - soft to prevent scratching suspect 
  2. Improved cosmetic appearance of plastic as better colors matching and surface finish
  3. Improved sliding mechanism for folding/unfolding
  4. Improved headbands and face interface quality and appearance

2 types of MOGO

(1) For the smartphone and (2) with built-in screen for the pro

Both types are foldable to be taken to travels

Start watching your smartphone display's full pixel potential. 

 

 

MOGO isn't 3D or VR -
​those are dizzying with regular videos. 
No, this is Hi-Resolution 2D.
Finally. Done. Right.

 

 

MOGO: A Better Viewing Experience.

 

 

The Pixel Match-up

 

 

But WHY? A Quick Explanation

 

The Other HMDs (Head Mounted Displays) aka "was-OK-until-now-but-actually-really-low-resolution"

In classic VR displays, the screen is split into 2 halves, with a tiny screen for each eye, to recreate the sensations of 3D. In order to fit a 2D movie for each eye, the HMD's use an app that reduces the size of content 4 times. That's why it's always grainy.

 

This leaves less than 25% of the screen pixels for video content.

It also tricks your brain into thinking it's seeing something other than what it is, which makes you dizzy. Which is why most people can't even watch half a movie on them.

 

So we invented some new optical technology that displays 100% of the pixels. It sounds simple. It wasn't.  

It's called MOGO and it retains and shows you 100% of your phone's resolution.

 

How it works: An oversimplified graphic.

 

 

 

How the magic is done OR what is special in MoGo optics:

The core technology in MoGo is in oculars that are aspherical prismatic lenses making possible to see with both eyes  (in biocular way) wide screen of smartphone positioned near lenses. The oculars transform physical screen into two virtual that are enlarged, taken to far distance and shifted toward each eye correspondingly. 

This relaxes your eyes provides almoust a "natural eye-sight" which eliminates the side effects known to impact the Virtual Reality optical approach.


Currently, each ocular is single piece lens. Even though that the single piece lens optical performance is limited, it provides excellent user experience for watching movies.

To be transparent with the bakers we must also mention the known cons: there are slight chromatic aberrations and geometrical distortions accommodated by the brain for majority of the users; peripheral areas of the screen as less sharp than big central zone, however, they are used mostly for awareness  (since the FoV is 90deg) and most of users doesn't care of that.

Read comments to get more info about pros and cons.

The concept of MoGo is patent pending and there is a possibility to use multiple optical elements to resolve the cons presented above. Cinema2Go perform R&D to make the ocular also appropriate for professional Virtual Remote Desktop and not just for videos/movies watching. We continue to hold the MoGo on Indiegogo for possibility to continue getting valuable comments and advices from the bakers

 

 

All The MOGOs

MOGO Hi-Res Folding HMD | for Travel

MoGo optical innovation turning your smartphone into 2D Cinematic display by magnifying the screen x6 times. MoGo is based on aspherical-prismatic lenses  releasing the eyes and providing perception of 100” TV from 2m distance.  It easily folds to fit in your bag, so you can take your immersive pocket movie theater anywhere. 

SPEC:

  • Smartphones supported :4.7”–6”. For phones 4.7” to 5.2” - use “Small phone Insert” accessory
  • Field-of-View@5.5” phone: Hrz.90⁰xVrt.50 ⁰
  • Access to touch screen to control the phone
  • Situational awareness side windows
  • Dimensions: 20x10x5cm (11cm in unfolded)
  • Weight: 230gr (without smartphone)
  • Package: 350gr, 212x112x67mm
  • Works with any regular App/OS for watching movies, stream video or Augment reality

 

MOGO Hi-Res HMD with Built-in Screen

For developers of near eye display applications operated from PC Desktop/Notebook or to view movies from PC.

MoGo-HDMI-PC main SPEC:

  • Screen: resolution: 2K, 6" LCD. Field of View: 90 x 50 deg, about 85gr
  • Connection to PC through HDMI interface, power through mini-USB cable
  • Cables: HDMI to HDMI and USB to mini-USB will be included - length at least 1m (but we are working to get it longer to 1.5-1.6m)
  • The opto-mechanical system is based on MoGo-Travel. New plastic components accommodate LCD, HDMI-IN controller and flat cables. This module attached to MoGo front-frame instead of smartphone. The attachment is permanent for better reliability of the product.
  • Configured as PC/Notebook second screen of 2K resolution and intended for media/video applications.

Expected shipment - November 2017

MOGO High-Res HMD | for Home - last units in stock

This is the classic, the one we use ourselves in our living rooms and at the office. Same SPEC as for travel version except Foldability.

Available colors are blue and violet (send email tor info@cinema2go.biz with Order-ID and color preference)

 

 

MOGO Featured in

Can't take your laptop on a plane? MOGO is your solution for in-flight entertainment. Watch here. 

 

 

 

Pixels: Quantity Defines Quality

It's not that your phone isn't high quality,
it's that your HMD can't translate that quality for you.

*Please note that MOGO is compatible with all phones, not just these listed.

 

 

 
 

MOGO is the best companion whenever on the go

We took MOGO on an airplane and got people's first time live reactions.

 

 

 

Just Put It On.

 

MOGO is what head-mounted displays should have always been.

If you already own an HMD, you’re 20 to 25 percent of the way there. If you haven’t tried one yet, you’re in for a real treat. MOGO’s 4X Optical technology presents a breathtaking new way to enjoy anything on your phone’s screen. Its patent pending technology displays content from your phone in true cinema resolution, which feels like you’re in the 6th row of a movie theater.

We’ve merged the best of form AND function with MOGO. No dizziness, no blurs, no skimping on pixels or display quality. Made to withstand the bumps and spills of the modern lifestyle, MOGO is the virtual movie theater you’ll be taking with you everywhere.

 

 

 A Drone Flyer’s Best Friend

MOGO HiRes FPV: the Best Way to Fly

See it like you shoot it. Not just a pixelated version of it. MOGO’s optical tech takes drone flying to a whole new level of FPV.

Watch MOGO used as an FPV:

 

 

 

MOGO's amazing FPV and its side windows enable you, the experienced pilot,
to maintain a line of sight with your drone.

MOGO can also be used by photographers as a clear sun-proof second screen. With MOGO you'll be getting angles and perspectives you've never captured before...till now!

 

 

Digital Nomad? Wireless Warrior?

Get the foldable version for a more compact cinema

 

 

 

 Smartphone Access:
situational awareness, contextual control

 

MOGO is the only HMD with scrolling and menu screen access for your fingers.

 

 

Wear Glasses?

MOGO's been made to fit over them

 

 

 

 

 Features

 

Watch HQ Video Anywhere

Take your 100” screen anywhere with Travel Cinema

 

 

 

 

 

 

More Specs

 

 

 

 

 

HMD Comparison Chart

 

 

 

Rewards

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

Meet the Team

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

Q: There are so many Virtual Reality masks models. What is different in MOGO?

A: MOGO may look like other head mount displays from the outside, but it uses a completely different optical technology for 2D Movies watching and for First Person View (FPV) video streaming  applications. This provides a very different (and in our opinion, a profoundly better) user experience.

 

Q: why’s MOGO better than others?

A: We’ve narrowed it down to 2 main reasons: MOGO’s optical technology is a completely new approach that (1) provides 4x times sharper image versus VR and (2) it provides a display that doesn’t cause the standard VR side effects of dizziness and nausea.

 

Q: How does MoGo provide image display 4x time sharper than VR masks ?

A: MOGO’s optics provide full pixels to each eye all pixels on the entire screen, while the VR approach is based on splitting the screen into two smaller screens, one for each eye.. For 2D wide format video content (e.g. 16:9) VR approach needs scaling down 4 times to be fitted and duplicated on left and right parts of the VR screen.  The brain makes fusion of left and right screen parts and one single, reduced image is perceived.

 

Q: Does MOGO need special application to watch movies?

A: No, just use your favorite application to watch movies on smartphone – MOGO transforms your smartphone into a virtual cinema-theater.

 

Q: For how long can I comfortably watch with MOGO? Any safety concerns?

A: MOGO can be used comfortably and safely for a few continuous hours.

 

Q: Can I use MOGO in public? Isn’t it dangerous?

A: MOGO has Situational Awareness windows on the side. That way you’re never fully disconnected from your environment if you don’t want to be.

 

Q: What if I wear glasses? Can I use MOGO?

A: MOGO is designed for everyone, including people who wear glasses.  It easily fits over smaller glasses, and larger glasses can fit through the side windows.

 

Q: Can I control the content on the screen while the smartphone is inside?

A: Yes, MOGO is designed to enable touch screen control from the bottom.  No need to remove smartphone or to use special remote controller.

 

Q: How can I look in front of me while  MOGO is on my face?

A: MOGO is designed with an open bottom field of view, so you can just raise the head up and you’ll be able to see what’s in front of you. For FPV drones this provides a “Line of Sight” required by law.

story:
Power Vessel Mini Gaming Keyboard is the ultimate portable wireless accessory. A gaming controller, handheld optimized keyboard, bluetooth music player and hub, computer mouse and universal remote - Power Vessel covers all your controller needs in one pocket-sized device!

Black or White



You can listen music, get a call and take camera shot. and more you charge and power on/off as it is kept in this case!

 

New Updated Movie! Play game like game-console.

 


 

 

 

No dongle needed - Power Vessel boasts true full bluetooth connectivity. Three easy-to-switch function modes lets you switch between optimized gaming controls, optimized mouse and keyboard controls, or music direction controls.

The Ultimate Multi-function wireless controller



Supporting your own Audio (CSRA64215)

G mode works for PC and android Mobile/TV Box games supporting bluetooth game console. Dedicated 20 buttons and 8-directional sliding Jog will be set for your game play.

Note : This is not MFi controller, It only works on iPhone/iPad  after installing emulator as jailbreak. We recommend  you use MFi game-console only for iPhone/iPad.

Fortnite controlled with Power Vessel

M1 mode works for Mac/Windows/Linux PC, Android/iOS Mobile and TV box supporting bluetooth mouse and keyboard. Sliding Jog works as mouse controller and X/Y/B/A buttons works as directional buttons. And L1/L buttons will be set as mouse L button, R1/R buttons will be set as mouse R button.
According to size and resolution of your monitor, you can select mouse speed by clicking "Fn+space bar". This is definitely most advanced wireless mini input device.


Note : iOS originally doesn't support mouse.
But, we confirmed that iOS 13 Beta works with mouse.

M2 mode is best for iOS devices like iPhone, iPad and Apple TV. Naturally, it works for most Mac/Windows/Linux PC, Android/iOS Mobile and TV box supporting bluetooth keyboard.
Sliding Jog will be set as Directional buttons and X/Y/B/A buttons will be Home/Page Up/End/Page Down buttons. And L1/L buttons will be set as "Tab" button, R1/R buttons will be set as "Enter" button.

Especially for Apple TV, you can use music control buttons and QWERTY keys conveniently.

Separate Bluetooth CSR audio chip allows us to enjoy our own sound on playing game and watching movie. And more you can transform old speaker to latest bluetooth speaker. with built-in music controller.



All of these can be possible with just one Power Vessel.

 

Best of all, Power Vessel is compatible with a variety of devices - PCs, Macs, tablets, phones, and Smart TV Boxes. Play Fortnite on your phone, quickly answer emails on your tablet, browse around your PC, and connect easily with your streaming box!

 

Tired of search typing on your streaming app? Connect Power Vessel with your Smart TV Box and finally type in your search queries and app logins.

No more searching for letters or scrolling around. Easily find the videos and songs you’re looking for. Type all your messages, search queries, and log-in info quickly and easily with Power Vessel’s fully optimized QWERTY keyboard.

 

Power Vessel’s optimized gaming mode gives you responsive ergonomic controls for gaming. Get an edge and crush your opponents.

Send and reply to messages without skipping a beat - switch easily from calls to keyboard typing to game play. The QWERTY keyboard lets you type and text like a pro, while the call button lets you seamlessly answer (or silence) a phone call mid-game without interrupting the action.

 

Plug in your headphones and mic directly into the controller. Power Vessel’s built-in aux input lets you enjoy wireless Hi-Fi sound without bluetooth headphones. Listen to music or have quick comms with zero hassle. Say goodbye to jerry-rigged, daisy-chained skype calls for team comms.

 

Lightweight, TINY, and portable - Power Vessel weighs less than 2.5 ounces and measures 5 in x 2.5 in. Power Vessel easily fits in your pocket. Take it with you wherever you go!

Whether you’re a young professional, digital nomad, or a frequent traveler, Power Vessel adds true functionality to any situation. Play audio, send texts, type emails, control games, even trigger your phone camera - no matter your need, Power Vessel Mini Keyboard has you covered.

 

Function Mode Switcher

 

8 Directional ALPS Sliding Joystick

 

Directional XYAB Gaming Keypad

 

L&R Bumpers & Buttons

 

Backlit Optimized QWERTY Keyboard

 

Easy Modifier Keys Layout

 

Mouse Keys

 

Take a Call

 

Quick Access Selfie Button

The camera button can take photos for you from your phone. Perfect for selfies and group photos - wireless control means no selfie stick needed!

 

 

 

 

 

 

There are plenty of hardware products available on the market - new or old, cheap or expensive, simple or complicated. However, It is hard to find new marvels to meet users needs correctly.

Hear What we, FUNDIAN Team Do,
We enjoy to make all-new-hardware gadget. Most people want and need it, but it is not found on market! Then we, FUNDIAN Team create it!

Power-Vessel works like game-pad, mouse, keyboard, selfie-controller, music-controller and audio receiver. It is the world's first all-in-one input device - designed and engineered by FUNDIAN.

Felix Kim: CEO, Expert in web program development and marketing.
Matt Kim: CTO, Expert and experienced in smartphone and new technology development
Albert Kim: PM, Experienced in smartphone and new technology development
Lynn Kim: PM, Experienced in mobile technology and asian sourcing

 

 

How to help us if you don't buy Power-Vessel ?

If you can't afford to contribute to our campaign, or if you're waiting for us to be in physical shops to buy our Power-Vessel, it doesn't mean you can't help us !

Please share, comment, like and spread the good work !

Find us here and share the word ! You may use the indiegogo share tools!

Facebook

Instagram

Pinterest

LinkedIn

Thanks for your interest, we are very proud and impatient to send you the best of our products.
We believe you'll soon become our fans like us ;-)

story:
AllHub features an outstanding selection of ports to expand the functionality of your Type-C phone and laptop while keeping them charged with up to 100 watts of power. It turns your laptop into a fully-featured work machine and transforms your phone into a PC and be productive and mobile at the same time. Its built-in Qi-certified pad can wirelessly charge your devices at max 10w. It is compact designed, easy to tuck away, doesn’t take up space in your bag and helps to keep your work space neat.  AllHub is your top selection for a docking station. 

 

 

AllHub allows you to seamlessly expand the capabilities of your laptop and phone by offering additional ports for everything from monitor, projector, SD and TF card to Ethernet connectivity, headphone microphone and USB ports for your favorite peripherals such as flash drive, hard drive, keyboard, mouse and game controller. 

It has all the ports that you need in day-to-day work and entertainment, including 2 x USB 3.0, 3 x USB 2.0, 4K HDMI, 100/1000 Ethernet, SD & TF card slots, 3.5mm audio in and out and PD (Power Delivery) supported USB-C enabling a maximum power delivery of 100W to charge your device while plugged in. 

 

AllHub supports up to 100w USB-PD that can even charge larger devices, like tablets and laptops at faster speed which is perfect for an urgent battery boost while expanding its peripherals at the same time.  

 

 

 

AllHub enables you to enjoy a desktop experience while using your laptop or phone with a mouse, a more spacious keyboard and a bigger monitor by hooking up the cables to its HDMI and USB ports. 

AllHub turns your phone into a mini-desktop computer, allowing you to edit documents, send emails and transfer files conveniently.  

 

 

 

Two USB 3.0 ports and three USB 2.0 ports on AllHub allows instant sharing of photos and files between your phone/laptop and other devices. You can transfer a high definition movie in seconds with USB 3.0. 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

          

With AllHub, you can easily give presentations or slideshows from your laptop or phone on a monitor or projector. 

 

You can seamlessly stream 4K UHD video by simply plugging your phone or laptop to AllHub and a HDMI cable to your TV or A/V receiver. You don’t have to worry about draining the power of your devices as it will keep your device charged while you enjoy the big screen.

 

 

 

The Gigabit Ethernet port on AllHub allows you to plug Internet cable to your devices to enjoy a wired connection for greater speed and stability.  

 

You can plug in both SD and TF cards at the same time and copy, move and delete tons of images, videos and other files in just a few minutes. 

 

AllHub features an audio line-out and a mic line-in. Plug in your device and you can still enjoy unsurpassed sound quality and deliver crystal clear outgoing audio. 

 

 

 

 AllHub lets you fast charge your Qi-capable device at 10W/7.5W/5W based on the maximum power spec. supported by your device.

 

 With AllHub you can connect your phone/laptop to a bigger screen, use a mouse, type on a keyboard or even use a game controller to play games more easily. It enables better vision, easier targeting, more flexible control and constant charge to your device the entire time. 

 

AllHub is equipped with seven technologically advanced chips, each one of them is respectively dedicated to deliver the best function of the port. 

 

 

PERKS 

 

 

 

PROTOTYPE IMAGE

 

CAD IMAGE 

 

TEST VIDEO

 

SPECS

TEAM INTRO 

AllHub team is a startup found. As technology product users ourselves, we felt there is a dire need of a product which addresses the age old problem of frayed cables and we came up with the ground breaking design which is going to change the way people use different cables and cards forever.

Its built-in Qi-certified pad can wirelessly charge your devices at max 10w. SPECSTEAM INTRO AllHub team is a startup found. As technology product users ourselves, we felt there is a dire need of a product which addresses the age old problem of frayed cables and we came up with the ground breaking design which is going to change the way people use different cables and cards forever.

story:
Keep it safe, keep it dry, keep your iPad anywhere -- even in the shower with WeShower.

 

You can shower naked. Your iPad can't. Protect your iPad inside a waterproof case with stereo speakers. The two main goals for the project are to protect the iPad from the elements and improve the sound quality by adding the best waterproof speakers we could find.

 

Our website is currently really bare-bones, but we plan on adding to it as we go along, but for now we're focusing on getting the WeShower case ready for prime time.

Prototype Info:

The prototype in the video is made on a rapid prototyping machine, so the plastic texture and color are not final. Our current plan is to make the whole case translucent, so you can see the electronics inside and the iPad as well. Of course we'll have a nice clear screen protector (and camera protectors). The label for the power and volume controls are going to look much nicer, too. For the prototype we just used vinyl tape, cut to shape. The plan is either to texture the case itself or screen print the shapes on the case.

Why we are coming to you:

You can see in the video that we've gotten the case designed and a prototype built, but it takes serious cash (tens of thousands of dollars) to get injection molding tools made (they're basically giant chunks of steel that have the inside carved out in the shape of all the parts of the case). We know some great tool makers here in the US, so we can work closely with them during the process, and end up with a great tool set. We need your help to get this idea into production. We're working on the final circuit board designs as well, and need to make a few hundred for the first production run.

Please help us spread the word!

If you don't feel like you want to contribute, please pass along the project to someone who might.  We know there are a lot of people out there who want better protection for their iPad.  Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools to pass it along, or just email them a link.  Thanks!

How Deep does Waterproof mean?

We think there is enough air inside the case so it will float if you drop it off your boat, but we won't be sure until we test it. We think it will be pretty cool if you can use it underwater, but we aren't sure how deep. It may not matter anyway, because underwater the iPad touchscreen may not work very well, and while they are waterproof, we're not sure how well the speakers will perform underwater. Even just a few feet down, the water pressure starts to add up fast.

The Team:

Before introducing each team member, we want to emphasize how well each person on our team works together with each of the others. Even though we all have our specialties, there are some overlapping skills that help us avoid issues during the design and prototyping phase so they don't become problems in production. Our mechanical team knows quite a bit about electronics, and our electronics and firmware team know quite a bit about plastic injection molding. We have great support from the company we buy our microcontrollers from, and our team has a well established track record of making great products.

Cody Labrum - Concept

Cody has been thinking "outside the box" for years, coming up with new ideas and interesting twists on old ones. This project was inspired by a waterproof shower radio that Cody's dad brought home (many years ago). Think of all the useful things you could do during that (otherwise not-terribly-productive) time. Some of us on the team get some of our best ideas while taking a shower, and having this product would let us not only take notes about our epiphanies but also let us sketch them up while they are fresh on our minds.

Phil Dietz - Industrial Design and Mechanical

Phil has many years' experience designing home appliances, aircraft parts, and heavy industrial machinery. We can't tell you the names of the companies he works for (the lawyers can get so touchy!) but you'd definitely recognize the brands. Some of his projects can be used to build (or destroy) entire buildings, while others just destroy frozen fruit to make a good smoothie.

Martin Johnson - Electronics and Audio Amplifier

If you've used an XBee(r) radio module, you've seen Martin's work before. He did the electrical design for several radio modems, has designed wireless control systems, and a lot of other really sweet electronic devices. He is passionate about thorough testing of a design before shipping it to a customer, which results in solid products with low return rates.

Jeremy Willden - Firmware and Touch Interface

Jeremy builds embedded firmware in a very careful, structured way, resulting in code that is easy to understand, debug, and add features to. Jeremy is a big proponent of open-source software and hardware, and also put together the video for the project. Jeremy also helped design the XBee(r) radio module, and also made it fast and easy to manufacture. His production test and programming systems cranked out more than ten times as many products per hour as the previous ones without a lot of new equipment.

What Does The Future Hold?

If we knew that, we'd be day traders in the stock market. ;-) Seriously, though, after we get the first version to market, we plan to branch out and add features, more color choices, and other versions of the product. Like all good indiegogo projects, we know that you will give us good feedback and ideas to make the product (or future versions) better. The plan is to make the cover replaceable so you can have different color choices without having to replace the electronics, speakers, or the main shell. As we said above, the case will probably be translucent as well. There's a good chance will do a case with a Bluetooth interface instead of the plug-in cord, but we avoided that on the first version because it's more expensive to manufacture than the cord is.

The Plan:

Ship the smaller perks as soon as they are available.

"Start cutting metal" for the injection molding tools.

Build final circuit boards and verify that they meet our expectations (and hopefully yours).

Assemble and test several units from the production tools. We're big believers in testing and verifying everything we can so you get a quality product.

Ship finished cases to all of our supporters as soon as they are ready.

story:
Bamboo phone cases - add your own unique design!

Get a phone case that reflects your personality.

  • Eco friendly
  • Customizable
  • Unique, Your case Your way...
  • Affordable
  • Contribute to a greener planet by supporting this project (& get a customized iPhone case at the same time)..

What You Get

For each case we will include a business card sized 'go-go gadget'
tripod mount for your phone. One card in your wallet can help you get
the pictures you want in low light or for the perfect selfie.

This campaign is scalable from just a few to thousands. We just need
to know how many to make, so put your order in or contribute to the
campaign on the right! Do it... you know you want to!

We are initially focusing on the iPhone 4, 4s, 5, 5c and 5s but if you
let us know the make of your phone we can make a case for you.



From one of our beta testers:

"I have one of the early Shootcase designs and love it. Anyone who sees it comments on how beautiful it is. The wood is such a nice contrast to the harsh, electronic look of an iPhone. And my three year old can't break it - she's tried." 
Carla Davidson (Runner up for 'Canada's Greatest Know it All' Season 2. Discovery Canada Channel reality TV series)


What we need

We have equipment to prototype the cases but we need help with this to
get going into production.

Right now we have capability for small orders but want to purchase
equipment to produce more cases, for you and faster.

We will be up and running and have the first phone cases being put in
the mail by Oct 25th

The Impact

Everyone has a dream, ours is to make cool eco friendly gear.

We have a Win-Win situation here:

  • You get a personalized super cool one of a kind phone case
  • We get an opportunity to make cool things.
  • The planet does not have to suffer for us to get what we want.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean they can’t help:

I get it, being broke sucks, but if you like our Shootcase or know someone who might, then why not help us spread the word?Share our Shootcases with your friends on Social Media!
  • Facebook
  • Pinterest
  • G+
  • Email
  • And even word of mouth (yes this is the original analog version of social media and it is just as powerful so please use it!)

There are easy share buttons below the video at the top of this campaign. If you are an eco warrior help us get this much needed product out on a global scale by sharing with your networks

Thank you!


Please add $5 to your order for shipping.

story:
If we cant impact the world with what we doing, why bother to do it?

In South Africa we say "Nothing for Mahala", which means "nothing is for free".

Giving away something does not create value in what you giving. But, when you need to place some effort (no matter how small) into something, you tend to appreciate it more.

So, I developed the “Earn your Internet” where instead of having to pay for Internet, Email and Mobile Phone bills, we can help many reduce their costs, or make it 's payment, as obtainable as possible.

Why Earning is better than FREE

Sugata Mitra in his video (hole in the wall)- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRb7_ffl2D0 – explains how you can be in the middle of a metro and still be remote because of a lack of access to technology.

In Johannesburg we have areas like this in Tembisa:

Tembisa is a typical Township with over 800,000 people living in it, most on the bread line or on the poverty line. There are around 47 of these in South Africa with around 6 to 8 Million (nobody knows exactly) people living there.

But in these areas if you install something for Free, not everyone appreciates it. In Africa you need to earn a mans respect before he will give it to you. It doesn't come for Free. The same goes with projects. Free doesnt do as well as something earned, making it more valueable.

The Basic concept of “Earn your Internet”

Dont pay, rather earn you Access. Do certain activites online and get free access because of this. And then pay the diffirence if there is one.

How will we deploy the Solution?

1 - 6 months - write the solution to manage everything by integrating already made solutions, which we will purchase where required.

3- 6 months - deploy the Wi-Fi hotspots and other solutions.

Have we done this before?

These are pics from a site we did in Mellville, Johannesburg.

This is the main link out of the site:

Our equipment compared to our competitor's (much neater):

We ensure all plugs are as they supposed to be, legally wired:

What are the Benefits of this Project?

Well I think to anyone who has internet it’s pretty obvious. By providing this project I believe we can do the following:

  • We can change lives;
  • We can uplift people;
  • We can improve lives;
  • We can create futures;

I believe we can make a big difference if we focus our efforts on providing to the poor by using a smartly designed solution to create the income to support it.

But we need your help to raise $50,000

Firstly we not a BIG Corporate with deep pockets. We a smaller ISP with a heart. We care. If we can make a diffirence we will. And I believe we can.

We need to write the system and we need to hire programmers to do this.Then we need to hire and train technicians to install Wi-Fi equipment.

We forsee the costs of this project to segment in the following way:

- Development        - USD 20,000

- Server Equipment   - USD 5000

 - Wifi Equipment      - USD 5000

- Salaries- wifi          - USD 20000

Total Estimated time to have fully operational - 6 months. 

What we already have

Just so we know we dont need your money for everything. We already have around 40 RouterStation, 15 casings,  and a working Wi-Fi Authentication solution. Here is some of the boards we have ready to install (+-R 40,000):

 So, the support you giving is to help us take the next step, not startup.

How can you help us raise $50000

We need help with:

Raising Funding

Programming Assistance

Letting all your friends know.

Thanks for supporting our project.

Copyright Yhop Communications cc (c) 2012

About us: Yhop Communications is a Wireless and Wi-Fi Internet provider in Johannesburg South Africa. Our goal is to simply impact South Africa through the Internet by giving many, rich and poor, the opportunity to have a fair priced Mobile Phone, Internet and Mobile Internet Invoice every month.

story:
Control your television, hi-fi stereo, air conditioner and more, with your smartphone!

AnyRemote connects to your WiFi home network and can communicate with your devices, such as smartphones or tablets. AnyRemote is also equipped with IR transmitters, so it can also communicate with your IR devices like TVs, stereo and so on.

                  

Using our app, you will be able to communicate with AnyRemote. It will then forward your request via infrared LEDs to your devices!

AnyRemote will replace all your remote controllers with just one: your smartphone.

How does it work?

AnyRemote connects to your WiFi router, the same you already use to connect your smartphone or computer to the internet.
You will have to download the AnyRemote app to use it!
AnyRemote can automatically detect nearby devices, in case such automatic detection fails, it can also learn from your old remote.
This is the last time you need it!

You can now keep AnyRemote working for you. Your smartphone or tablet, using our app, will replace your remote! Just press a button on your screen and your smartphone will communicate with AnyRemote.
AnyRemote will then activate its IR LEDs to forward the communication to your TV, stereo and more.

AnyRemote features light emitting diodes that can communicate with your IR devices. Your TV remote, or any classic remote, uses the same technology.

AnyRemote has a 360 degree coverage, thanks to the intelligent placement of six diodes, so it can communicate with all your devices, anywhere in the room.

While AnyRemote features an high transmittance cover, it is also brushed and cleaned to lower infrared reflection. This will help increase the AnyRemote accuracy by avoiding the reflection of wrong signals.

Built-in Timer

AnyRemote features a built-in timer to start communications at a certain time.
You will be able to set AnyRemote to automatically shut down the TV at 9 PM for your children, or to start your hi-fi speakers in the morning for a warm wake-up, or even set it to automatically start your air conditioning system before you get home, so you find the right temperature when you are back.
Pretty amazing, right?

                  


Standard compliant

AnyRemote is powered via a microUSB cable - provided. We wanted to keep it clean and simple, and felt like the standard cable will best fit a smart device.


Why Indiegogo?

Our production chain is ready, we already have working prototypes, with both functionalities and form factor.

However, mass production is quite expensive and we would love to test the interest in our product. We are going to produce AnyRemote in July and we hope to deliver everything in September or October 2016, hopefully even sooner!

Risks & Challenges

AnyRemote manufacturing company has proven to be fast, reliable and safe. We already got all needed certifications to sell and ship anywhere in the world.

We don't expect to face any issue in the AnyRemote production, but in case, those might involve a delay. We will produce and deliver the product as expected, guaranteed.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like AnyRemote, please don't miss the chance to get your at a special price!

Don't forget to share AnyRemote with your friends or on your social media to help us spread the word!

story:
Hi everyone!

This is us! We are Edoardo Centioni and Elia Fornari, we study Management and IT Management respectively. We have been friends since a long time and decided to create Ulocal together last year.  
For those of you who like videos, here's the story we would like to tell you about



Ulocal is the app for travelers and it's live. It's there already, you can download it from the App Store or Google Play and you can do that for FREE!



Once you're inside, you can find the Local people that make your case. Then, you can call them or chat with them, again, for FREE, to ask whatever travel info you would like to receive.



Are you still using TripAdvisor? Really?! Aren't you tired of looking at many long reviews, with your head down while you are probably walking by something beautiful? 

Ulocal wants to be better than TripAdvisor, by letting U  truly connect with the Local people of every city. Find who U need for the city you are visiting and for the category you are interested in.



Once you have found the right Local for you, call him! Calls are FREE between Ulocal users, from anywhere in the world (without sharing your number)! You can talk to someone who is going to give you his piece of advice and you can ask him basically anything. 

Connect with people, talk to people. Finally an app that is really social!



If you are a shy one, can't talk at the moment or just don't feel like it, you can still get your travel info from Locals. Drop them a message through the chat feature!



Don't forget to make Friends along the way or simply save your favorite Locals, who could help you in your next trip. 

Remember! On the other side, U can be a Local as well. Insert the city you can give advice on and the category you know best, fellow travelers will call you or drop you a message.



What are the categories? Food, Fun and Culture, but as Locals know them, not reviews.


Why do we need you?

While we have managed to start Ulocal with our own funds, we need to make people aware that a useful app like Ulocal is out there. We need not only travelers and locals but possibly everyone using a smartphone to know. The larger the user base, the more we are, the more useful Ulocal can be to us all. We want the most people possible to share advice and travel info for every city in the world and category.

We are really excited and believe Ulocal could be the best travel app out there. We hope you are excited too and would like to help us with...

Marketing

  • We have contacted many travel bloggers already and would make their fellow readers know about Ulocal in their blogs
  • We plan on doing some basic banner advertising on other apps by using platforms like Flurry

Upgrades

  • Upgrade the SDKs we're using to the current iOS8, iPhone6 and XCode6 requirements 
  • Update our graphics to iOS8 to deliver a much better user-experience to Ulocal travelers and locals.
Costs
The minimum we are asking you for these upgrade and to start some marketing is $10k. In this case though, more is definitely better and with more funding we could add many cool features that we have already planned and do so much more marketing.

What You Get

First of all, we really hope you have liked Ulocal and find it valuable and useful to you, as a Traveler, a Local or both. 
Unfortunately we don't have a product to give you as a perk. But fortunately, Ulocal is FREE. So, what you can immediately get is Ulocal, by just downloading it for free from the App Store or Google Play.
Then, we have a few cool perks for you, that you'll hopefully find helpful both when you are or aren't traveling. 

*Reminder: our campaign is flexible. If we don't reach our goal, we'll evaluate if what we raised would be enough for some minimum advertising and app upgrading. If it's not, we'll refund you!


Risks & Challenges

Unfortunately, problems arise from almost every corner. That's why we have calculated the risks, also based on our experience with advertising Ulocal and making timely app updates with no bugs. We would like to share them with you...

Marketing

  • We already know the costs of promoting Ulocal through travel blogs and we have received many websites availability. The only risk is a short time delay in case they are promoting some other product or service.
  • Advertising on other apps through platforms like Flurry might turn out to be more costly than we expect. We have only used Facebook ads so far and we will have to test Flurry and eventually raise more funds to use it properly. 

Upgrades

  • Upgrading our app and SDKs should go smooth. We might need to do further upgrades if some new SDK comes around, for example one that improves our worldwide calling feature.
  • The time to renew our graphics will only depend on how quickly we can pull off new designs that make Ulocal both attractive and easy-to-use for our users.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like Ulocal but can't contribute, you can help us anyway. It would be awesome if you could:

  • Download Ulocal on your phone and be an active Traveler and Local.
  • Tell all your family and friends about Ulocal and make them download it too
  • Share Ulocal on the internet by using the icons below our video, on top of this page

Ulocal is here! We just need to make it a little better and let everyone know.

Thank you lots, 

Cheers!

Edoardo & Elia

story:
Short Summary

Are you concerned about the privacy of your calls / chat on Viber, Skype, Line, Facebook, WhatsApp .... or similar social / communications networks?? TALK PLACE+ mobile app does not use, store or share your personal information's ( name, mobile phone number, contacts numbers, email etc…) ensuring against any potential ( "big brother", spy agencies, boss, wife, husband  ... ) abuse and providing protection of your privacy. 

Also, with TALK PLACE+ app you could meet the people you do not know, but you share the same interest / topic with. Even if you do not know these people, you will be able to easily start a conversation, ask a question, ask for advice or information... 

Call ( for free ) Friends or search ( by topic, interest category, language, country, ages ...etc) for New Friends, find people, call & talk ( even with people you do not know ) according to common topics or interests and PROTECT PRIVACY of your conversation / chat on a mobile phone.

Here is OUR contribution to YOU and solution to stop worrying: TALK PLACE+ in Google Play  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=hr.vladimirmajer.talkplace_plus  ( require wifi/3G smartphone / tablet with android v.3.1 or higher ). Download and use it for FREE.

The application uses new, state of the art ( VoIP ) voice technology and provides the highest voice quality, one of the best on the market.  

Invest in Talk Place Corp. and become shareholder of new and exciting Advertising / Monetization Platform development project.


What We Need & What You Get

TALK PLACE+ app is finished and tested product, ready for next milestones: 

1. Build-up community  

Without investment in app marketing almost is not possible to share info about app and build users community, within 1 million apps competition. Unfortunately, app marketing is very expensive and this is the reason why we need contributions and investors. 

Our first goal is $45.000 funding. With this amount we can build up basic app community, develop few app improvement ( add conference calls, more features in chat function, server and traffic possibilities upgrade ....etc..). Choose between our perks how you can contribute / invest.

2. Advertising / Monetization Platform development:

TALK PLACE+ app is potential Advertising / Monetization Platform for personalized & high impact / relevance ads system. Talk Place app users (during registration process) build-up database with their: interest, category/subcategory, topic, country, city, gender, ages group...etc ... Perfect database for laser precision ads. Mobile ads publishers ( apps ) have very limited information’s about app users real interests. Talk Place is potential PLATFORM for targeting each individual user with extremely high precision ads, depending of user's REAL interests. So, app users will also have benefits from personalized ads platform because ads will cover user's real interests. 

For Advertising / Monetization Platform development and build - up really big users community we need $450.000 funding. If you are interested for shares in company, contact us. 


The Impact

Benefits for app users:

Free calls, people connecting ( worldwide ) and exchange ideas, advice, information ... without worry that somebody monitor your contacts. 

Benefits for investors:

Potential clients are 100’s of mobile ads advertisers networks and 1000’s of individual advertisers (companies). Today, standard mobile advertising platforms show random ads to users, without any connection between user’s real interests and ads. Result is extremely low % of users clicks on ads. Ads relevance and impact on users determinate advertisers ROI and each ads impression/click ( to/by ) user not interested for advertisers product, means direct loss to the advertiser. TALK PLACE+ app is new move & shake project in this field.


Other Ways You Can Help

You don't have money, no problem, we understand your situation but even app download ( Google play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=hr.vladimirmajer.talkplace_plus ) and sharing info about TALK PLACE+ between your friends is also contribution. Thank you.

story:
Hello, I'm Chad Clost and am writing on behalf of all of the Golden Knights families who's hockey player will be making a big push to win the International Silver Stick in 2015. Did you know that the International Silver Stick champions get their team name in the Hockey Hall of Fame?!!

As many of you may have just learned our Major Atom Golden Knights just did something extraordinary and won the "Regional" Silver Stick in Pembroke, ON. This huge win puts the boys into a pool of 6 teams which will compete for the Ultimate Minor hockey trophy "The International Silver Stick"

International Silver Stick Hockey Promoting   Citizenship  & International Goodwill

The Beginning

International Sliver Stick Hockey was the brainchild of Mr. Jack Kinsella. It germinated while attending a friendly exhibition game in Potsdam, New York between the Bantam Woodroffe Cardinals from Ottawa West and the Bantam Potsdam Golden Knights in November, 1956. After watching his son play for Woodroffe, Jack Kinsella decided a return match should be setup to promote the game and foster “goodwill” between the two countries. There was little ice available in Ottawa so Jack looked to Richmond, Ontario, just west of Ottawa.  Richmond had one of the very few indoor rinks at that time. For the full story click the link below

  http://www.silverstick.org/view/silverstick/the-silver-stick-story

Today this has become one of the largest Canada/USA Minor hockey tournaments and as mentioned our "Stanley Cup"

This is where you come in- we need your help to make the boys tournament a huge success. It's not all about winning. We simply want to make this a, trip of a lifetime,  for the team.

What We Need & What You Get

Mostly we need to raise money to pay for bus transportation, extra practice time, coaching specialists, t-shirts, pins etc. This tournament is above and beyond what the families had planned for. We are hoping through our larger family (YOU!) we can make this easy on everyone at a expensive time of year. This sort of crowd funding makes it easy for you to support the team because deep down we know you want to:)

  • We are looking to raise $5000+ to make this a huge success
  • Every dollar will go directly to the kids experience leading up to and during the tournament
  • You will get the largest smiles in Ottawa and some great Perks as per the donation buttons.
Challenges

We understand that it is an expensive time of year and only ask that you give what you can afford. All of the families involved take the responsibility of this experience seriously and want to share the joy of it with our extended friends and family.

  • We will overcome any hurdles in our way
  • We have an incredible group of parents and coaches working towards the same goal for the kids

story:
The Story...

One morning while preparing breakfast for my seven-year-old, my next door neighbor knocked on my door and said "your car's being towed." I rushed outside to find my car being attached to a tow truck. I asked the driver why my car was being taken and he informed me it was for outstanding parking tickets. I said that was impossible since I had gotten only one parking ticket in the last year. He went to his truck and returned with paperwork showing that my car had seven outstanding parking tickets, and off he went with my car. (My ex-roommate had gotten six parking tickets in nine days while I was out of town and never said a word to me. She had moved out by the time the "tow truck" incident occurred).

Five hours and $1,416 later...I got my car back.

Everyone has a neighbor that they don't really know who you wave and say good morning to on your way to your car every morning, right. Well, I have Brian. The next morning Brian finally introduced himself and told me, "I heard a parking enforcement officer request a tow truck yesterday morning, but he was told that a truck wasn't available for over an hour. I wanted to call you or knock on your door to let you know, but I didn't know where you live." If Brian had been able to contact me it would have saved me a great deal of money.


That's When NoTicketForMe Started! 

The dislike of parking tickets is universal to most of us, particularly in the larger cities around the country where we have so many more types of parking tickets to contend with on a daily basis. The most notable being the "street cleaning ticket," where all vehicles must be removed from a certain portion of the street by a specific time. For parking enforcement officials these tickets are like shooting fish in a barrel. If your vehicle should be moved by 8:00 a.m. you can rest assured that by 8:03 a.m. your vehicle will have a  parking ticket. I can't tell you how many times I have walked outside at 7:56 a.m. and have seen multiple vehicles that I know are going to end up with a parking ticket in the next few minutes. I would love to have been able to warn them.

So we at NoTicketForMe.com came up with an alternative.

 

Because...Parking Tickets Suck!!!

 

Have A Comment Or A Question That Is Not Answered Here?

Check Out Our Website:

NoTicketForMe.com

Or,

You Are Welcome To Contact Us At:

info.noticketforme@gmail.com

 

 

What You Get For Becoming Part Of The Project!!

$10 Reward  (value: Priceless) 

Your photo/avatar with link/email or favorite quote on a special "Inaugural Financier" page on the NoTicketForMe.com website that will be closed at the end of this event. • You will get our eternal gratitude and we will say nice things about you! 

 

$25 Reward (value: $50)

Everything in the $10 reward plus: 3-year membership in NoTicketForMe • 20 "PARKING TICKETS SUCK" stickers. 

$50 Reward (value: $80)

Everything in the $25 reward plus: NoTicketForMe Orange "PARKING TICKETS SUCK" T•Shirt. 

$100 Reward (value: $194) 

Everything in the $50 reward plus: (3-year membership is replaced with lifetime membership) • lifetime membership in NoTicketForMe • 5 one-year memberships for family or friends. 

$250 Reward (value: $458)

Everything in the $100 reward plus: one additional lifetime membership in NoTicketForMe (2 total) • 15 additional one-year memberships for family/friends (20 total) • NoTicketForMe black "PARKING TICKETS SUCK" coffee mug.

$500 Reward (value: $991)

Everything in the $250 reward plus: 2 additional lifetime memberships (4 total) • 10 additional one-year memberships for family/friends (25 total) • 1 additional NoTicketForMe black "PARKING TICKETS SUCK" coffee mugs (2 total) • 1 additional NoTicketForMe orange "PARKING TICKETS SUCK" T-Shirts (2 total) • NoTicketForMe pays 1 parking ticket if you happen to get one (max $75).

 


$75,000 Equity Ownership (value: Bazillions)

ALL REWARDS PLUS: 50% owner equity in NoTicketForMe.com. YEAH!! THIS IS REAL. But, there is additional information that can and will be provided prior to funding this option (Business Plan, Financial Information, etc.). If you are interested in this pledge, please contact us at: NoTicketForMe@gmail.com. Please note that a Non-Disclosure Agreement will be required prior to the release of any information.

story_txt:
The Story...
One morning while preparing breakfast for my seven-year-old, my next door neighbor knocked on my door and said "your car's being towed." I rushed outside to find my car being attached to a tow truck. I asked the driver why my car was being taken and he informed me it was for outstanding parking tickets. I said that was impossible since I had gotten only one parking ticket in the last year. He went to his truck and returned with paperwork showing that my car had seven outstanding parking tickets, and off he went with my car. (My ex-roommate had gotten six parking tickets in nine days while I was out of town and never said a word to me. She had moved out by the time the "tow truck" incident occurred).
Five hours and $1,416 later...I got my car back.
Everyone has a neighbor that they don't really know who you wave and say good morning to on your way to your car every morning, right. Well, I have Brian. The next morning Brian finally introduced himself and told me, "I heard a parking enforcement officer request a tow truck yesterday morning, but he was told that a truck wasn't available for over an hour. I wanted to call you or knock on your door to let you know, but I didn't know where you live." If Brian had been able to contact me it would have saved me a great deal of money.

That's When NoTicketForMe Started! 
The dislike of parking tickets is universal to most of us, particularly in the larger cities around the country where we have so many more types of parking tickets to contend with on a daily basis. The most notable being the "street cleaning ticket," where all vehicles must be removed from a certain portion of the street by a specific time. For parking enforcement officials these tickets are like shooting fish in a barrel. If your vehicle should be moved by 8:00 a.m. you can rest assured that by 8:03 a.m. your vehicle will have a  parking ticket. I can't tell you how many times I have walked outside at 7:56 a.m. and have seen multiple vehicles that I know are going to end up with a parking ticket in the next few minutes. I would love to have been able to warn them.
So we at NoTicketForMe.com came up with an alternative.
 

Because...Parking Tickets Suck!!!

 
Have A Comment Or A Question That Is Not Answered Here?
Check Out Our Website:
NoTicketForMe.com
Or,
You Are Welcome To Contact Us At:
info.noticketforme@gmail.com
 
 
What You Get For Becoming Part Of The Project!!
$10 Reward  (value: Priceless) 
Your photo/avatar with link/email or favorite quote on a special "Inaugural Financier" page on the NoTicketForMe.com website that will be closed at the end of this event. • You will get our eternal gratitude and we will say nice things about you! 
 
$25 Reward (value: $50)

story:
Short Summary

The Whitewright Public Library was founded in 1967 and run by volunteers. In 1978, it moved to its current location and officially became a department of the City of Whitewright and was also accredited by the Texas State Library and Archives Commission. We primarily serve Grayson and Fannin Counties (approximately one-hour north of Dallas, Texas), with no charge for a library card.

Despite being in a rural area, we have a history of using technology in the library as soon as possible. We switched from a card catalog to a computerized catalog in the early 1990s and provided public access computers by the mid-1990s, when dial-up was the only Internet option. We now have our catalog online (also available for mobile devices), public access computers with broadband, and public WiFi.

Our users have been requesting e-books, and after much research, the Northeast Texas Libraries Digital Collection is our best option. This is a consortium of several libraries using the popular OverDrive system, which has both e-books and digital audiobooks. This will allow our small library to join a much larger digital world, with access to hundreds of titles.

What We Need & What You Get

The annual fee is $1,500, with a three-year total of $4,500. A three-year contract is required to join.

At the $25 level, you will receive a thank you card from the library’s advisory board. Donors will also be listed on the library’s website and in the town newspaper.

At the $100 level, you have a choice between our library’s "Hometown Favorites" cookbook or a reprint edition of "Murder at the Corners" by G.B. Ray. The cookbook was compiled by library volunteers and supporters, with a wide variety of recipes.

"Murder at the Corners" chronicles what is referred to as the Lee-Peacock Feud in North Texas during the Reconstruction period after the Civil War. Ms. Ray was a leader in founding our library and left the printing rights to us as a way to continue supporting the library.

If we do not reach our goal, the library’s advisory board will do further fundraising locally until the goal of $4,500 is met.

The Impact

Adding e-content to the library’s collection will allow our users access from e-readers or smartphones, without taking up more shelf space, and provide a greater breadth of knowledge than we would be able to have with just our physical collection. We currently are at our limits to add new materials, so having access to older materials in e-format will allow us to have more space on our shelves.

We hope that a digital library will especially benefit our homebound users and those with vision issues. With an eReader, they can check out books from home, and make the text larger. In some cases, eReaders can read the text in an automated voice. Due to our limited budget and space, we are unable to keep our large print and audiobook collections as up-to-date as we’d like.

We have received many grants for projects in the past. Our most recent was a $4,500 grant from The Tocker Foundation to purchase print and audio/video materials for our Young Adult collection. This ends September 30, 2012, with over 300 items purchased.

Though we are a City library, we only receive funds for one full-time and one part-time employee, plus the space for the library and utilities paid. Everything else, from books to computers, must be purchased with funds raised by the library. We are unable to purchase access to e-content on our own, but your help can make it happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you’re unable to contribute, but still want to help, please share this info on social networks and personal blogs.

Also keep in mind that you can help your own local library by donating items or volunteering.

story:
*The campaign is set to flexible funding due to easier payment methods. If the campaign is not succesful all funds will be returned. So help us make it!

RAYMIO IS 360° SUN SAFETY

Four reasons to support Raymio and get your own wearable UV sensor:

  • Protect your skin and eyes: UV radiation causes permanent damage

  • Worry less and learn: know exactly when & how you should protect yourself

  • Help protect others: share and care with friends and family through our app

  • Donate your exposure data to cancer research: science needs knowledge!

You probably know that ultraviolet (UV) radiation causes premature aging of your skin. But did you know that sunburns are a serious health risk? When your skin peels off after a sunburn, it’s a part of your largest organ shedding off to avoid that DNA damage within it results in skin ailments like melanoma. As you accumulate exposure, risks increases - even if you don't get sunburned. You want to keep your UV levels with a healthy range. If you live an active lifestyle, monitoring this represents a serious challenge. That’s why you need Raymio!

We know that getting sun safety right isn’t easy. That's why we’ve created the world's most advanced UV wearable.

YOUR DAY WITH RAYMIO



Raymio registers your UV A+B exposure and offer personalized protection according to your skin type. It helps you prevent excessive exposure which can cause sunburn and other UV related discomforts by advising you when to put on sun lotion, seek shade and which types of clothes you should wear.

COFINANCED BY THE DANISH GOVERNMENT 


For every dollar you support us with, the Danish Market Development Fund gives us three!

We have to report to the fund until the final product is developed and delivered to you. This is your guarantee that we will deliver if we reach our goal!

Raymio has been thoroughly vetted: our participation in this programme requires rigorous screening of our company and product development.  

We're also supported by Innovation Fund Denmark and the Danish Foundation For Entrepreneurship.


HOW IT WORKS

The Raymio App will send you a notification on days when the UV index is high and remind you to wear the device. 

Raymio store data and send continuous updates about your sun exposure to the mobile app throughout the day. To ensure accuracy, the unit utilizes internal directional sensors to estimate the sensors’ position in relation to the sun. We call this feature 360° Sun Safety. To create a fail-safe, we have partnered with the Danish Meteorological Institute, who provides us with UV index satellite data. Even if your Raymio sensor doesn’t face the sun, it will not presume that you are not exposed to sunlight: our algorithms will compensate for temporary drops in input or a downturned position.


MEET OUR CTO 

THE RAYMIO COLORS


LIVING WITH RAYMIO

Do you know the feeling of sunburn? Have you spent an afternoon on the beach only to end up with skin peeling? Or did a high UV index ever catch you off-guard during travel, on your outdoor exercise routine or your daily commute? Is your skin extra UV sensitive? How about your family or friends? 

Raymio is a great tool for people who wish to take care of their skin while enjoying an active lifestyle. It is a situational awareness aid: We want to help you with actionable advice. It’s also a biometrics tool where you can track your exposure history. 

Raymio provides information that help you become more familiar with your own skin and the effects the sun. The wristband keeps track of your UV exposure and keeps you updated. The app lets you keep track of groups, your friends and your family. Raymio app also contains forecasts, statistics and advice on sun safety. It includes social features, where you can connect with your friends and family in order to help each other keep healthy UV exposure levels. These features are of course optional: you only share the data you want to. 

You can also donate your anonymized data to science!



DIRECT ACTIONABLE FEEDBACK

We want to provide you with an elegant aid for everyday sun safety with minimal hassle. You don’t need to check your phone to use Raymio: the wearable works autonomously and signals you with a LED when you need to take action. You can take Raymio swimming and stay informed of your exposure.

360° SUN SAFETY

By taking advantage of directional sensors within the unit, Raymio can provide a much more accurate estimate of your UV exposure level. We’ve developed an algorithm which enables Raymio to use UV index forecasts and measurements of your personal UV exposure throughout the day to tailor advice to you. A gyrometer and an accelerometer provides additional data points: Raymio will at any time know which way the wristband is turning in relation to the sun. This enables the unit to calculate a more realistic estimate of your UV exposure - not just how much UV exposure the sensor in the wristband has picked up. We call this feature 360° Sun Safety. 

ALL SKIN TYPES 
Raymio caters to all skin pigmentation variants. We use the Fitzpatrick Scale - the official standard numerical classification schema for human skin color - to classify your skin type and predict how it reacts to UV radiation. Learn from your past through statistics.

GROUP PROTECTION
A wristband can be used by an individual or by a group of people with different skin types. A family can use a wristband each, each keeping track of their own exposure and the exposure of family members by merely adding them as friends. The family could also add themselves as three separate users, using UV data from a single wristband. In the application main screen the family members would have separate profiles. The sensor unit can be removed from the wristband and put anywhere. This could be useful for group settings. It also allows you to change wristband.

CEO Casper with his niece and nephew.
 

THE RAYMIO APPLICATION 

The applications is stacked with features! We strive to give you the greatest possible utility of your data.

PERSONAL ADVICE

If you spent too much time in the sun yesterday. Raymio will be aware  and make sure to tell you to take care. Or maybe your hair has started thinning? Let Raymio know, and it’ll be able to inform you that you might want to put on that hat 30 minutes before you’d otherwise would. Or maybe you’re out running when the sun is at its highest. Raymio will remind you to use sunscreen and adequate clothing.

TRACK YOUR BEHAVIOR

Seeing your exposure statistics can be a learning experience. Maybe you are exposed to UV radiation during the afternoon without realizing it. Or maybe you generally sit too long outside on summer days. With Raymio, you’ll know and be empowered to take action accordingly. You can also compare stats with friends and family, learning from each other’s experiences.

CARING FOR FAMILY AND FRIENDS
Get better at sun safety with your family and friends. Share your profile, send notifications to remind others to apply sunscreen or seek shade. Your friends can notify you too, if you wish. Helping each other is a great behavior change strategy.

GET TO KNOW MORE: THE SUN LIBRARY
Would you like to learn more about sun safety? What does ‘factors’ in sun lotion mean? How does UV affects toddlers and children? Or maybe you’re interested in learning more about your own skin type and how it’s affected by the sun. Delve into the sun library and get to know more.

BACKER’S APP: YOUR APPLICATION - YOUR NEEDS


CROWDFUNDING HARDWARE: WE ARE PREPARED


Crowdfunded hardware projects often struggle to meet delivery dates and meet problems in scalability. We know how frustrating this is for backers: that is why we have set up our entire supply chain in advance. We have +25 years production and shipping experience available in our team. So we are well prepared to handle our backers’ rewards. 

SPECIFICATION DETAILS 

  • Wristband and sensor unit measures 220mm (8.6”) in length and 12.2mm (0.48”) across. The width is between 3.0mm (0.12”) and 9.3mm (0.37”). It weighs approximately 30g (1.05 ounces). 
  • The unit contains a UV sensor, an accelerometer and a gyroscope. 
     The wristband is made from thermoplastic elastomers (TPE) with adjustable length. It’s non-allergic and comfortable to wear. It is waterproof down to one meter. You can take Raymio swimming! 
  • The rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery takes about an hour the recharge. One charge powers 48 hours of expected normal usage.
  • A connector for recharging is included. 
  • The unit works in temperatures of -10°C to 40°C (14°F to 104°F)
  • Bluetooth® Smart connects unit and app wirelessly. 
  • The app is compatible with Android 4.3 and later versions (Bluetooth required) plus iOS 7.1 and later versions on iPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S, 6 and 6 Plus. 
  • The device will be CE labelled and have certifications for Bluetooth, EEE and IEC IP67.
     


MEET THE TEAM 

We are a Copenhagen-based Danish startup company. A year ago we were four student entrepreneurs from The University of Copenhagen with an Arduino board and a simple application prototype. We have since partnered with seasoned business/technology developers and a great NYC-based industrial design team. Each bring a wide range of experience, enthusiasm and professional networks to Raymio. We’re working hard to bring Raymio to you!

On LinkedIn: 

CEO Casper Arbøll
CTO Kjeld Lercke
COB Michael Mathiesen
Kristian Lundager
Christian Gabriel
Kristian Thøgersen
Mads Hansen
Michael Schafler


DEVELOPMENT PROCESS

2015:

AUGUST: 3D printed prototype. Basic functions ready in alpha application.

SEPTEMBER: Crowdfunding! Backers’ beta app ready for Android. 

OCTOBER: Backers’ beta app for ready for iOS. Backers can give feedback to the development team.

NOVEMBER: Update on Raymio App based on Backers feedback

DECEMBER-JANUARY: Golden sample from production will be shown on Raymio web site. Moulds are now ready and production get ready for mass production after initial productions runs to optimize production.

2016:

MARCH (expected): Raymio ships to backers!



We hope you would like to support us! We would certainly like you to be wearing Raymio in 2016. And please share our campaign with friends and family! Together we can get sun safety the spot it deserves.

Producing a hardware product is not easy and unforeseen risks can occur. Plenty of crowdfunded electronic products have certainly gone off-track in the manufacturing phase. We’re doing our best to anticipate risks. Raymio will be a sophisticated piece of technology and sometimes even the big players mess up in creating and scaling hardware products. But we have two huge advantages. 

Our technical team is led by senior professionals with more than 25 years experience in developing and manufacturing state of the art electronics. 

We have entered a manufacturing agreement prior to the Kickstarter campaign. This means that we won’t be spending precious time finding a manufacturing partner after a successful crowdfunding round. Our engineers have been working with the manufacturer multiple times over the past decade and can guarantee their timeliness and production quality. 

Our match-funding agreement with The Danish Market Development Fund means that crowdfunding funds will be amended with a substantial amount. This ensures that we will not run out of funds before we have delivered rewards to our backers.

Press

Contact: hello@raymio.com

PLEASE NOTE: 
Raymio is not a medical device and should not be used to diagnose or treat any medical condition. Consult your doctor for prevention, diagnosis and treatment.
