story:
Featured on the Austin Business Journal:

 

Austin startup's goal: To be a national phone company, prolific donor > 


The Power of VoiceWorks

The mobile phone has become an essential utility and for many of us, one of our highest monthly expenses. Yet virtually none of us are happy with our service and feel the pain each month.

If you could keep your plans, upgrade your service experience and enjoy a sense of doing good with each bill you pay, why wouldn’t you? That’s the key to VoiceWorks and helping nonprofits. VoiceWorks offers state-of-the-art phone service at the same cost your supporters are paying now.


With VoiceWorks, you donate 10% of every monthly bill to the charity of your choice with no extra cost to you! VoiceWorks helps our customers feel good with each bill they pay. And our charitable partners enjoy a sustained donation stream. Imagine a bill that thanks you for your contribution to changing a life.  That’s the VoiceWorks difference.

For customers, helping worthy nonprofit organizations has never been easier, or as easy on their bottom line. With VoiceWorks, they’ll be able to give more by simply using a mobile phone.

Our subscribers enjoy the exact same plans and rates as their traditional providers, but with VoiceWorks, they’re making a positive contribution to the nonprofit they believe in.

Our goal is to create a win-win for nonprofits and customers who support them, while providing them the tools and the funding so they all can make a difference every day.


A special thanks to our first partner:


How does VoiceWorks Mobile make it so easy to donate?

VoiceWorks operates as a Mobile Virtual Network Operator, or an MVNO, which provides mobile phone services by leasing air time at wholesale prices from major carriers. As an MVNO, VoiceWorks Mobile (VWM) does need to invest in its own infrastructure to provide mobile phone services. As a MVNO, VWM delivers all the activities just as traditional mobile service provider, without the cost of owning the radio network and associated infrastructure.

Without these enormous maintenance, research and development costs, VWM can streamline operational costs and reallocate profits into donations.

Additionally, traditional mobile network operators (MNOs) allocate large portions of their operational expenses for massive, nation-wide advertising campaigns required to attract new subscribers. Instead, VWM creates close partnerships with non-profit organizations and leverages their customer base to increase subscriptions. The non-profit organization (NPO) is highly motivated to add value and provide their users with an essential services that provides a reliable monthly revenue stream. Likewise, members of the non-profits have a huge incentive to support their NPO simply by switching an essential utility -- their mobile phone service -- and making a monthly contribution without impacting their existing budget. Plus, at the end of the year, subscribers use the 10% contribution as a deduction on their income taxes.

Most importantly, VoiceWorks adheres to a fundamental corporate philosophy: turn profits into charitable contributions that do good for many instead of enriching a few individuals.

That's the radical new way of doing business that makes VoiceWorks so unique: it's not about making a profit, it's about making a difference and helping NPOs one monthly bill at a time.  


What We Need & What You Get

Our founder & CEO, Reid Moody, developed a working prototype, created the business model, and established the initial relationships with MNO carriers to provide the services. But now we need help to turn the idea into a fully functional MVNO. By meeting our initial goal of $100,000 we can:

  • Complete our web site
  • Integrate e-commerce, provisioning, billing and support systems
  • Strategic hires 
  • Purchase SIM cards
  • Integrate multiple national carrier networks   


Feel good about donating and donate for good!

Sure, the act of giving is reward enough, but hey, we all like to get a little something in return, right? So, as you help us help others, here are some incentives to get you started:

$10 Mini-founder. All donor's names are going to go on the Founders' Wall in our new office. Come by when we're open & we'll give you the tour. 


$25 VoiceWorks Supporter. Add a cool, custom-made VWM digital wallpaper set for your phone. And of course, you're on the Founder's Wall. 

$50 Early Bird. All the benefits of the First Adopter Level at half the price. 


$100 First Adopter. Founder's Wall, VWM digital wallpaper, AND your donation level increases from 10% per to 11% once you become a subscriber.  Also, you get the one-of-a-kind, can't get it anywhere else, limited edition "First Adopter" VWM t-shirt. 


$250 Solid Supporter. Founder's Wall. Digital Wallpaper. T-Shirt. Plus we increase your monthly donation to 12% at no additional cost to you. PLUS, once you become a VWM subscriber, you can apply your donation to your monthly service plan. Now this is getting really cool!

$500 Seriously Single Supporter. Get all of the above, your monthly donate goes up from 10% to 13%. And check this out: you can use up to 50% of your donation to buyout an existing contract. And you can use the other 50% toward the purchase of a new phone. That's up to $250 to make switching painless, AND $250 towards buying the coolest new phone or for your monthly service plan. Wow, you are getting serious now!

$1000 Multiple Multitudinous Supportage. Ideal for a couple of people, or just yourself. You get: Founders Wall + Digital Wallpaper + T-Shirt + (are you sitting down) up to $500 to buyout your old contract. PLUS up to $500 to purchase phone (or phones if you've got some friends working together). PLUS whatever is left over you can apply to the monthly service plan payments. 

$2500 Family Friendly Fanatics. You may call it a tribe, your clan, the hood, but at this level, these are some seriously nice rewards. Ok, you know you're a Founder, you get the cool wallpaper, the awesome T-shirt, but now you're really making a serious impact. With a your monthly donation jacked up to a full 14%, 

$5000 Corporate Donor. Hey, at this level, we'll call you and set up a customized service package for your group. Think free phones, generous data plans, and even buying out contracts for up to 20 people in your company. 

$5000 Don of Donators. Yeehaw! Woowho! Yeowzir! You're into some serious donations here, and we can't thank you enough. But we'll try. Not only do you get the wallpaper, the T-shirt, but you'll get a special shiny new plaque place prominently in a position of great honor on our Founder's Wall. Your donation level jacks all the way up to the elite 15% level, you can use up to 50% to buyout contracts and the other 50% to purchase phones & use whatever is left over for your monthly service payments. But here's the real kicker: we'll fly you out for an exclusive meet 'n greet of the VoiceWorks crew just to say thank you in person. And show you that cool plaque. 


"Mother of all Donations" (MoaD) -- for those who really want to make an impact and just make a straight donation, we created a few special donation-only levels:

$2500 MoaD - During the 3rd year of operation (months 25 - 36), VoiceWorks subscriptions growth will be out of sight! And at this level of donation, you pick 1 month of the year and we will donate 1% of all user revenue to the charity of your choice. 

$5000 MoaD - by the 4th year of operation (months 37 - 48), VoiceWorks subscriptions will still be growing! And at this level of donation, you pick 1 month of the year and we will donate 1% of all user revenue to the charity of your choice. 

$10,000 MoaD - by the 5th year of operation (months 49 - 60), VoiceWorks subscriptions will still be out of sight! And at this level of donation, you pick 1 month of the year and we will donate 1% of all user revenue to the charity of your choice. It's the gift that multiplies. 


The Impact

To put it simply and succinctly, we want to make a very serious impact and change the idea of giving and corporate responsibility. We want to demonstrate that corporations can work for the good of the community. And that's what makes VoiceWorks so personal -- the individual users gets to choose how corporate profits (their own 1%) gets used. You're truly thinking globally and acting locally. 

With every subscriber, VoiceWorks creates a steady revenue stream that your NPO can rely on and put to good use every month. Your good deeds lets your NPO do the good work they do the best. 


We're not Stopping at Donations

We dedicate a minimum of 10% of our profits to our partners, but we don’t stop there.  VoiceWorks also wants to provide to nonprofits:

  • Turn-key marketing services to our non-profit partners
  • Strategic partnerships
  • Job placement
  • Training

We understand that nonprofits are stretched and time spent seeking funds takes time away from doing good. We hope to align our public relations efforts with those of the nonprofits to help amplify their causes. And, we leverage our call centers as a means to help our partners provide job training and placement for their clients. 

For us, it’s all about making a big difference every day.

story:
A GRAPHIC DESIGN COMPETITION


Cropped was formed over a year ago as an event gathering graphic designers in our area to come together and celebrate all things design without an agency-inspired agenda. What started as an idea between friends over a couple of beers, now is a popular event for both designers and non-designers to get together for some friendly competition.


But Wait, What Exactly is CROPPED?


Cropped is a 2-3 hour competitive event where four graphic designers will go head-to-head in a single elimination, winner-takes-all, design challenge. Each round consists of a mystery light box containing images, a font and a theme unknown to the challengers. The designers will get 30 minutes to create a composition utilizing all the mystery elements to reflect the theme. It is then up to the audience to decide whom has BEST met the challenge to move on...and who gets CROPPED!

This is deadline driven design at its finest. Audience members are invited to come cheer on their favorite designer as he or she puts all of their talents and tricks to the test. Designs are projected live as the designer is working so the audience can watch their every move.

So far these competitions have been very low-budget and funded entirely out of our own pockets. We're asking the Indiegogo community to support us in helping us reach our goal of getting better equipment, better prizes, and a better stage presence to entertain bigger crowds. We want to host Cropped competitions that will make an impact. We're holding off on the pyrotechnics and backup dancers for now, but we'd really like to purchase a couple of dependable projectors and screens that can be moved from location to location without relying on duct tape to secure our equipment in place.


The Impact

While we're only asking for a small funding goal for better equipment and a better stage presence, we also believe there is room to grow Cropped into a bigger show that could eventually be taken on the road. The outpouring response we've received so far for this event tells us that there is a big enough interest to take Cropped to other cities, and connect designers of those cities in friendly competition of their own.

Perks*

We have some fun perks for different levels of contribution. Your inner design nerd will appreciate some design swag for your office or home.

There is a larger contribution available to guarantee Cropped will be performed in your city. We supply all the equipment, but we'll work with you to secure a location and collaborate on promotion of the event.


* Visual representation of perks offered are not necessarily how they will look (color, design, shape, etc.), but it's the best we can do for now.

Other Ways You Can Help

Check out the DSGNX Facebook page to see past CROPPED events and spread the word.

We want to bring Cropped to your city. Please share this campaign with other designers, as well as, non-designers who might support making that dream a reality! Thanks for checking out our campaign. Cheers!

story:
I'll keep this short and sweet. A member of our guild who is a long time WoW player has found themselves without a P.C. due to circumstances beyond their control. This player is a kind person, always willing to help others, even going as far as creating new accounts for recruit a friends for others and paying for the server and faction changes of others they have just met.

This is a chance to help one of the good people out there with a showing of support. If its $1 or the full $1,000, show that the community can give back when one of its own is in need.

This campaign will go towards purchasing a new P.C. for the player.

story:
PPLD's 21st Century Library

Pikes Peak Library District’s 21st Century Library is designed to address the changing needs of our community, bringing the latest technologies to a new regional library, Library 21c. Opening June 2014, Library 21c will mitigate the ever-increasing digital divide that continues to widen across our society, placing many members of our community at a competitive disadvantage. 

While offering traditional library spaces, Library 21c will feature innovative library space such as a creative computer commons area, a business and entrepreneurial center, a 400-seat community meeting room and theater, a career assistance center and two maker-spaces.

MakerBot Replicator Z-18

With the MakerBot 3D printer, ideas and concepts become a reality! Adding the Z18 to the line of the library's existing smaller 3D printers, will allow the library's patrons to create quality, extra-large, industrial prototypes for various types of businesses and professional uses. Located in one of Library 21c's maker-spaces, PPLD staff at Library 21c will engage patrons of all ages, introducing them to the technology of 3D printing and building real world skills. 

To learn more about the MakerBot Replicator Z-18 click here.

The MakerBot Replicator Z-18, with storage cart and filament case, totals $9,300.

If campaign funding is not achieved, all funds raised through Indiegogo will be designated toward the purchase of the MakerBot. The PPLD Foundation will continue efforts to raise the funds needed to bring the MakerBot Replicator Z-18 to Library 21c.

The Impact

With your donation, PPLD will provide quality 3D printer services to our patrons who are developing concepts to further convey their ideas for products, businesses and other creative visions. Offering this innovative service will connect everyone in our community to cutting edge technology and more importantly, opportunity.

Thank You!

Every donation is greatly appreciated by PPLD and our community. Your donation has the power to transform visions and dreams into reality!

Not able to help financially today? You can still greatly assist the campaign by spreading the word about our efforts and Library 21c by sharing on Facebook and Twitter!

Risks and Challenges:

Our company established a good relationship with manufacturing partner in Shenzhen, who has been cooperate with us for a long time. We also have a warehouse in Hong Kong to offer better service. therefore manufacturing and shipping risk is at a minimum.

Reward & Shipping 

We will be sending out a survey to learn your selection and other information.

We provide free shipping service in over 70 countries (North Americans/Europeans/Asias/South Americans)  and cities. We will use different mailing services to different countries to make sure that each customer can be receiving our product in due course.(7-15days delivered to North American Countries/European Countries, 15-35days to South American countries)

Follow Us

Please like and follow our Facebook, Twitter and Instagram and share our project to your family and friends to let them enjoy our products.

Co-operate With Us?

If you interest to become a distributor or seller of Cybri Cable, please do not hesitate to contact us at sales@kimdecent.com

For the Press

If you're looking for hi-res pictures, Please visit our website.  If you need to get in contact, feel free to email us at info@kimdecent.com.  

Backing Cybri Cable is quick, easy and secure!

story:
SIMpro is a device that will make carrying two phones or switching SIM cards obsolete. Anyone who has ever traveled or had to have two numbers active at once knows the hassle. Carrying two devices or switching SIM cards can lead to problems like:   

“How do I carry two phones?”                                                           

“Where do I keep my other SIM card to ensure I don’t lose it?”         

"How can I use data on all devices and at all times?"

That is why we created SIMpro.

SIMpro is the future of technology. It cases a Dual-SIM adaptor with data connection that can manage two active numbers via an exclusive iOS App in a fashionable and stylish way. It can even use Bluetooth to connect to your iPod or iPad and turn them into a smartphone! SIMpro is only the size of a credit card so it is portable and convenient for you to use anytime and anywhere.

Forget about setting up hotspots and blocked tethering. With SIMpro, you can connect to network at anytime and anywhere.

Simply put your second SIM card into SIMpro, connect it to your device via Bluetooth and you are ready to use two numbers at once.

Connect encrypted Bluetooth with SIMpro, your phone can enjoy data connection in a private way! No other people can access your network. 

SIMpro supports phone call recording so all phone chats can be recorded and you won’t miss out any phone calls or important information. Ideal solution for business and memorable moments.

There’s no need to worry about replacing the batteries. SIMpro is built with a lithium-ion battery that lasts up to 5 days and averages 4 hours with constant use.

With SIMpro, you can even turn your iPod or iPad into a smartphone! Just download the app and connect to your device via Bluetooth. No jailbreak required. SIMpro is compatible with both iOS and Android devices. 

Designed with simplicity and minimalism in mind, SIMpro mirrors the shape of a credit card and comes in two basic colors - white & black. This allows you to pair it with any phone and any accessories you already own.

The App has been designed to be user-friendly. This means it is simple, easy-to-use, intuitive and easy on the eyes. It features big buttons and icons. It follows the design you are used to from Apple iOS and its apps. We made sure SIMpro and its app provide you with a simple setup and all the convenience you can wish for.

Simple - Easy to use with the exclusive SIMpro App. Connect Anytime, Anywhere.

Convenient - Its size and shape enable you to carry SIMpro with you everywhere you go.

Stylish - The design of SIMpro can match any iOS device or accessories you already own.

INDIEGOGO SPECIAL WALLET: This special leather wallet is specifically designed for your SIMpro and is equipped with a safe pocket. It can keep your SIMpro and valuables safe. 

 

It all started with a simple idea: to design and produce a useful and innovative product, that will solve problems of the iPhone user. SIMpro ended up being our first and most valuable idea, as we saw many use cases in today’s society.  

The biggest challenge was to design a small and convenient product, which would keep a high performance and capacity standard. On the other hand we needed to design the app and its UI with the “user-first” focus, to make it very simple and user friendly. Additionally we wanted to make a product that business and personal users would be happy to own and carry around.  

We spent a lot of time researching existing products in the market, testing and designing the SIMpro. We compared SIMpro with other independent products, from battery to outer shell materials, from SIM card slot to Apps UI. We have truly tried our very best to improve and upgrade what is already on the market.  

And finally here it is. A masterpiece that is powerful, efficient, convenient and suitable for business or personal use.

Our team is not big, but it is complete. It comprises of designers, software developers, researchers, hardware engineers, and other staff with their professional skills in different areas. We’ve been a player in our industry for more than 20 years. Our aim has always been to focus on product innovation and improve the way we experience day-to-day life.

Creators of SIMpro: Gary Fu and Marshall Ho

We have been working on the SIMpro for more than one year. After months of prototyping, we now have a solid and tested design samples ready for production. We figured out our path to the market, from material suppliers all the way up to the manufacturing, and building a team that can execute on our promises.  

To finally take the last few steps - getting into mass production to make you convenience in connecting anytime and anywhere. If you can, please support our campaign and spread the word!

Last but not least, thank you to our brilliant producers eMotionLAB helped us finish all the video and art designs.

Thank you to THE Contact STORE provided the location for filming. 

Risks and challenges

We can't make a high quality finished product without strong relationships with our suppliers and manufacturing partners. We have already built the foundation with our professional experiences. There will be challenges as we move into larger scale manufacturing of a mass market device and are building a comprehensive team of mentors, consultants, and industry advisers to help guarantee our success.

Our supporters will continuously be informed on the progress we're making towards delivering their order. If an unforeseen issue poses a potential delay to our timing, then we will be transparent in our communication to the people who are making our growth a reality.

The passionate supporters who support SIMpro here are our most important asset. Thank you for believing in us! We will do whatever it takes to exceed your expectations!

FAQ

1. Why SIMpro uses Bluetooth for connection with iOS devices but not Wi-Fi?

Our Engineers decides to use Bluetooth instead of Wi-Fi because it consumes less power and it’s easier to switch between devices and connect to any iOS device.

2. Why SIMpro uses Bluetooth 2.1 instead of Bluetooth 4.0?

As Bluetooth 2.1 is the most popular variant, it is suitable for support calls, SMS, and data connection with any iOS device.

3. Does SIMpro support Android?

SIMpro is targeting on iOS devices, as iOS users have greater demand on SIMpro.

4. Does SIMpro support SMS and data?

SIMpro can fully support SMS function as well as data connection.

5. How to switch on the data connection of SIMpro?

Simply turn off the iPhone's data, then turn on the VPN of SIMpro to enjoy the data connection!

6. Does SIMpro support LTE?

Both 4G and 3G SIM cards work with SIMpro.

7. How many simultaneous connections does SIMpro support?

SIMpro can only connect to one device at once due to security concerns.

8. What frequency does SIMpro support?

SIMpro supports WCDMA 850/ WCDMA 2100/ GSM850,900,1800,1900.

9. Which type of SIM does SIMpro support?

SIMpro supports Micro SIM card. Nano SIM users can use SIMpro with an adapter (not included).

10. How long does SIMpro battery last?

SIMpro's built-in lithium-ion battery can last up to 5 days, and 4 hours with constant use.

11. Can SIMpro app compatible with both iOS and Android?

The SIMpro app can fully compatible with both iOS and Android.

story:
As seen on:

Digital Trends: "An affordable 360 solution by using the camera tech already inside the iPhone."

The Verge: "There’s a new 360-degree lens you can attach to your iPhone to record photos and videos."

Stuff: "The little gizmo’s proprietary lens system uses your iPhone’s existing camera rather than an external one, so all you need to do is clip it on."

 

Introducing Fishball

It all started when three friends and classmates wanted a simple way to capture 360° photo and video, without extra hassle and without breaking the bank.

That solution didn't exist. So, they created Fishball.

Fishball is the only device of its kind that lets you capture in full 360 degrees, using your phone's powerful rear camera. It's ultra-portable and super simple to use. If you can record with a phone, you can record with Fishball.

Best of all, it uses special optics, not electronics, so there's nothing to charge, no memory cards to buy, and no wireless pairing required. Just clip it on and shoot.

 

Fishball's proprietary lens system utilizes your iPhone's existing camera to capture every angle and every detail of your moments. And since everything is captured directly on your phone and not on a separate memory card, you can instantly share to platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Vimeo—basically any platform that hosts 360° images and videos.

 
 

 

Features

As a bonus, Fishball is future-proof and works across multiple phone models. So the next time you upgrade your iPhone and its camera, Fishball upgrades along with you!

Fishball is compatible with iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, and the brand-new iPhone X.

(Android users: please help us make this campaign a success, so we can use your input on what models to support next here - http://bit.ly/FishballAndroidSurvey)

Stretch goal

Fishball is perfect for travel, nature, city viewing, concerts, and any other moment you'd love to re-experience or share. 360° content makes you feel as if you're truly experiencing it, even if you couldn't be there the first time.

The ability to share moments with loved ones also makes Fishball a perfect gift. Do you live apart from loved ones, but want to still feel like you're right there? Send them a Fishball!

Got any adventures coming up? Fishball will ship by this coming summer to make sure that you capture every moment with the full detail it deserves. Help us show the world the benefits of 360° content, and prove that good ideas don't always mean more electronics!

Back us today and let's make Fishball a reality, together. Thank you!

 

How Fishball Works

Fishball is hands-down the easiest, most hassle-free solution for 360° content. Just clip it on and it works. Less worry. More recording.

And more fun.

 

Step 1: Clip Fishball on

 

  • A specialized latch keeps Fishball secure on your phone.
  • A single Fishball is compatible with iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, and X!

 

Step 2: Hold Fishball Up

 

  • Use the free Fishball App for iOS.
  • No need to aim! Fishball captures it all, so you just worry about having fun.

 

Step 3: View and Share Instantly

 

  • Upload from your phone's photo album to Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Vimeo, and more.
  • View with the free Fishball app, or any other VR app and headset.

 

The Fishball App

The Fishball App is free to download on iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, and the new iPhone X. Simply launch it and snap 360° photos and videos just like you would using your regular camera app.

Our proprietary stitching software works with Fishball's optics to create perfect 360° scenes, viewable instantly on your phone.

 

Benefits of 360°

 

Fishball vs. 360° Cameras

Fishball vs. the Competition

Fishball is clearly the superior value compared to 360° cameras on the market. But how does it stack up against another lens option?

Fishball - Early Bird Price ($49)

  • Compatible with iPhone 7 and newer, including iPhone X.
  • Captures 360° photos and videos.
  • Seamless stitching.
  • One model fits all (both regular and Plus models)
  • 4.4 x 3.6 x 3.4 cm; 30g 

Competing Lens - Early Bird Price ($44)

  • Compatible with iPhone 7 and newer. NOT iPhone X.
  • Warped stitching due to misaligned front and back cameras (parallax).
  • Need a separate model for “Plus” model phones.
  • 8.3 x 5.3 x 3.4 cm; 39g (for regular model)
  • 9.3 x 5.3 x 3.4 cm; 40g (for Plus model)

The advantages of Fishball are clear.

 

Perks

Share and earn — it's easy!

Earn additional rewards by referring your friends, up to as much as four free Fishballs. The more you share, the more you earn.

Here's how:

1. Log in to Indiegogo — you must be logged in to receive credit for your referrals. There's no need to pay for anything — and if you don't have an account, simply create one here.

2. Visit our Fishball Indiegogo campaign page, where you’ll now find your unique link to the right of our video.

3. Start sharing! Use your link to share our Fishball campaign on social media, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, whatever you can think of.

4. When anyone clicks on the special link you share, they are taken to the Fishball Indiegogo page and a "Referral" is credited to you. If people you refer end up backing Fishball, you get stuff!

For detailed instructions, read the Indiegogo guide here.

 

Technical Specifications

 

Meet The Team

The three co-founders met as UC Berkeley-Haas MBA students and geeked over the potential of bringing consumer-friendly, affordable, and simple 360° camera to market. 

Our Story

360° content and Virtual Reality (VR) represent the new frontier in visual content, one that has the ability to transport and connect people like nothing else. Goldman Sachs predicts that the AR/VR market will reach as much as $180B by 2025—over 33% larger than the laptop computer market!

We're Yuriy, Tony, and Sora, three MBA students from the prestigious Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley. We came together to address the biggest roadblock for bringing the benefits of VR to everybody: capturing 360° content easily and at an affordable price.

Instead of creating another cumbersome and non-intuitive 360° camera (not to mention expensive), we decided to take the most powerful device people already own, your smartphone, and harness that power to record in 360° directly. And thus, Fishball was born!

With your help, the Fishball team will be able to give everyone the ability to capture stunning 360° content just by using their phones. But we can't do it without your help.

We've funded this ourselves so far, but your pledge will allow us to create the injection molding tools required to mass-produce Fishball at an affordable price.

So please, back Fishball today, and join us as we make the VR movement accessible and fun for everyone!

With special thanks to:
story_txt:
As seen on:Digital Trends: "An affordable 360 solution by using the camera tech already inside the iPhone."The Verge: "There’s a new 360-degree lens you can attach to your iPhone to record photos and videos."Stuff: "The little gizmo’s proprietary lens system uses your iPhone’s existing camera rather than an external one, so all you need to do is clip it on." Introducing FishballIt all started when three friends and classmates wanted a simple way to capture 360° photo and video, without extra hassle and without breaking the bank.That solution didn't exist. So, they created Fishball.Fishball is the only device of its kind that lets you capture in full 360 degrees, using your phone's powerful rear camera. It's ultra-portable and super simple to use. If you can record with a phone, you can record with Fishball.Best of all, it uses special optics, not electronics, so there's nothing to charge, no memory cards to buy, and no wireless pairing required. Just clip it on and shoot. Fishball's proprietary lens system utilizes your iPhone's existing camera to capture every angle and every detail of your moments. And since everything is captured directly on your phone and not on a separate memory card, you can instantly share to platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Vimeo—basically any platform that hosts 360° images and videos.  

 
FeaturesAs a bonus, Fishball is future-proof and works across multiple phone models. So the next time you upgrade your iPhone and its camera, Fishball upgrades along with you!Fishball is compatible with iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, and the brand-new iPhone X.(Android users: please help us make this campaign a success, so we can use your input on what models to support next here - http://bit.ly/FishballAndroidSurvey)Stretch goalFishball is perfect for travel, nature, city viewing, concerts, and any other moment you'd love to re-experience or share. 360° content makes you feel as if you're truly experiencing it, even if you couldn't be there the first time.The ability to share moments with loved ones also makes Fishball a perfect gift. Do you live apart from loved ones, but want to still feel like you're right there? Send them a Fishball!Got any adventures coming up? Fishball will ship by this coming summer to make sure that you capture every moment with the full detail it deserves. Help us show the world the benefits of 360° content, and prove that good ideas don't always mean more electronics!Back us today and let's make Fishball a reality, together. Thank you! How Fishball WorksFishball is hands-down the easiest, most hassle-free solution for 360° content. Just clip it on and it works. Less worry. More recording.And more fun. Step 1: Clip Fishball on 
A specialized latch keeps Fishball secure on your phone.
A single Fishball is compatible with iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, and X!
 Step 2: Hold Fishball Up 
Use the free Fishball App for iOS.
No need to aim! Fishball captures it all, so you just worry about having fun.
 Step 3: View and Share Instantly 
Upload from your phone's photo album to Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Vimeo, and more.
View with the free Fishball app, or any other VR app and headset.
 The Fishball AppThe Fishball App is free to download on iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, and the new iPhone X. Simply launch it and snap 360° photos and videos just like you would using your regular camera app.Our proprietary stitching software works with Fishball's optics to create perfect 360° scenes, viewable instantly on your phone. Benefits of 360° Fishball vs. 360° CamerasFishball vs. the CompetitionFishball is clearly the superior value compared to 360° cameras on the market. But how does it stack up against another lens option?Fishball - Early Bird Price ($49)
Compatible with iPhone 7 and newer, including iPhone X.
Captures 360° photos and videos.
Seamless stitching.
One model fits all (both regular and Plus models)
4.4 x 3.6 x 3.4 cm; 30g 
Competing Lens - Early Bird Price ($44)
Compatible with iPhone 7 and newer. NOT iPhone X.
Warped stitching due to misaligned front and back cameras (parallax).
Need a separate model for “Plus” model phones.
8.3 x 5.3 x 3.4 cm; 39g (for regular model)
9.3 x 5.3 x 3.4 cm; 40g (for Plus model)
The advantages of Fishball are clear. Perks
 Share and earn — it's easy!Earn additional rewards by referring your friends, up to as much as four free Fishballs. The more you share, the more you earn.Here's how:1. Log in to Indiegogo — you must be logged in to receive credit for your referrals. There's no need to pay for anything — and if you don't have an account, simply create one here.2. Visit our Fishball Indiegogo campaign page, where you’ll now find your unique link to the right of our video.3. Start sharing! Use your link to share our Fishball campaign on social media, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, whatever you can think of.4. When anyone clicks on the special link you share, they are taken to the Fishball Indiegogo page and a "Referral" is credited to you. If people you refer end up backing Fishball, you get stuff!For detailed instructions, read the Indiegogo guide here. Technical Specifications Meet The TeamThe three co-founders met as UC Berkeley-Haas MBA students and geeked over the potential of bringing consumer-friendly, affordable, and simple 360° camera to market. Our Story360° content and Virtual Reality (VR) represent the new frontier in visual content, one that has the ability to transport and connect people like nothing else. And thus, Fishball was born!With your help, the Fishball team will be able to give everyone the ability to capture stunning 360° content just by using their phones. But we can't do it without your help.We've funded this ourselves so far, but your pledge will allow us to create the injection molding tools required to mass-produce Fishball at an affordable price.So please, back Fishball today, and join us as we make the VR movement accessible and fun for everyone!With special thanks to:

story:
FAST and STRONG: fast-charge your Qi-enabled phone with the latest in wireless charging technology for in-car use. Integrates NANO-suction technology and magnetic positioning for the strongest adherence with BEZALEL's cases for iPhone 8 and above, so you can drive freely and focus on the road.

Excellent suction power securely holds phone for your co-piloting needs. Superb functionality. Smooth ride.

Steel-tightening spring. 360-degree rotating joint positions the way you want it.

 

Omnia wirelessly charges all Qi-enabled smartphones. The adhering power of NANO-suction technology works on smartphones with glossy-surfaced or glassy backs. BEZALEL designed Omnia with glossy-surfaced cases for iPhone 8 and above. Use BEZALEL's tailor-made cases and take advantage of Omnia.

OMNIA'S TAILOR-MADE CASES FOR iPHONE 8 and ABOVE -- are designed for Omnia and Omnia's optimal wireless charging performance.

 

Omnia's package is a steel-tightened deal. Comes with high-quality enduring equipment made with the best hardware. Stylish, ultra modern, and dramatic in subtle silver accents and black. Upgrade the look of your car's interior with luxury and without the money drainage on discordant cosmetics.

Cut the cord and leave the entangled mess in the trash. Drive away with style, convenience, and joy towards the adventures ahead. Tailor-made just for you. 

Team

Follow BEZALEL  Online:

BEZALEL Official Website: http://bezalel.co

BEZALEL Facebook, Instagram, Twitter: @bezalelpower

Risks and challenges

Omnia is nearly complete. All chargers on this page and in the videos were built on our production line. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and are ready to meet the estimated delivery times.

Forecasting Risk 
We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. We’ve learned a lot from the past year, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk 
We’ve built a very capable team from the past year on all our products. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Terms and Conditions 
For International Backers, please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

story:
The World's first reversible Wi-Fi USB adapter



1.  Upgrade your internet to AC Wi-Fi Speed

2.  Connect to 5.0GHZ for smoother and faster internet.

3.  Be wire free, no more cables in your premises

4.  Replace your broken or outdated internal wireless card

5. Quick simple to setup in minutes


This is perfect for:
1. People with a old desktop or old laptop
2. broken or unstable Wi-Fi
3. Developer using Raspberry pi, arduino, cubieboard, etc
4. Office, schools, hotels,  data sharing

As Wi-Fi products work with radio waves, some household electronic products, such as mobile phones and microwaves, can interfere with signals. This applies more to those devices that work on the 2.4 GHz band. The 5 GHz band was included to minimise interference. Most Wi-Fi products are designed to keep interference to a minimum or to eliminate it completely. 

Adding ReverseMAX to a computer or laptop with an outdated integrated network card, for example a 802.11n card, is an easy, inexpensive way to upgrade the system. 

USB Orientation

There is one common problem in USB that we all hate about. There is a 50% 50% chance of getting it right, or maybe  it feels more like a 95% chance of getting it wrong. A reversible USB  means when you try to plug it in, you get it correctly the first time, every time. It is also backwards compatible with every USB port and works with all of your devices! 


Experience

The team is consist of 4 members each experienced in the wireless industry with a combined total of 20+ years of experience. We are fortunate enough to be located in Taipei, Taiwan where many of the hi tech companies and manufacturer are located at. Being close to a complete  supply chain environment it makes it easier for us to source and manage everything efficiently. 

Our teams include a Marketing Manager, Hardware Engineer, Software Engineer, and Logistic Specialist. 

We have done a lot of radio frequency testing, power testing, stability to ensure the quality of ReverseMAX. We have also made numerous software updates to improve stability .


Delays

Please note that even launching a small product like this is no easy task. In order to ship these products in bulk it requires certifications such as FCC, CE from each regions and countries. 

Additionally, many Indiegogo projects deliver late. It's a known fact. Many factors can cause delays, from manufacturing issues, payment issues, shipping problems for international backers, and all the unexpected problems that we may encounter.

That being said, we're currently on track for shipping in May We want you to know that we have already simplified this project by limiting it to only one color without any other customization. We are really trying to under-promise and over-deliver here. We will make sure you receive your ReverseMAX as soon as possible and we are working very hard and carefully to make it all happen.

Risks and challenges

ReverseMAX uses the latest chipset from Mediatek and we have the pleasure to partnered with one of the world's leading Wireless Broadband solutions provider with 25+ years of experience(Trust me, they are very very good).  

Please be aware that ReverseMAX is not a product yet, as it is not available anywhere in the market yet. However, we do have a working prototype with BOM(Bill of Material) ready. After talking to our manufacturer they have agreed to manufacturer ReverseMAX with a MOQ(Minimum Order Quantity) of 3000 units.  
This is where you come in and make this all into a reality. We are super excited and we can't wait to ship out ReverseMAX onto your hands.

story:
ONE CARD Mobile Charger Up to 2X battery life of iPhone, Android, Tablets as low as $12

http://igg.me/at/onecard/x/8732896

**********************************************

Get a FREE Wireless Charger Receiver For Your Samsung S4, S5, or Note 3 *

* We are giving away a new wireless charger receiver ($30 retail) when you get a discounted charging pad because:

  • We need your help to precisely forecast how many of which model to make.
  • Your feedback and comments will help us design better products.
  • We want more people to enjoy the benefits of wireless charging and hopefully you will buy car chargers, portable chargers (see below), and other products from us later.

Share this campaign with your circle and Get $3 for every Perk referred by you.  Please click Referral Rewards Program or go to the bottom of this page for details.


Wireless charging is not just cool, it also means: 

  • No more clumsy charger cables, or broken charging connectors.  
  • No more fumbling at night or struggling to open the charging port cover (S5 owners).  Just lay your phone down and start charging instantly.
  • Our receivers are internal so the power port is never blocked, and if needed, you can always charge with a standard wired charger.

Our engineers have already finished the design, and testing on the latest version of Qi compatible wireless charger receivers for Samsung S4, S5, and Note 3 phones.  

(For iPhone or iPad http://igg.me/at/3DOMpower/x/6829311)

Compared to previous versions, they are:

  • Thinner so you can keep your existing case
  • Lighter so you won't feel it
  • Charge faster than previous versions - without overheating

We have reserved enough components and factory floor time to produce 50,000 sets of receivers and charging pads.  Before we start production, we need your help to forecast how many of each model and the type of charging pad to make.

Smart Qi Power in the news


** S5 Owners - no more going crazy trying to open the charge port cover and then plugging in the cable.  1 SECOND is all it takes to put your phone on the charging pad and start charging.


Sets up in seconds - open the back cover, stick on the receiver, close the cover.

Cookie Pad ($30 retail) works with any USB power adapter, computer, etc. to transmit power to the wireless charger receiver.  Red rubber rings grip your phone.  SOLD OUT

  

The S Pad ($40 retail) works with any USB power adapter, computer, etc.   Large silicone rubber mat grips your phone securely.  6" x 3.25" x 0.3"

Perks (for accessories scroll down)

Free Receiver Specials (delivery mid September or earlier)

  • Samsung S4, S5, or Note 3 Kit with 1 Cookie Pad ($60 retail) - @$20

  • Samsung S4, S5,  SOLD OUT or Note 3 Kit with 1 S Pad ($70 retail) - @$23

  • Added by request- Home & Office Package 2 S Pads, 1 Receiver, 2 USB Cables, 1 AC Adapter ($115 retail) - @ $45

  • Added by request - S5 Kit with 1 S Pad delivery 30-45 days after campaign ends - @ $29

FYI - at the above prices, we lose money on each perk but consider it part of our marketing budget (see below).

Someone asked on 8/3: “On one hand you say you are giving FREE Wireless Chargers and on the other you are asking for contribution…how is it free then?”

Perhaps our wording is not so clear. You get a FREE receiver w any charging pad perks. Even the pads are discounted & the shipping is free. For every set that contributors get (thank you!), we lose money because it costs us:

  • $22-$25 for the 1 Pad Perk
  • $3 for the S & H
  • $3 for IG and Paypal
  • Labor for fulfilling the perks

Accessories

Portable Charger - Powers up to 3 devices (2 USB ports). 10,000 mAh is 4X most smartphones.  Retail $98 Choose black or white @ $55 

Car Charger - Powers all Qi enabled smartphones.  

Retail $78 Black with white pad @ $48

Package includes:

  • 1  Car charger (black with white)
  • 1  USB cable
  • 1  Car adapter
  • Mounts for dash, vent, and windshield
  • Extra free bonus - AC adapter and power cable so you can use the pad on a smooth desktop

Stick on charger stand for any smooth backed Qi enabled phone.  $30

Now comes with choice of wireless receiver for S4 or Note 3 FREE.

No S5 though-the phone's back's not smooth.  

Available in green or orange color.  

Our Story

Smart Qi Power was started by mobile device fanatics, users, and engineers to design and make products that we would use ourselves.

The first products that we designed and produced were the iTablet wireless chargers for iPad Air and iPad Mini.  The first run of 6,000 sets were sold out and as we worked on the 2nd generation iPhone and iPad chargers (please go to http://igg.me/at/3DOMpower/x), we were asked to also make products for Samsung Galaxy phones. 

No matter the phone, the wireless charging capability is convenient, and reduces accidents and wear and tear on the power port.  

Our engineers have already finished the design, and testing on the latest version of Qi compatible wireless chargers for Samsung S4, S5, and Note 3 phones.  They are thinner, lighter, and faster charging than previous versions.

We have reserved enough components and factory floor time to produce 50,000 sets.  Before we start production, we need your help to forecast how many of each model and charging pads to make.

We will be transparent and update regularly.  
We expect the Cookie perks to be sold out soon, and plan to ship them before the end of the campaign.  If there are negative comments about any problems with our products, delivery, or anything at all, we will NOT hide them and will address them openly.  See our costs revealed above.

****************************************************************************

Get $ To Spend On More Pads or Accessories - Just For Sharing

We’d love to reward you and give you Wireless Chargers, Car Chargers, Portable Chargers for free-just for a few seconds to help spread the word about our campaign. 

How It Works

Sign up on Indiegogo.com and you will be assigned your own ID number

Then click the Link button under the video to get your unique link to share online.  For example: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311.  6829311 would be your unique ID number assigned by IG.



You can then share it with the message or post: 

I got my FREE Wireless Charger For Samsung Galaxy here: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311

Get a FREE Wireless Charger For Samsung S4 S5 Note 3 here: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311

Help me get a FREE Wireless Charger here: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311

Don't forget to use YOUR LINK.

We will then credit you $3 for each perk that is referred by you.  At the end of the campaign, we will refund your Perk (if you contributed) and/or notify you of the balance and you can spend it on whatever you want from us.

That means if you got a $20 Perk and you referred 25 people who got perks, you would get $20 refunded AND $30 to spend on a Car Charger, Portable Charger, or anything else we offer here.  And that would be for the Perk price instead of the retail price! 

Your help is appreciated!

Our Story

Smart Qi Power was started by mobile device fanatics, users, and engineers to design and make products that we would use ourselves.The first products that we designed and produced were the iTablet wireless chargers for iPad Air and iPad Mini.  The first run of 6,000 sets were sold out and as we worked on the 2nd generation iPhone and iPad chargers (please go to http://igg.me/at/3DOMpower/x), we were asked to also make products for Samsung Galaxy phones. No matter the phone, the wireless charging capability is convenient, and reduces accidents and wear and tear on the power port.  Our engineers have already finished the design, and testing on the latest version of Qi compatible wireless chargers for Samsung S4, S5, and Note 3 phones.  They are thinner, lighter, and faster charging than previous versions.We have reserved enough components and factory floor time to produce 50,000 sets.  Before we start production, we need your help to forecast how many of each model and charging pads to make.We will be transparent and update regularly.  We expect the Cookie perks to be sold out soon, and plan to ship them before the end of the campaign.  If there are negative comments about any problems with our products, delivery, or anything at all, we will NOT hide them and will address them openly.  See our costs revealed above.****************************************************************************Get $ To Spend On More Pads or Accessories - Just For SharingWe’d love to reward you and give you Wireless Chargers, Car Chargers, Portable Chargers for free-just for a few seconds to help spread the word about our campaign. How It WorksSign up on Indiegogo.com and you will be assigned your own ID numberThen click the Link button under the video to get your unique link to share online.  For example: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311.  6829311 would be your unique ID number assigned by IG.You can then share it with the message or post: I got my FREE Wireless Charger For Samsung Galaxy here: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311Get a FREE Wireless Charger For Samsung S4 S5 Note 3 here: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311Help me get a FREE Wireless Charger here: http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/6829311Don't forget to use YOUR LINK.We will then credit you $3 for each perk that is referred by you.  At the end of the campaign, we will refund your Perk (if you contributed) and/or notify you of the balance and you can spend it on whatever you want from us.That means if you got a $20 Perk and you referred 25 people who got perks, you would get $20 refunded AND $30 to spend on a Car Charger, Portable Charger, or anything else we offer here.  And that would be for the Perk price instead of the retail price! Your help is appreciated!

story:
If you are a teacher, or a faculty at a higher education institute interested in using these lenses for teaching and research work, please contact us at: dotlens.microscope@gmail.com

Smartphone, meet dotlens.

Bring your very own microscope wherever you go! See things down to 1/100th the width of your hair! Yes, you can actually see SINGLE CELLS with your smartphone!

To get started, attach the dotlens onto your smartphone camera!

Gallery

What can you see with your own microscope? Well, nature has prepared countless microscopic details for you to explore! All these photos are taken with the phones above, which means you can do it too!

To see the full potential of dotlens and even more fascinating microscopic images, including our 1 micron (0.0001 centimeter) testing target, please visit the ‘Gallery’ tab at the top of the page.

What’s so special?

Dotlens:

  • Works by attaching the lens directly onto your smartphone, no large barrels, no big attachments, just one single elegantly designed lens.
  • Has an identical optical power as professional microscope lenses that cost ten to a hundred times more.
  • Is easy to remove without residue.
  • Contains a special hydrophobic and scratch resistant outer coating for easy cleaning.
  • Is compatible with almost all smartphones and tablets.

    • Use, and re-use, and re-use … there’s no limit to the number of times you can use the lens, and the adhesive does not weaken with time!

Funding Goal

We want to fire your passion for discovering the microscopic world around you, and to excite more people about it! But we are limited by the number of lenses we can make each day. Each dotlens is created by hand in our garage, and checked for defects by eye.

Your contribution will enable us to purchase automatic fabrication and verification equipment from the top optical instrument providers in the US.

Timeline

As of Oct 6, we are on schedule to deliver the x15 lens in November, and the x120 lenses in December! Keep checking us out for the latest updates!

Risks and Challenges

Both the 15x and 120x lenses are now in the production stage. Each lens is created in-house and visually inspected for perfection. This manual process is time consuming but we are still on track to ship all rewards before the year ends.

We believe this project will impact education and scientific research in a very significant way! The biggest risk is if this project is not funded. If you like this project, please spread the word about Dotlens, your smartphone microscope lens!

Specs

Meet our team

Yulu Sung is a graduate student from the University of Houston electrical engineering department. He was awarded the ‘Innovative biomedical application award’ for 2013 and 2014 for his work on miniature diagnostic systems.

Cloud Lee is a graduate student from the University of Houston materials engineering department. He is interested in novel metamaterials for healthcare applications.

Jenn Jeang graduated from the University of Texas at Austin. He plans to continue his career as a doctor.

story:
​

 

   

Engineered to stick.

These suction cups stick strong, easily, and for long periods of time. Credit goes to the material used and the geometry of the suction surface. For best performance, stick to clean and smooth surfaces.

Travel Lite.

  

Go for the ShutterBug Kit and get:

  • Bluetooth selfie button 
  • 1/4-20" adapter screw 
  • Solid phone clip (for if your case won't suction) 
  • GoPro adapter

 

Manufacturing is done & ready to produce.

To make things better for backers, we finished developing all the manufacturing BEFORE the launch. That way backers can skip all the boring parts and get their Tenikle sooner.

Completed molds here in Southern California (San Diego County)

 

STORY

In a modest one-car garage full of surfboards and art, just steps from the sand in Huntington Beach, California Tenikle was born. The inventor, a 25-year-old from Huntington Beach CA, wanted to make a rad, multi-purpose product so we would have less junk and a little less trash in the ocean.

Tenikle is every mount/stand/tripod or selfie device you could possibly need in one and its made of 100% recyclable thermoplastic. 

We know you're tired of boring products, so we made Tenikle fun. It's a toy with a purpose.  

We work with the best plastics manufacturer in the country to produce our product and we are proud to say Tenikle is made in the USA right in San Diego, California.  

Tenikle is driven by ultimate creativity. We push to be different in every way possible. Join us on a fun and crazy ride as we invent to make this planet a little more rad.

:)

Creator's Story

Hi! 

I'm Hans, the creator of Tenikle. I surf and love to make things.

My professional background is in apparel and graphic design, where I have been employed in the surf industry for brands like Hurley and Billabong since 2009.

However, I've always had a passion for engineering and industrial design. 

In 2013, I had an idea for a phone case mechanism that could attach all sorts of accessories, like battery power, lenses, clips, mounts, wallets etc. I called it Tenikle because of my love for the ocean. While trying to brand my case concept, I decided I wanted to make a product that resembled a tentacle.

Then one day I get pulled over by a cop for looking at my phone. He let me go without a ticket and told me to get a mount so I don't get pulled over again. In fear of getting a future ticket, I went to a major tech store to buy a car mount. As I was searching to pick out the perfect one, I became disappointed that they were all the same big, boring, black mount and only did one thing! That's when the idea hit me.

I set out to create a fun car mount that could be used in more ways than just as a car mount.

Being a lover of all things creative, I decided to do everything on my own. I learned 3D CAD software, designed the product, wrote a patent, 3D printed molds, tested different materials, learned mold-making, created almost 100 different prototypes in my tiny garage, built a website, found a US manufacturer, got a business loan to purchase the molds, and filmed/edited the videos with my best friend from high school, Erik (@cloudroamer).

During this whole process, I wrote a guide called the DIY Inventor Kit, so that others can create their inventions on their own as well. It's full of fun design and a thorough 9 steps to help you get to the place I am now. If you don't have an invention yet, it shows you how to come up with one by using my process. You'll get a digital copy if you help out and pledge $10 :)

This project was quite a bit of work but well worth it because this thing is awesome! I really hope you love and use it too :)

Thank you for your support!

-Hans

                 @hansdose                                    @everybody.loves.lydia

story:
We are back with more, introducing...

Due to huge demand we have decided to release the ZAPTIP USB-C,  The world's first magnetic USB-C super charger.  USB Type C is the new tiny, super fast connector for the USB standard that will support all of the your new devices!  ZAPTIP USB-C will be compatible with ALL USB-C devices including the new Macbook!  Working prototypes have already been made and we are now taking pre orders to help fund our first purchase order!  Pledge now to enjoy early delivery and early bird prices!  To order our  ZAPTIP 2.0 MICRO USB & LIGHTNING cables and adaptors please visit our other campaign CLICK HERE or visit www.igg.me/at/zaptip

CLICK HERE FOR ZAPTIP 2.0 MICRO USB, LIGHTNING & ZAP-ADAPTOR



ZAPTIPs is a magnetic connector which allows you to charge any device/accessory using a simple snap on connection with incredible speeds. In some cases almost twice as fast as other chargers.

How it works? 

  1. Insert the ZAPTIP Adaptor into the power socket of any one of your devices (USB-C)
  2. Snap on the ZAPTIP Connector Cable which auto aligns itself and starts super charging instantly

Compatible will USB-C devices

ZAPTIP is compatible with all your personal devices/accessories, as long as it has a USB-C slot, you are good to go.  Simply leave a ZAPTIP Adaptor inside any one of your devices and you are ready to snap the ZAPTIP into place and charge. We have been using the ZAPTIP to charge our NEW MACBOOK! Order multiple adaptors to use on more devices/accessories! 


How to Order?

  1. Choose a perk and pledge. We would recommend The Extension pack for personal users or The Family Pack so the entire family can share a common cable.  
  2. Choose between Colors. Once we receive your pledges and the campaign has come to an end, an email will be sent out requesting your choice of colors.
  3. Shipping commences once the campaign ends. Pat yourself on the back and sit tight while we take care of the rest.

Pledge to Unlock More Colours!

Help us reach our goal and in return we will offer you more colours to match your devices!  A new surprise colour option will be unlocked for every $10,000 pledged.

Congratulations, we have now unlocked ZAPTIP in GOLD, BLACK and ROSE GOLD.  We will now be accepting these colors as part of your order. 

WANT A FREE ZAPTIP FOR ANOTHER DEVICE?

To receive your free extra ZAPTIP in addition to your pledge, simply follow the instructions below.

1) Share our campaign on Facebook (There is a Facebook share button on the left, or otherwise (www.igg.me/at/zaptipusbc), please use this exact link to share.  

2) Follow us on Facebook (Search for ZAPTIP on Facebook and follow us)

3) Screen shot both the above and send it to info@zaptip.net from your registered Indiegogo account.  

4) Congratulations we will send you an email confirmation confirming your FREE additional ZAPTIP

How we got here?

Charge Lab's team has been designing and manufacturing charging cables for over 6 years.  ZAPTIP is the result of months of prototyping, testing, perfecting and the passion to bring the world the easiest most convenient method of charging.  Our team for months has been trying to improve on the common magnetic solutions for charging and came up with the ZAPTIP.  Finally we are ready to bring ZAPTIP to market.  To see our previous campaign and to order Micro USB and Lightning packs please visit www.igg.me/at/zaptip

Contributions

As you can see below in the breakdown of our budget, more than 85% of the funds collected goes into the direct cost of making the ZAPTIP and shipping it to you.  The starter pack is only $25 compared to the suggested retail price of $38 after the campaign.  By pledging now, you not only will be the first to recieve ZAPTIPs but you will also save up to 50%

                 

FAQ

When do we start shipping?

If we continue at this pace and we stick to our set deadlines, shipping will commence almost immediately after we receive your pledges.  

When will you hear from us?

We will be in contact with our contributors from the beginning right to the end.  Updates with videos and photographs will be uploaded regularly.  We will do our very best to keep you in the loop and make you a part of our process.  However in the case where you need to contact us please do so at info@zaptip.net

How much is shipping?

International shipping fee is $5 for perks besides the Distributor options.  Fees will be added once you have selected a perk.

Can ZAPTIP both Sync and Charge?

Yes, we have designed ZAPTIP cables to both sync and charge, so you do not have to fiddle with adapters and not worry about using any other cable. 

How long does it take to charge my smart phone?

We have tested and average speed of 90 mins full charge across smart phones, in some cases twice as fast as regular chargers.

ZAPTIP was created as a solution to other magnetic charging solutions on the market.  It's a unique charging solution developed to make the charging experience easier and faster for its users.  Whilst there are other charging solutions on the market, ZAPTIPs is unique.  Why?

Smart design/High Quality components: ZAPTIP is the smartest charger on the market, designed and produced with high quality components which helps to increase the charge efficiency in turn increasing the speed.  Our team has tested an average of 90 mins for a full charge across 20 smart phone devices and in some cases twice as fast as other chargers.  The ZAPTIP has an aluminum casing with gold plated plugs.

Compatible/Convenient: Due to the new charing specs of the USB C, we have had to re work the tooling and components in the wiring and adaptors to keep charging efficiency at its peak.  Therefore USB C adaptors will not be compatible with other ZAPTIP cables (i.e. for micro usb or lightning).

Easy to use and sync functionality: Powered by a strong magnet, the ZAPTIP cable is fully reversible.  You will never struggle with finding the right side up of the cable ever again.  It also includes sync functionality for the times where you need to connect your devices.

Options: Help us reach out stretch goals to unlock ZAPTIP USB Type-C in black, gold and rose gold!

Legal Discalimer: "Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
About the Project

Cobblebot Inc. having already completed two successful Kickstarter and Indiegogo campaigns in the 3D printer arena has identified several areas in the consumer 3D printing world that could use improvement. The area we are looking to address with this Indiegogo campaign deals with power supplies (PSUs).

We are in the final stages of development of the new Cobblebot PSU that is designed for use with 3D printers.  Those 3D printing enthusiast who have built their own 3D printers (every member of the RepRap community) are undoubtedly familiar with the generic switching power supplies that can be found essentially everywhere.  The 3D printing community has been using these types of PSU's to power their 3D printers since the first consumer 3D printers started being built.

For the technically inclined who like to strip wires and connect them to terminals, these popular generic PSUs provide a reasonable power solution.  But they aren't a good solution and more importantly, they aren't a very safe solution (especially if you have kids around).

The Cobblebot PSU brings a higher level of user friendliness and safety to the 3d printing community and moves away from the the low quality generic terminal style PSUs.

Quality and Cost

Retail pricing on this unit will be $149. 

We tested out a variety of different quality parts for this PSU and can actually have a decent one made for approximately half the cost.  However, we believe that when it comes dealing with power that cost should not be a factor when the trade-off would be not only quality but  safety.  We therefore have opted for the highest quality parts available from our manufacturer and these parts come at a premium cost.

Certifications

As our primary market is in the USA, all PSU's will comply with federal US certification requirements.

We may ship to countries which require CE certification but would require a minimum of 50 backers from these countries to back the project in order to pay for the CE certification. 

Development Run Down

This PSU has been in development for some time now.  As you can see from the picture below, we started off our testing with non-modular units while we were testing the electronics themselves.


As you can see the above non-modular unit has two standard 12V lines. 

The most current picture of the PSU, which is approximately 95% complete, has everything but the modular ports added.  This current prototype is the picture we use as the main campaign picture (and is below as well).


Currently, the mould for the modular part of the PSU enclosure is currently being made and we except to have the final PSU enclosure in our hands the first week of March 2016.  A technical drawing of the modular ports being used in the creation of that mould is below.

This modular-port mould is one of the final two steps in completing the development of the PSU.  The other remaining step is customizing the modular 12V wires for use with various 3D printers.  For this part we would like the input of the community. 

Obviously, one end of the modular wires will remain the 4-point connector in order to plug into the PSU.  Our thought was that the other end of one of the two wire sets would simply be wire ferrules - for easy insertion into some of the more commonly used 3d printer control boards, such as the Ramps 1.4 board.  Our thought for the second wire set was a connector for use with a 12V hub that can used for fans/LEDs, etc.. 

All suggestions from the community concerning the modular wire configuration will be greatly appreciated and will certainly be taken into consideration when making that final decision.

Schedule

February - Throughout the period of the campaign we would like to work with our backers to determine the cabling configuration, as mentioned above.

The other electronic parts of the PSU have essentially been decided on and we expect no changes in those parts.  While it is possible that we may encounter an issue as we continue testing during the campaign period, it seems unlikely given the current stage of development that we are in and the amount of previous testing. 

March - Once the mould is completed for the modular ports and we get the prototype in - as long there are no issues with the modular ports we will give our final approval.

Once we give final approval of the PSU, the PSU is submitted to a laboratory for testing and certification.  The certifications are expected to take 2-4 weeks, assuming no issues.  The biggest risk for delay lies with the certifications.  If the laboratory finds an issue that needs to be addressed, the PSU will have to modified and resubmitted.  Given the experience of the engineers involved in the development of this PSU, we do not foresee any issues with obtaining the certifications on the first run.

April - Once certified, the PSU order goes in and production starts.   Our manufacturer is capable of producing 80,000 PSUs/month so we shouldn't have any production delays. In fact, we only intend on submitting an order for 2,000 units + the number of Indiegogo backers.  So production of the units for this campaign should be relatively fast as we will be a small production run for our manufacturer.

May -  If everything goes according to plan, everyone should be receiving their PSU in May (possibly April).

Specifications

These are the specifications of the current prototype we are working with.  As this PSU is still in development, these specifications may not be identical to the final product.  Although, we expect no significant changes.  The new Cobblebot PSU is a 12V 30A PSU designed with 3d printers in mind. This PSU has two modular 12V 30A ports.

INRUSH CURRENT

(Cold start – 25 deg. C)

110V  - No damage

230V  - No damage

Maximum inrush current from power-on (with power on at any point on the AC sine) and including, but not limited to, three line cycles, shall be limited to a level below the surge rating of the input line cord, AC switch if present, bridge rectifier, fuse, and EMI filter components. Repetitive ON/OFF cycling of the AC input voltage should not damage the power supply or cause the input fuse to blow.

INPUT LINE CURRENT

110V |  6Amps – rms maximum

230V |  3Amps – rms maximum

General

The loading condition for testing efficiency shown in Table 1 represents a fully loaded system. a ~ 50% (typical) loaded system and a ~ 20% (light) loaded system

                             Table1. Minimum Efficiency Vs Load

Loading                          Full load               Typical load                    Light load 
                                           (100% Load)              (50% Load)                      (20% Load)

Required Minimum               -                                        -                                          -
Efficiency

230V Required                  77%                                 80%                                    77%
Minimum Efficiency

OUTPUT VOLTAGE AND CURRENT RATING

Output                                       +12V

MINIMUM LOAD                     0A

MAXIMUM LOAD                    30A

LOAD REG                                ±5%

LINE REG.                                 ±1%

NOISE                                         200mV P-P

RIPPLE                                        120mV P-P

OUTPUT RISE TIME

(10% TO 90% OF FINAL OUTPUT VALUE, @FULL LOAD)

100V-rms or 230V-rms - 12Vdc : 20ms Maximum

OVER VOLTAGE PROTECTION

Voltage Source                Protection Point

     12VDC                                 13.2V-13.9V

SHORT CIRCUIT PROTECTION

Output short circuit is defined to be a short circuit load of less than 0.1 ohm. In the event of an output short circuit condition on +12V output, the power supply will shutdown and latch off without damage to the power supply. The power. supply shall return to normal operation after the short circuit has been removed and the power switch has been turned off for no more than 2 seconds.

ENVIRONMENTAL REQUIREMENTS

The power supply will be compliant with each item in this specification for the following Environmental conditions.

TEMPERATURE RANGE

Operating  0 to +35 deg. C

Storage  -20 to +80 deg. C

HUMIDITY

Operating  5 –95% RH, Non-condensing

Storage  5 –95% RH, Non-condensing

VIBRATION

The subject power supply will withstand the following imposed conditions without experiencing non-recoverable failure or deviation from specified output characteristics.

Vibration Operating – Sine wave excited, 0.25 G maximum acceleration, 10-250 Hz swept at one octave / min. Fifteen minute dwell at all resonant points, where resonance is defined as those exciting frequencies at which the device under test experiences excursions two times large than non-resonant excursions. Plane of vibration to be along three mutually perpendicular axes.

GROUND LEAKAGE CURRENT

The power supply groud leakage current shall be less than 3.5 mA.

RELIABILITY

The power supply reliability when calculated by MIL-HDBK-217;latest revision, are exceed 50,000 hours with all output at maximum load and an ambient temperature of 25℃.

DIELECTRIC STRENGTH

Primary to Frame Ground : 1800 Vac for 3 sec.

Primary to Secondary : 1800Vac for 1 3 sec

INSULATION RESISTANCE

Primary to Frame Ground : 20 Meg.ohms Minimum

Primary to Secondary : 20 Meg.ohms Minimum

Mechanical SIZE:

140mm(L)*150mm(W)*86mm(H)

About the ProjectCobblebot Inc. having already completed two
 successful Kickstarter and Indiegogo campaigns in the 3D printer arena has identified
 several areas in the consumer 3D printing world that could use 
improvement.  The area we are looking to address with this Indiegogo campaign deals with power supplies (PSUs).We are in the final 
stages of development of the new Cobblebot PSU that is designed for use 
with 3D printers.  Those 3D printing enthusiast who have built their own
 3D printers (every member of the RepRap community) are undoubtedly 
familiar with the generic switching power supplies that can be found 
essentially everywhere.  The 3D printing community has been using these 
types of PSU's to power their 3D printers since the first consumer 3D 
printers started being built. For the technically inclined who 
like to strip wires and connect them to terminals, these popular generic
 PSUs provide a reasonable power solution.  But they aren't a good 
solution and more importantly, they aren't a very safe solution 
(especially if you have kids around). The Cobblebot PSU brings a
 higher level of user friendliness and safety to the 3d printing 
community and moves away from the the low quality generic terminal style
 PSUs. Quality and CostRetail pricing on this unit will be $149.  We
 tested out a variety of different quality parts for this PSU and can 
actually have a decent one made for approximately half the cost.  
However, we believe that when it comes dealing with power that cost 
should not be a factor when the trade-off would be not only quality but 
 safety.  We therefore have opted for the highest quality parts 
available from our manufacturer and these parts come at a premium cost.CertificationsAs our primary market is in the USA, all PSU's will comply with federal US certification requirements.We
 may ship to countries which require CE certification but would require a
 minimum of 50 backers from these countries to back the project in order
 to pay for the CE certification.

time now.  As you can see from the picture below, we started off our 
testing with non-modular units while we were testing the electronics 
themselves.


One of the original test units, used for testing the PSU electronics.  Non-modular.


As you can see the above non-modular unit has two standard 12V lines.  The
 most current picture of the PSU, which is approximately 95% complete, 
has everything but the modular ports added.  This current prototype is 
the picture we use as the main campaign picture (and is below as well).
