story:
A Different Perspective for iPhones.

We love using our iPhones for filming!
The Flymount S.1 takes the great photographic capacity of the iPhone even further, allowing it to be used like never before.  
BMX, skateboarding, skiing, mountain biking, snowboarding... whatever you're doing, the S.1 can capture it.

Here's how it works:





The Flymount S.1

Capture wide angle point-of-view video straight on to your phone - no extra camera, no massive edits on the home computer, just concise, exciting footage for sharing. Simple, fun and easy.

The S.1 has taken a long time to develop, but we've ended up with something really special. Click it onto a helmet, rest it on a wall, or just hold it in your hand. It's one of those products that just feels right.

To make everything work, we had to develop a unique optical system (patent #GB1307565.0) that would bend and widen the light passing through it. Manipulating the camera's field of view in this way would normally require a much larger combination of optical parts. We worked hard to make our system extremely compact, so that the overall size of the whole product could be kept to an absolute minimum. Our optical parts are precision molded using state of the art technology, with anti reflective optical coatings applied to each surface.

The current design of the S.1 works with iPhones 4, 4S, 5 and 5S.
We're ready to go with the iPhone 6 too, and will start on it as soon as we know what changes Apple are making to their phones in September. This technology can also be adapted to other popular smartphones, which we plan to do in the future.

As with all our products, the Flymount S.1 is carefully manufactured here in Great Britain - no cutting corners on materials, no exploiting low cost labour.
Just premium quality product made by people who care about what they're doing.



What we need from you.

We're a small company. We have enough funds to put the S.1 into production, but our marketing budget is tiny. We need your help to spread the word about this incredible product, and to go out and use it!

What you get in return.

In return for your support, we're offering you the chance to buy the Flymount S.1 at a heavily discounted price. The first stages of production are already underway, so we'll be ready to ship orders on completion of this campaign!

Risks and Challenges.

The S.1 is fully developed and tested extensively. The early stages of production are now underway, leaving just the packaging to complete.

We're used to fulfilling orders, and have a solid distribution system in place, ready for shipping anywhere in the world.


Perks.


Who We Are.


Flymount is a British camera mount manufacturer.

We started making mounts for early waterproof cameras back in 2006, and launched the world's first action camera mount a few years later.  Our products are unique, innovative, and made to the highest possible standards here in Great Britain. We supply dealers and customers worldwide with distribution in both Europe and the United States.

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Shanna, and I need your help to achieve my goal of being able to stream games and create works of digital art. My computer is ancient, and it's beginning to die. I live on a very limited income, so I can never afford to upgrade.
 
To give you a bit more insight, I will get super personal. I'm a hermit, and I'm also sick. The money I get is from disability. At this point, I've outlived the time frame the doctors gave me so I'm unsure when I'm going to drop dead, but I don't plan on it anytime soon. I'm pretty determined to stay alive for my cats. And video games. These are the things that make me happy.
 
Yes, I'm a crazy cat lady. No, I don't own a million cats.
 

What I Need & What You Get

$700 would be amazing. It would pretty much cover the cost of the entire build I have in mind. Any extra will go to bills and my cats.
 
These are my current specs:
 
http://i.imgur.com/0LoRN.png
 
This is the build I want:
 
http://pcpartpicker.com/p/rRBz
 
I don't really have much I can give. I can make personal recordings for your voicemail, personal pleasure, whatever. I can also provide cat pictures galore!

The Impact

My entire life is on the computer because of the aforementioned hermitism. I leave my house once or twice a month for groceries, but that's it. I have no real life friends, and my only source of entertainment and happiness (besides my kitties) are video games/Netflix/online friends.
 
When my computer dies, so will my livelihood.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate money, just spreading the word would help.

 

Thanks for stopping by! If you have any questions, feel free to ask away.

 

-Shanna

story:
IoT Counters Explained


The Internet of Things (IoT) is a term which describes the abundance of web connected devices which we will see flood the world over the next decade. Whether it be a drone, or a phone, or some random possession in your home, all of these things could be internet connected soon.

Many of these IoT devices are designed to collect, store, and communicate information or data both within your home, at your work, and up into the clouds. These data pools are sometimes analysed and crunched to make sense of it all and then displayed somehow.

To help alleviate the complexities of presenting human readable and focused details from the web we have created a new type of display using a very familiar technology, the IoT Counter.

The IoT Counters come in two flavors:

  • IoT Counter 16 - An alpha-numeric display module, good for letters and numbers. This display is made up of eight 16 segment LED modules, each about 1" or 25mm in height, and offered in a selection of colours (red, green, orange). 
  • IoT Counter 7 - A Numeric display module, good for numbers and a simplified set of letters. This display consists of eight 7 segment LED modules, each about 1" or 25mm height, and offered in a selection of single colours (red, blue ,green, yellow, orange). 

The IoT Counter is a USB connected device and appears as a standard communications port to a host PC or embedded platform such as an Intel Edison. The USB connection provides instant power and data for ease of use with a wide variety of platforms. 

Furthermore, an Arduino compatible device can be connected directly to each board using a serial output in combination with an external 5V power source for independent cascade connected configuration, allowing you to run as many displays in a line as you can safely power.

To showcase the utility of the IoT Counter we have made a variety of display technologies include the Crowd Counter Kit (shown in the videos above and below), a free standing Desktop Display Kit, and a display we like to call the Back-to-The-Present Counter.


The Edi-Expand


To help bring USB connected technologies such at the IoT Counter together in the IoT world we have created a motherboard for the Intel Edison, called an Edi-Expand, which is utilised within both the Crowd Counter and Back-to-the-Present Display Kits as the brains of the operation.


Each Edi-Expand has the following main features:

  • 4 USB ports,  
  • Dedicated console connection,  
  • MicroSD card slot,  
  • Ethernet, and a  
  • Voltage selectable Raspberry-Pi compatible IO header

Connecting and powering 4 IoT Counters from the Intel Edison was a breeze with the Edi-Expand This helped us to easily extend the display capabilities of the Edison in a new and exciting ways.

Using the Edi-Expand combined with Intel Edison IoT platform we were able to create a powerful, rapidly developed, software framework which supports data extraction, processing, storage/logging, and display, all in a compact design. This software drives the Crowd Counters shown in the live video feed.

If you are excited about the Crowd Counter but don't know how to configure one that is OK. 

We have made a simple Python tool which runs on both PC and Mac platforms, helps generate all the necessary configuration information, and packages it up into a file which runs on the Intel Edison utilised within each Crowd Counter. This allows you to setup a Crowd Counter with little or no coding experience.


The IoT Counter Software API


The IoT Counter technology is used in conjunction with software libraries developed by us in two languages,

  • Python
  • Arduino C/C++

This allows the IoT Counter to be easily integrated into many hardware platforms such as the Intel Edison, Raspberry-Pi, PC, Mac, Linux, and wide range of Arduino compatible devices.

Many different display modes are supported including:

  • Text - Scrolling, flipped, animated
  • Numbers - Integer and floating point
  • Temperatures - Degrees C and Fahrenheit
  • Currency
  • Raw segment control - Useful for custom symbols and animations

You can also control other parameters such as:

  • Scroll rate,
  • Display brightness, and
  • Screen orientation

We have carefully crafted an easy-to-use, open source software development framework so that you can get up and running with these displays very quickly in your own IoT projects!

 If we are successfully funded, all of the Python and Arduino code, electronics hardware, firmware, and CAD files for each kit will be uploaded to GitHub and Sketchfab so that you can build your own variants or extend the functionality as you wish.

Further supporting documentation will be created to help with assembly, programming, and testing of each kit.


Call To Action


At a basic level you can help us to make the hardware and software release possible.

With your contributions you can also assist us in making these devices and tools better, easier to use, cheaper, and more readily available.

We seek to support a community of makers, software developers, electronics engineers, tinkerers, entrepreneurs, and hardware hackers.

Any further funds raised go towards making better documentation and improved outreach programs, both local to Australia, and throughout the world.

We genuinely hope to create a more vibrant community of innovators here in Melbourne through the continued display of ingenuity in technology but see the Internet of People (IoP) unbounded by traditional borderlines of this country or that.

If the video made you laugh and you read this far without an overwhelming impulse to go IoT Counter crazy, think of supporting us with a dollar.

Your contribution truly counts.

Display Kit Variants


We are offering kits for each of the following display types. Click the associated title link (in blue) to see each detailed model on Sketchfab in 3D!!  
  • Basic Kit - One display module in your choice of type and colour with acrylic front lens and fixings (screws and standoffs).
  • Desktop Kit - An alpha-numeric display in your choice of colour with a desktop acrylic stand and all required fixings.
  • Back-2-The-Present Kit - A limited edition kit which includes 3 x IoT Counter 16 modules, an Edi-Expand motherboard, Intel Edison Module, acrylic, and fixings. Power supply is not included but we will list suppliers, part number, and type for each country we ship to. A limited edition T-Shirt is included with each kit. This kit will also be supplied with Python code that supports counting down to a user specified date, showing the current date, and the different between these two times. Count down to Future Day (21.10.2015) with us!!!
  • The Crowd Counter Kit - A kit consisting of all bits needed to build a Crowd Counter (as seen in the videos) including, 2 x IoT Counter 16 modules, 2 x IoT Counter 7 modules, an Edi-Expand motherboard, Intel Edison Module, acrylic, and fixings. Power supply is not included but we will list suppliers, part number, and type for each country we ship. You also get a limited edition T-Shirt!!


Stretch Goals


If we receive further support from backers beyond our initial goal we will continue to offer increasing levels of open source software components which enhance the utility of the IoT Counts, Display Kits, and Edi-Expand. 

 These software widgets and base-code extensions will enable new levels of functionality out of the box, making it easier for backers to get up and running with new display applications.

The Team


We are a dedicated team of young engineers who love a good challenge and the opportunity to make new technology which solves the problems of today and hopefully tomorrow as well.

Timeline

Below is our timeline. We believe we have the hardware sorted and look forward to getting kits and rewards to each backer within two months of the campaign ending.

The T-Shirt


We designed a t-shirt. It glows in the dark just like our counters. If you back the Crowd counter or Back-to-the-Present display kit you will get one of these fine pieces of fabric. They will be a limited run. If you would just like the t-shirt we have offered that option too.

 Did I mention that it GLOWS IN THE DARK!!!

Risks and Challenges


We have tested our designs and worked through all the edge cases but making a physical thing is always a little challenging.

The preparation for delivery of each pledge level has been addressed before starting this campaign and we are confident that the timelines outlined are accurate, having allowed for variation in supply time for all components of the project.

We have created a live video stream of actual working hardware as it would be shipped to you. The design is fully functional and we encourage you to view the real-time version so that you may be confident we can delivery Crowd Counter Kits and IoT Counter modules within a reasonable time-frame.

Stretch goals are the wildcard here as all other elements have been developed up to pre-production state ahead of us seeking crowd-funding. 

If we are successfully funded up to a stretch goal we will have much needed time and resources to commit to the software development, accelerating us towards making these goals a reality.
story_txt:
IoT Counters Explained
The Internet of Things (IoT) is a term which describes the abundance of web connected devices which we will see flood the world over the next decade. Whether it be a drone, or a phone, or some random possession in your home, all of these things could be internet connected soon.Many of these IoT devices are designed to collect, store, and communicate information or data both within your home, at your work, and up into the clouds. These data pools are sometimes analysed and crunched to make sense of it all and then displayed somehow.To help alleviate the complexities of presenting human readable and focused details from the web we have created a new type of display using a very familiar technology, the IoT Counter.
The IoT Counters come in two flavors:

IoT Counter 16 - An alpha-numeric display module, good for letters and numbers. This display is made up of eight 16 segment LED modules, each about 1" or 25mm in height, and offered in a selection of colours (red, green, orange). 

IoT Counter 7 - A Numeric display module, good for numbers and a simplified set of letters. This display consists of eight 7 segment LED modules, each about 1" or 25mm height, and offered in a selection of single colours (red, blue ,green, yellow, orange). 
The IoT Counter is a USB connected device and appears as a standard communications port to a host PC or embedded platform such as an Intel Edison. The USB connection provides instant power and data for ease of use with a wide variety of platforms. Furthermore, an Arduino compatible device can be connected directly to each board using a serial output in combination with an external 5V power source for independent cascade connected configuration, allowing you to run as many displays in a line as you can safely power.To showcase the utility of the IoT Counter we have made a variety of display technologies include the Crowd Counter Kit (shown in the videos above and below), a free standing Desktop Display Kit, and a display we like to call the Back-to-The-Present Counter.
The Edi-ExpandTo help bring USB connected technologies such at the IoT Counter together in the IoT world we have created a motherboard for the Intel Edison, called an Edi-Expand, which is utilised within both the Crowd Counter and Back-to-the-Present Display Kits as the brains of the operation.Each Edi-Expand has the following main features:
4 USB ports,  
Dedicated console connection,  
MicroSD card slot,  
Ethernet, and a  
Voltage selectable Raspberry-Pi compatible IO header


Connecting and powering 4 IoT Counters from the Intel Edison was a breeze with the Edi-Expand This helped us to easily extend the display capabilities of the Edison in a new and exciting ways.Using the Edi-Expand combined with Intel Edison IoT platform we were able to create a powerful, rapidly developed, software framework which supports data extraction, processing, storage/logging, and display, all in a compact design. This software drives the Crowd Counters shown in the live video feed.If you are excited about the Crowd Counter but don't know how to configure one that is OK. We have made a simple Python tool which runs on both PC and Mac platforms, helps generate all the necessary configuration information, and packages it up into a file which runs on the Intel Edison utilised within each Crowd Counter. This allows you to setup a Crowd Counter with little or no coding experience.
The IoT Counter Software APIThe IoT Counter technology is used in conjunction with software libraries developed by us in two languages,
Python
Arduino C/C++
This allows the IoT Counter to be easily integrated into many hardware platforms such as the Intel Edison, Raspberry-Pi, PC, Mac, Linux, and wide range of Arduino compatible devices.Many different display modes are supported including:
Text - Scrolling, flipped, animated
Numbers - Integer and floating point
Temperatures - Degrees C and Fahrenheit
Currency
Raw segment control - Useful for custom symbols and animations
You can also control other parameters such as:
Scroll rate,
Display brightness, and
Screen orientation
We have carefully crafted an easy-to-use, open source software development framework so that you can get up and running with these displays very quickly in your own IoT projects!
 If we are successfully funded, all of the Python and Arduino code, electronics hardware, firmware, and CAD files for each kit will be uploaded to GitHub and Sketchfab so that you can build your own variants or extend the functionality as you wish.Further supporting documentation will be created to help with assembly, programming, and testing of each kit.Call To ActionAt a basic level you can help us to make the hardware and software release possible.With your contributions you can also assist us in making these devices and tools better, easier to use, cheaper, and more readily available.We seek to support a community of makers, software developers, electronics engineers, tinkerers, entrepreneurs, and hardware hackers.Any further funds raised go towards making better documentation and improved outreach programs, both local to Australia, and throughout the world.We genuinely hope to create a more vibrant community of innovators here in Melbourne through the continued display of ingenuity in technology but see the Internet of People (IoP) unbounded by traditional borderlines of this country or that.If the video made you laugh and you read this far without an overwhelming impulse to go IoT Counter crazy, think of supporting us with a dollar.Your contribution truly counts.
Display Kit VariantsWe are offering kits for each of the following display types. Click the associated title link (in blue) to see each detailed model on Sketchfab in 3D!!  

Basic Kit - One display module in your choice of type and colour with acrylic front lens and fixings (screws and standoffs).

Desktop Kit - An alpha-numeric display in your choice of colour with a desktop acrylic stand and all required fixings.

Back-2-The-Present Kit - A limited edition kit which includes 3 x IoT Counter 16 modules, an Edi-Expand motherboard, Intel Edison Module, acrylic, and fixings. Power supply is not included but we will list suppliers, part number, and type for each country we ship to. A limited edition T-Shirt is included with each kit. This kit will also be supplied with Python code that supports counting down to a user specified date, showing the current date, and the different between these two times. Count down to Future Day (21.10.2015) with us!!!

The Crowd Counter Kit - A kit consisting of all bits needed to build a Crowd Counter (as seen in the videos) including, 2 x IoT Counter 16 modules, 2 x IoT Counter 7 modules, an Edi-Expand motherboard, Intel Edison Module, acrylic, and fixings. Power supply is not included but we will list suppliers, part number, and type for each country we ship. You also get a limited edition T-Shirt!!


Stretch GoalsIf we receive further support from backers beyond our initial goal we will continue to offer increasing levels of open source software components which enhance the utility of the IoT Counts, Display Kits, and Edi-Expand. 
 These software widgets and base-code extensions will enable new levels of functionality out of the box, making it easier for backers to get up and running with new display applications.
The TeamWe are a dedicated team of young engineers who love a good challenge and the opportunity to make new technology which solves the problems of today and hopefully tomorrow as well.

TimelineBelow is our timeline. We believe we have the hardware sorted and look forward to getting kits and rewards to each backer within two months of the campaign ending.

The T-ShirtWe designed a t-shirt. It glows in the dark just like our counters. If you back the Crowd counter or Back-to-the-Present display kit you will get one of these fine pieces of fabric. They will be a limited run. If you would just like the t-shirt we have offered that option too. Did I mention that it GLOWS IN THE DARK!!!
Risks and Challenges


We have tested our designs and worked through all the edge cases but making a physical thing is always a little challenging.
The preparation for delivery of each pledge level has been addressed before starting this campaign and we are confident that the timelines outlined are accurate, having allowed for variation in supply time for all components of the project.
We have created a live video stream of actual working hardware as it would be shipped to you. The design is fully functional and we encourage you to view the real-time version so that you may be confident we can delivery Crowd Counter Kits and IoT Counter modules within a reasonable time-frame.
Stretch goals are the wildcard here as all other elements have been developed up to pre-production state ahead of us seeking crowd-funding. 
If we are successfully funded up to a stretch goal we will have much needed time and resources to commit to the software development, accelerating us towards making these goals a reality.

story:
These days most of people want to be cool. There are a lot of high technological, revolutions projects. But, is it so easy to produce? Most of the funders knows better. We were trying to develop revolutionary product as well. And it wasn’t easy to bring it from paper to real prototype. So, we decide to go other way around. “Before you run you got to walk”.

And we decide to show you a sample of product that we may produce with your support. We would like to build up our community “ant colony”, earn your trust to reveal our high-tech prototypes in next campaigns.

Why Carbon fiber?

Tensile strength of carbon fiber is 1000 to 7000MPa whereas tensile strength of general steel is 400 to 500MPa. One of the strongest steel is called maraging steel (can be only used for iron head) which have tensile strength of 2000MPa and strongest titanium alloy is around 1500MPa.

Advantages:

Also, it is lighter than steel. Therefore, we choose Carbon fiber for our case. Finally we made a slim case – proximally 0.9-1mm thick and weight 15-17gram. Summary, including unique finish look, awesome product.

Benefits:

Therefore, you will receive over 22% discount from our retail price. If we reach our campaign goal of 44 000$, these textures will not go on sales. Only backer will have it. That’s make you unique among the others.

Tips:

Once you have done funding to our campaign - you are already join to our community “ant colony”. What does it mean? Backer will receive permanent 10% discount, for new item (only 1item) from our new campaign. This offer is available only in this campaign.

Choose your smartphone case and remember code (we will ask you for code):

“ANT Brand Accessories” – brand story:

   The animal with the largest brain in proportion to its size is the ant. An ant brain has about 250 000 brain cells. A human brain has 10,000 million so a colony of 40,000 ants has collectively the same size brain as a human. Some ants can support up to 100x their own weight upside down on glass.  No other insect species is as unbelievable... as sophisticated, and as... well, as powerful as ants. There are a lot of other amazing facts about it and some are still undiscovered.

Such a small and wonderful insect couldn’t leave us without attention when we were choosing the name for our project.

We would like to present you our first product from "ANT Brand Accessories": stylish and durable smartphone cover to fit your needs. Join to our “ant colony" and get special offer for a limited edition at our campaign. It is a real product - ready for production.

Our target:

Build up our community “ant colony”, earn your trust to reveal our high-tech prototypes in next campaigns. We hope with your kind support our next ideas will not die on paper.

Grateful:

We would appreciate every backer for funding and support / assistance in the realization our campaign. Please share it through Facebook and Twitter, we will be grateful. If you do have any questions, contact us at:                antbrandaccessories@gmail.com

Please note:

Backers will be responsible for any all customs, import duties, local taxes you may incur in your country of residence. Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties. We are grateful for your understanding of this matter.

Disclaimer:

Design may be subject to minor changes due production.

story:
• Connect your SlimPort®-enabled mobile device to any HDMI-enabled display. Click here to see if your device is compatible.
    • Control your smartphone remotely from anywhere in the room.
    • Charge your smartphone.
    • Share your favorite media and apps on the big screen.


    Post-campaign purchasing options

    Check out: http://us.slimportconnect.com/slimport-adapter-accessories.









    The NANO∙CONSOLE has applications for everyone. Here are some examples.
    Help us spread the word to your friends who should benefit from the NANO∙CONSOLE!

    With your smartphone used as a powerful streaming device, and the NANO∙CONSOLE's screen mirroring capabilities, you can drop your traditional TV subscription but not forsake your television-watching habits.

    Enjoy on-demand multimedia from your smartphone on the big TV screen for a blockbuster experience. The NANO∙CONSOLE's 4K Ultra HD* video-out capabilities turn your device into a mobile all-in-one media powerhouse.

    *if your smartphone supports 4K UHD resolution for video out.



    Your smartphone is capable of running games and apps equal to those on PCs and consoles.
    Pair a Bluetooth game controller and transform your smartphone into a mobile gaming console. Now you can go head-to-head on the big screen with multiplayer-enabled games, the likes of which you never thought possible.


    It includes a standalone BTLE Smart Mad Catz® M.O.J.O. C.T.R.L. for Android devices in black, as seen in Mad Catz® M.O.J.O.™ Micro-Console™ for Android™. The included C.T.R.L.R has the same solid build as a full-size, console gamepad for ultimate control over Android games:

    • LOW-LATENCY BLUETOOTH SMART – Bluetooth Smart technology enables a super-fast data-exchange rate of 7ms (compared to 100ms for conventional wireless controllers), for reduced lag and extended battery life.
    • INTEGRATED MEDIA CONTROLS – Control volume and playback of video and music.
    • MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT – Connect two or more gamepads for multiplayer games.
    • MOUSE MODE – In this mode, the left analog stick controls your onscreen cursor. Ideal for touchscreen interaction.



    Connect the NANO∙CONSOLE to an HDMI projector and impress colleagues and clients by having instant access to your presentations on your mobile device.



    Connect a Bluetooth keyboard and mouse and turn your phone into an office that goes with you everywhere. Mobile computing has never been easier!




    The NANO∙CONSOLE has an additional HDMI port built in so you can connect additional devices, such as a video player, without needing to swap cables.



    "A very smart idea that I'm flabbergasted no one has tried before. Android users often go to great lengths to cast or mirror their screen on TVs, but simply connecting it via HDMI is a better and more reliable method. The Nano-Console just makes it very easy and attractive to do so." -Tom’s Guide


    “This little device has a smart touch pad that can be used as a remote, with hardware Android buttons for back, home, apps and much more.” - Tweaktown


    Nominated for “Best Mobile Enabled Consumer Electronics Device” 2015 by the Global Mobile Awards




    The NANO·CONSOLE provides you with everything you need to start sharing your screen right away.


    The NANO∙CONSOLE is designed to make connecting your phone to the big screen easier than ever.

    1. Plug the Micro-USB connector that is permanently attached to the NANO·CONSOLE into the Micro-USB port on your SlimPort-enabled device.

    2. Connect your NANO·CONSOLE by running an HDMI cable from the AUX-OUT port on the NANO.CONSOLE to an HDMI-IN port on your big screen.

    3. Set the input on your TV or monitor to the HDMI port the NANO·CONSOLE is connected to. After a few moments, the device’s screen should now be visible on the TV or monitor.

    4. Activate the NANO Remote, set your device to Bluetooth discoverable, and pair the two.

    Voilà, you’re sharing your screen. It’s that easy!

    For more information on setting up your NANO∙CONSOLE please go to www.nanoconsole.com




    1. What do I need to get started?

    The NANO∙CONSOLE only requires a display with HDMI support and an Android* mobile device that supports video out with SlimPort. See supported devices for a list of SlimPort enabled mobile devices.

    *Works best with smartphones using Android 5.0 and above.

    2. Does it work with any smartphone or tablet?

    The NANO∙CONSOLE works with any Android smartphone or tablet that supports video out with SlimPort*. See www.slimportconnect.com for a list of SlimPort enabled mobile devices.

    * Please note, NANO·CONSOLE can work with other video-out technologies, but requires a compatible video-out adapter. Please visit www.nanoconsole.com for more information.

    3. Can I plug in additional HDMI devices?

    Yes. The NANO∙CONSOLE has an additional HDMI port built in so you can connect additional devices, such as a video player, without needing to swap cables.

    For more FAQs, please visit www.nanoconsole.com.


    Hi, we’re Analogix. For over a decade, we’ve been the world leaders in designing high-performance mixed-signals semiconductors that let people experience HD anywhere. We created the NANO∙CONSOLE, and are debuting it on Indiegogo, because we want to bring our passion to a wider, public audience.

story:
★ CLICK HERE ★ Get NuDock Mini for $119 ➜ Visit MiTagg.com

 

                                    
                                    



$200K STRETCH GOAL: Android Model


TIMELINE

FAQ

Can the NuDock Mini really charge my MacBook?

Yes, with its USB-C port, it can charge the new 12-inch MacBook as well as other compatible devices.

Can I control the NuDock Mini from my iPhone? 

Yes, with the MiTagg App you can remotely control the NuDock Mini.

Do I have to remove my iPhone protected case to use NuDock Mini?

No, it is compatible with most protective Cases. 

Can I use NuDock Mini if I have the Apple iPhone 6S or 6S Plus case installed on my device? 

Yes, the NuDock Mini is fully compatible to the official Apple cases. 

Can I charge my iPhone wirelessly? 

No, current iPhone models do not support wireless charging. 

Only Android/Qi compatible devices are supported with the Qi NuDock Mini.

Can I dock my iPad with the NuDock Mini? 

Yes, you can dock your iPad Mini to charge with nearly any case. For bigger sized iPads, we recommend charging them through the USB port on the back of the NuDock Mini.

Can I dock my iPod Touch with the NuDock Mini? 

Yes, you can use your iPod Touch with nearly any case. 

Can I use NuDock Mini with my iPhone 4/4S? 

No, it is designed to work exclusively with Apple’s Lightning Cable, which means it is compatible with iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPod Touch (5th generation) and iPad Mini only.

How is the NuDock Mini powered?

NuDock Mini is powered by a single power supply that is included.

Is the NuDock Mini portable?

Yes, its small size allows to easily fit in luggage or in the NuDock Mini travel case.

I’m outside the USA, will the NuDock Mini work in my country?

NuDock Mini power supply works with 100-240VAC, and International orders ship with universal power plug adapter.

I already have a NuKi Portable Battery, will it work on the NuDock Mini as well? 

Yes, NuKi is fully compatible with NuDock Mini.

Will the NuDock Mini Qi model charge my Android phone?

Only Android phones with Qi wireless charging capabilities models are supported. 

Where do you make the products? 

They are assembled in China. 

When are the perks expected to ship? 

We will fulfill perks in the order they are received. We are aiming to start fulfillment Spring 2016 and it is our goal to ship to all our backers as soon as we can. We will keep our backers informed of our expected delivery timeframes as we get more information during production. Possible delays may occur.

What is the Warranty? 

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you receive your MiTagg Product free of manufacturing defects. We will have 100% AQL inspection levels.

Can I change or cancel my perk? 

Indiegogo’s policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable.

Where do I pay for shipping? 

Shipping costs are added in the additional donation field when you back the campaign as well as in the perks (Shipping Add-On) if you missed it. 

How is shipping handled? 

We will be shipping via air directly from China using DHL as a courier with delivery tracking confirmation. International shipments will be sent via International First Class. 

How much is shipping and handling? 

Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost: $25 for domestic shipping and $40 for International shipping.

Legal Disclaimer: Deliveries of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
story_txt:
★ CLICK HERE ★ Get NuDock Mini for $119 ➜ Visit MiTagg.com
 











                                    

                                    













$200K STRETCH GOAL: Android Model























TIMELINE








FAQ



Can the NuDock Mini really charge my MacBook?
Yes, with its USB-C port, it can charge the new 12-inch MacBook as well as other compatible devices.
Can I control the NuDock Mini from my iPhone? 
Yes, with the MiTagg App you can remotely control the NuDock Mini.
Do I have to remove my iPhone protected case to use NuDock Mini?
No, it is compatible with most protective Cases. 
Can I use NuDock Mini if I have the Apple iPhone 6S or 6S Plus case installed on my device? 
Yes, the NuDock Mini is fully compatible to the official Apple cases. 
Can I charge my iPhone wirelessly? 
No, current iPhone models do not support wireless charging. 
Only Android/Qi compatible devices are supported with the Qi NuDock Mini.
Can I dock my iPad with the NuDock Mini? 
Yes, you can dock your iPad Mini to charge with nearly any case. For bigger sized iPads, we recommend charging them through the USB port on the back of the NuDock Mini.
Can I dock my iPod Touch with the NuDock Mini? 
Yes, you can use your iPod Touch with nearly any case. 


Can I use NuDock Mini with my iPhone 4/4S? 
No, it is designed to work exclusively with Apple’s Lightning Cable, which means it is compatible with iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPod Touch (5th generation) and iPad Mini only.


How is the NuDock Mini powered?
NuDock Mini is powered by a single power supply that is included.
Is the NuDock Mini portable?
Yes, its small size allows to easily fit in luggage or in the NuDock Mini travel case.
I’m outside the USA, will the NuDock Mini work in my country?
NuDock Mini power supply works with 100-240VAC, and International orders ship with universal power plug adapter.


I already have a NuKi Portable Battery, will it work on the NuDock Mini as well? 
Yes, NuKi is fully compatible with NuDock Mini.
Will the NuDock Mini Qi model charge my Android phone?
Only Android phones with Qi wireless charging capabilities models are supported. 
Where do you make the products? 
They are assembled in China. 
When are the perks expected to ship? 
We will fulfill perks in the order they are received. We are aiming to start fulfillment Spring 2016 and it is our goal to ship to all our backers as soon as we can. We will keep our backers informed of our expected delivery timeframes as we get more information during production. Possible delays may occur.
What is the Warranty? 
We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you receive your MiTagg Product free of manufacturing defects. We will have 100% AQL inspection levels.


Can I change or cancel my perk? 
Indiegogo’s policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable.
Where do I pay for shipping? 
Shipping costs are added in the additional donation field when you back the campaign as well as in the perks (Shipping Add-On) if you missed it. 
How is shipping handled? 
We will be shipping via air directly from China using DHL as a courier with delivery tracking confirmation. International shipments will be sent via International First Class. 
How much is shipping and handling? 
Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost: $25 for domestic shipping and $40 for International shipping.
Legal Disclaimer: Deliveries of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
UVindeSir is an elaborate little UV Index meter, Sun Protection Factor (SPF),  and Protection of UVA-1 (PA) reminder for your iPhone/Android with ingenious and expertly built hardware that you can have with you everywhere. Easy to carry and simple to use. It can also measure the current temperature.

UVindeSir + mobile app transforms your smartphone into a ultraviolet index meter.


App view

Winter with UVindeSir

Love the sunshine with UVindeSir

Why UVindeSir?

UV Index is an international standardized numerical value, which indicates the intensity of the UV radiation affecting human skin that reaches the surface of the earth. SPF and PA helps indicate and estimate the time required to reach the maximum amount of UV to which you should be exposed in any specific weather condition.

Knowledge and style of UVindeSir

With UVindeSir, you can choose what kind of SPF to use based on the measurement. City-wide UV numbers are usually available every day, but they can be quite broad and unspecific. In addition, that will (of course) tell you nothing about the UVI in your position or other places you visit. For some, the UVindeSir and associated app will be the best thing since sliced bread (or the introduction of iPhone – your choice).

Tips will tell you how to do
You can measure the UV radiation from the sun and temperature when and where you like. The UV Index can vary widely depending on the following factors: time of year or season, time of day, weather conditions, surfaces, altitude, and regions of the world. Note that the real-time value measured probably differs from the regular renewed value from a forecasting service. This is caused by the sun’s changing position, clouds, altitude, season, and other factors. UV Index and temperature are changing all the time and you can use UVindeSir to track them. It is helpful for you to make decision and limit your exposure to these harmful UV rays.

Usage

 The right App for you

Featured on Media

MAKE: http://makezine.com/2013/11/01/monitor-the-uv-index-with-uvindesir/?utm_source=twitterfeed&utm_medium=twitter&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+%24{makezineonline}+%28%24{MAKE}%29&utm_content=%24{GoogleReader

Goodis: http://www.good.is/posts/uvindesir-the-tiny-uv-index-meter-for-iphone-and-android

ifanr (CN): http://www.ifanr.com/363820

GadsnGifs: http://gadsngifs.com/article.php?id=70#sthash.nEawyBOB.cDKJC7DQ.dpbs

centralfloridatop5: http://centralfloridatop5.com/2013/10/23/live-on-indiegogo-worlds-first-uv-index-detector-for-your-smart-device-meet-uvindesir/

iPhoneclub (NL): http://www.iphoneclub.nl/295959/uvindesir-ultravioletmeter-voor-je-iphone/

Our perks for contributors

Thank you!
We want to share it with all of you.


How to use

With a four pole audio jack enclosed, UVindeSir integrates power extraction, signal processing, and UV Index sensor inside. Simply plug UVindeSir into your iPhone’s audio jack, start the app to allow UVindeSir to gain energy from your iPhone. No external power is required. No network connection is required. The ultra-low power consumption microprocessor inside calculates UV Index and temperature, and then transmits the value into the iPhone via our specific communication protocol. It can even run in the background where you can even set alarms to remind yourself to change your sunscreen based off of the UV Index.

What kind of sunscreen should I choose? When should I replenish my sunscreen? What is the temperature right now? How about my sun glasses, hat, clothing?

We help you understand ultraviolet and this makes your life easier.

With UVindeSir you will know what you want in the simplest way!

It is strongly recommended that you re-measure the UV Index at least every 60 minutes when necessary.

Why we need you?

UVindeSir is small.

We are hardware developers and we have done as much work as possible to reduce the size and power consumption to make it beautiful. We’ve redesigned at least five kinds of prototypes to meet our final goal –beautiful, tiny, and easy to use. Building prototypes and doing a small production run, is very costly for independent engineers and designers like us. We have to build molds, buy several components and pay for the assembly. Therefore, we are asking for support in bringing this device to the hands of the general public.

Improving

Demo show

With your help, we  can make the size of UVindeSir smaller! 

You can help us make it possible.

Some new design from different designers

Limitations

  • UV Index range from 0 to 11.
  • Temperature range from -15° C to +45° C (5° F to +113° F). UVindeSir may not be used as an accurate body thermometer, nor for measurements of fluids. The temperature can be only used for basic understanding of normal temperature. Not replaceable for precision calibrators for temperature.
  • Peak sunlight response bandwidth: 290 - 298 nm
  • Totalsolar response: 290 - 400 nm
  • Resolution: 0.1 UVI
  • Power: No battery needed

More data will be updated later.

Note that if 10, 000 UVindeSir or more are purchased we will need to manufacture and ship these which may cause a  delay based on the large amount of work we have to do.

All the effect picture (design sketch) may have slight deviation.

story:
udoq - THE ULTIMATE APPLE DOCK    - 50% OFF -

for any: iPhone - iPad - iPod - Apple Watch - AirPods

 

udoq is the only patented docking station to:

  • dock any kind of mobile devices

  • dock and slide mobile devices into place

  • dock and remove devices from the dock with one hand

  • view and operate all devices simultaneously while charging

  • dock and charge iPhones X / 8 wirelessly or with included udoq connectors

  • dock any Apple Watch by mounting the Apple Magnetic Charging Cable into our adapter

  • adjust the height of udoq connectors to fit bumpers and cases with up to 8mm thickness

  • charge super-fast with  integrated 5-port charger with 2,4A/port and quick-charge port

  • to hide and secure all USB and Power cables inside udoq

  • mount on any wall surface with the optional WALL MOUNT SET (separately available)

  • exchange connectors to fit older Apple devices and Android devices (separately available)

 

Built for a lifetime and always compatible

  • All connectors, adapters, and chargers can be exchanged from the udoq profile in seconds

  • The high-quality look and the dark gray style of the udoq profile matches perfectly with Apple design

  • The anodized 4mm high-grade aluminum profile stays beautiful and is nearly indestructible

  • udoq cables slide smoothly to any position for a custom arrangement of your mobile devices

  • udoq hides and organizes all cables and connectors to avoid cable clutter

  • udoq cables and adapters are exchangeable to fit any old or new device

  • udoq comes with a 5 port 50W charger so all devices get up to 2,4A for fast charging and a quick charge port to supply the QI ADAPTER.

 

Insert L CABLE (Lightning) and simply adjust connector if you want to charge with a protective case

 

Mount Apple Magnetic Charging Cable and insert APPLE WATCH ADAPTER

 

Insert QI WIRELESS ADAPTER

 

Mount CABLE BOX and insert cables and CHARGER

 

You can help to make this Special Edition come to life

For this special Apple edition, we have chosen dark gray anodized aluminum, designed an Apple Watch Adapter, developed a QI WIRELESS ADAPTER charging plate and added the CABLE BOX for a cleanly organized outcome for Apple lovers.  The ULTIMATE APPLE DOCK will match timelessly with all your Apple products. 

To finalize this ULTIMATE APPLE DOCK we need backers who support us. You will be rewarded with a 50% discount and be the first to receive this solid Ultimate Apple Edition udoq in dark gray.

This special udoq will remain compatible with all other udoq adapters, cables, and accessories and can be customized and expanded anytime at our udoq webshops in the US, EU and Asia.

Our challenges – your support

With your help, we will be able to finalize tooling and production of this highly anticipated edition of the ULTIMATE APPLE DOCK and add it to the award-winning udoq product line.  Our team has been promoting udoq for Android and Apple side by side docking for one year now. With a successful campaign, deliveries are planned to arrive before Christmas 2018.

 

Design studio with worldwide approach

Today we are a small but growing international team, driven by the will and passion to promote innovative and sustainable products to the world.  But we also want to make our co-existence with mobile devices more organized and secure. udoq provides a central location for your mobile devices to spend more time offline, to focus on family and friends. We all need this - EVERY SINGLE DAY.

Docked for today, charged for tomorrow.  

 

udoq is also featured in

 

 

FAQ's

Is the charger included? - Yes, a 5-port power charger is included.

Can I fit a    12,9" iPad Pro? - Yes, all iPads up to 12,9" can be docked, charged and operated safely.

Can I fit my old 30-Pin Apple Devices? - Yes, but you need to get a T CABLE (udoq 30-Pin Cable with our adapter) on the udoq websites.

Can I turn my Apple Watch 90°? - Yes, you can! Closed and open bands fit in multiple positions.

Can I use my Apple cables? - No, in order to change the height of the connectors, to fit protective cases and bumpers, udoq cables have a special design to lock inside the adapters. Good news, you still have your Apple cables for travel or a friend in need.

Can I dock Android devices? - Yes, we offer various types of connector cables and adapters on our websites.

Is udoq available in a different lengths? - The ULTIMATE APPLE DOCK is only available in 400 mm and dark gray. The standard udoq profiles in silver are available online in 250, 400, 550, and 700mm on the udoq websites.

Can I add accessories to this perk? - No, our logistics will only ship this perk as described above.

What power plug comes in the box? - Supporters in the US and Asia will get the US wall plug, Supporters in EU will get the EU wall plug.

Where can I place udoq? - Any flat surface will fit. With both side caps mounted, udoq sits tight on 2 notches in the front and the anti slip silicone rail in the back.

 

Extended udoq manual movies:

Choose your udoq (not possible in this campaign)

 
Setup your udoq
 
Adjust your udoq

story:
What is SecureMyEmail™?

SecureMyEmail™ is a surprisingly easy way you can upgrade *any* email address to use end-to-end encryption. This means that your emails, as well as all of your attachments, are safe, secure, and private. 

  • Very cool email apps for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android are included.
  • It’s ad-free, includes a free trial, and is only 99 cents a year thereafter.

Why do I need SecureMyEmail™

Simply put, your email needs a security upgrade. Badly.

Email was designed without any real security or privacy in mind. Even though we all use it—because it’s so deliciously easy—it is insanely dangerous and insecure. Some 13-year-old Estonian boy is probably reading yours right now. 

With SecureMyEmail™, only you and your intended recipients can read your email and the attachments. No one…not your email provider (Including Google, Yahoo, or Microsoft), an identity thief, or even us, will ever be able to read your email again.

Without getting too geeky, how does it work?


You’ll basically use SecureMyEmail™ like any other email app.
- Download SecureMyEmail™ onto whatever device(s) you use email on.
- Enter your info and create a secret passphrase that only you know.
- We generate your encryption keys and set up your secure email.
- That’s essentially it...
- Then, just invite any contact with whom you wish to exchange encrypted email.
 - When they accept, the encrypted “channel” is created and you’re all done.
 - From then on, just use SecureMyEmail™ as you would any other email software.        Everything else is done for you.
- And, if you just want to use SecureMyEmail™ for encrypted email and a different email app for everything else, that's cool too. It all just works.


Who are you?

Some may know us from WiTopia, https://www.witopia.net where we launched one of the very first consumer VPN services back in March 2005. Today, we offer private and encrypted internet access to users in every country on Earth. We've worked for companies such as UUNET, NTT, AT&T, and Bellcore. We've built IP networks and services, especially surrounding security and encryption, for most of our professional lives. 

We had talked about tackling email’s security issues as our next big project for some time. But, when the Snowden revelations emerged in June 2013, we realized that secure email wasn't just about protecting personal and business communications...it had become a human rights issue to preserve basic privacy and freedom. We got to work!

Why do you need our help?

To do this right has taken an astonishing amount of money and effort. We now realize this is likely why no one ever did it before now. :)

The good news is, after over two years of really hard work, runaway spending, and breathtaking quantities of caffeine, we’re almost done and just need your support for the final push!

What will the funds be used for?

  • Finishing up and testing the Apps for Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android
  • Deploying production infrastructure in Switzerland
  • Exclusive launch in April 2016 for all early beta access perk holders
  • A free year for the invitees of beta access perk holders, and their invitees, and their invitees…until we switch to a paid model (we'll keep this rolling as funds allow)

When will perks be fulfilled?

VPN service and T-shirt perks will be filled asap following campaign’s end. SecureMyEmail™ early access accounts will be issued by end of April 2016. 



I’m a techie and crypto-savvy. Can you share some of what’s under the hood?



We built it with PGP at the core, but with a more modern version of the “Web of Trust.” Users can authenticate to social networks (Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter) within the app to verify their identity to other users. This will not only prevent impostors and potential Man-in-the-Middle attacks but will mitigate Phishing and SPAM.

Instead of taking the shortcut of using browser-based webmail, which can be prone to JavaScript vulnerabilities, and requires the email provider to host users' private keys, we built native secure email clients for Android and iOS, as well as plugins for Thunderbird (Windows and Mac) and the Apple Mail client. We'll add even more over time. This assures not only better performance than webmail, but much greater security.

In a bit of future-proofing, a unique 4096-bit key is created for every user by default. And, you can regenerate these keys whenever you like. Not that you’ll need to. At the risk of being morbid, barring "the Singularity" occurring, we'll all be long gone before anyone can read your email. In fact, it should take thousands of years to crack a single key. Still, just in case, we’ll be keeping an eye on elliptic curves and other cryptographic advances as they develop.

It’s worth mentioning again that, unlike with other approaches,  your private key never has to leave your device to use SecureMyEmail™. But, if  you do wish to securely set up other devices, you can export your key locally, or use our systems to transfer it via an encrypted tunnel to a secure server in Switzerland (best privacy laws). You can even set your key to be destroyed in 30 minutes if you wish! In any event, your key is always encrypted with your secret passphrase *before* it leaves your device.



Frequently Asked Questions

Who should use SecureMyEmail™?

Anyone who wants to be sure their email is safe, secure, and private. Of course, if you’re a lawyer, journalist, businessperson, health care or financial services professional, etc., it's a necessity.

I can really use Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Outlook.com, my work email, or any valid working email address and SecureMyEmail™ can encrypt my email, including any attachments, end-to-end?

Yes. 

So, even my email provider (Google, Yahoo, Microsoft, etc.) can’t read my mail? Not even the scanning of my email to serve me ads?

Correct. Email encrypted with SecureMyEmail™ is end-to-end encrypted. Nobody but you and your secured recipients can read the email or the attachments. 

What about you guys? Can you read my email?

Nope. Your email is secured with a secret password/passphrase that you create and only you know. We never see it and can’t access it. 

How many emails can I encrypt/decrypt for the 99 cents a year?

We have no limit. You just pay 99 cents per email address of yours per year. Send as many encrypted emails as you like to as many contacts as you like. 

Contacts I wish to send encrypted email to must join also, right?

Yes. But we made it super easy to invite people. Plus, after we fulfill all the perks to contributors, and to their invitees, we plan to include a 30 day free trial in the general public release. We want everyone to try it out risk-free, even if the ultimate risk is just 99 cents.

Can I use it on all my devices?

We’ll have apps for Mac, Windows, iOS (iPhone/iPad), and Android. You can send/receive your encrypted email on one device, or all of them. Totally up to you.

Where will SecureMyEmail™ be based? Where will your servers be hosted?

SecureMyEmail™ will be based in Geneva, Switzerland, to offer our customers the best available privacy laws. 

Do I have to use SecureMyEmail™ for all my email or can I continue to use a favorite email client or webmail if I like?

You can use SecureMyEmail™ for all your email or just the email you wish to encrypt, while still using another email client or webmail for general use. You just must use SecureMyEmail™ to read your encrypted email.

Can businesses use SecureMyEmail™ too?

Yes.  Although we will be developing a business version that will provide organizations a dashboard to perform key and user management, Outlook integration, etc.,  SecureMyEmail™ fully supports any email address, including company domains.

I’m an old-school PGP user from way back. Is SecureMyEmail™ compatible?

Yes. You may even import your current PGP key into SecureMyEmail™ if you wish. We also provide methods to enable SecureMyEmail™ users to accept external PGP keys from their contacts if they so desire. 

This all sounds great, but is it easy? 

Yes. Very. If you’re using email currently, have no fear. 

How do I contact you?

You can contact us through Indiegogo, Facebook, or Twitter for a public question or feel free to email us at info@securemyemail.com for general questions, or perks@securemyemail.com for questions about perks.
story_txt:
What is SecureMyEmail™?
SecureMyEmail™ is a surprisingly easy way you can upgrade *any* email address to use end-to-end encryption. This means that your emails, as well as all of your attachments, are safe, secure, and private. 
Very cool email apps for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android are included.

It’s ad-free, includes a free trial, and is only 99 cents a year thereafter.


Why do I need SecureMyEmail™
Simply put, your email needs a security upgrade. Badly.Email was designed without any real security or privacy in mind. Even though we all use it—because it’s so deliciously easy—it is insanely dangerous and insecure. Some 13-year-old Estonian boy is probably reading yours right now. 
With SecureMyEmail™, only you and your intended recipients can read your email and the attachments. No one…not your email provider (Including Google, Yahoo, or Microsoft), an identity thief, or even us, will ever be able to read your email again.




Without getting too geeky, how does it work?





You’ll basically use SecureMyEmail™ like any other email app.

- Download SecureMyEmail™ onto whatever device(s) you use email on.
- Enter your info and create a secret passphrase that only you know.
- We generate your encryption keys and set up your secure email.
- That’s essentially it...

- Then, just invite any contact with whom you wish to exchange encrypted email.


 - When they accept, the encrypted “channel” is created and you’re all done.


 - From then on, just use SecureMyEmail™ as you would any other email software.        Everything else is done for you.

- And, if you just want to use SecureMyEmail™ for encrypted email and a different email app for everything else, that's cool too. It all just works.




Who are you?
Some may know us from WiTopia, https://www.witopia.net where we launched one of the very first consumer VPN services back in March 2005. Today, we offer private and encrypted internet access to users in every country on Earth. We've worked for companies such as UUNET, NTT, AT&T, and Bellcore. We've built IP networks and services, especially surrounding security and encryption, for most of our professional lives. 
We had talked about tackling email’s security issues as our next big project for some time. But, when the Snowden revelations emerged in June 2013, we realized that secure email wasn't just about protecting personal and business communications...it had become a human rights issue to preserve basic privacy and freedom. We got to work!
Why do you need our help?
To do this right has taken an astonishing amount of money and effort. We now realize this is likely why no one ever did it before now. :)
The good news is, after over two years of really hard work, runaway spending, and breathtaking quantities of caffeine, we’re almost done and just need your support for the final push!
What will the funds be used for?



Finishing up and testing the Apps for Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android
Deploying production infrastructure in Switzerland

Exclusive launch in April 2016 for all early beta access perk holders
A free year for the invitees of beta access perk holders, and their invitees, and their invitees…until we switch to a paid model (we'll keep this rolling as funds allow)


When will perks be fulfilled?
VPN service and T-shirt perks will be filled asap following campaign’s end. SecureMyEmail™ early access accounts will be issued by end of April 2016. 



I’m a techie and crypto-savvy. Can you share some of what’s under the hood?


We built it with PGP at the core, but with a more modern version of the “Web of Trust.” Users can authenticate to social networks (Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter) within the app to verify their identity to other users. This will not only prevent impostors and potential Man-in-the-Middle attacks but will mitigate Phishing and SPAM.
Instead of taking the shortcut of using browser-based webmail, which can be prone to JavaScript vulnerabilities, and requires the email provider to host users' private keys, we built native secure email clients for Android and iOS, as well as plugins for Thunderbird (Windows and Mac) and the Apple Mail client. We'll add even more over time. This assures not only better performance than webmail, but much greater security.
In a bit of future-proofing, a unique 4096-bit key is created for every user by default. And, you can regenerate these keys whenever you like. Not that you’ll need to. At the risk of being morbid, barring "the Singularity" occurring, we'll all be long gone before anyone can read your email. In fact, it should take thousands of years to crack a single key. Still, just in case, we’ll be keeping an eye on elliptic curves and other cryptographic advances as they develop.
It’s worth mentioning again that, unlike with other approaches,  your private key never has to leave your device to use SecureMyEmail™. But, if  you do wish to securely set up other devices, you can export your key locally, or use our systems to transfer it via an encrypted tunnel to a secure server in Switzerland (best privacy laws). You can even set your key to be destroyed in 30 minutes if you wish! In any event, your key is always encrypted with your secret passphrase *before* it leaves your device.


Frequently Asked Questions

Who should use SecureMyEmail™?

Anyone who wants to be sure their email is safe, secure, and private. Of course, if you’re a lawyer, journalist, businessperson, health care or financial services professional, etc., it's a necessity.
I can really use Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Outlook.com, my work email, or any valid working email address and SecureMyEmail™ can encrypt my email, including any attachments, end-to-end?
Yes. 
So, even my email provider (Google, Yahoo, Microsoft, etc.) can’t read my mail? Not even the scanning of my email to serve me ads?
Correct. Email encrypted with SecureMyEmail™ is end-to-end encrypted. Nobody but you and your secured recipients can read the email or the attachments. 




What about you guys? Can you read my email?


Nope. Your email is secured with a secret password/passphrase that you create and only you know. We never see it and can’t access it. 
How many emails can I encrypt/decrypt for the 99 cents a year?
We have no limit. You just pay 99 cents per email address of yours per year. Send as many encrypted emails as you like to as many contacts as you like. 
Contacts I wish to send encrypted email to must join also, right?
Yes. But we made it super easy to invite people. Plus, after we fulfill all the perks to contributors, and to their invitees, we plan to include a 30 day free trial in the general public release. We want everyone to try it out risk-free, even if the ultimate risk is just 99 cents.
Can I use it on all my devices?
We’ll have apps for Mac, Windows, iOS (iPhone/iPad), and Android. You can send/receive your encrypted email on one device, or all of them. Totally up to you.



Where will SecureMyEmail™ be based? Where will your servers be hosted?

SecureMyEmail™ will be based in Geneva, Switzerland, to offer our customers the best available privacy laws. 
Do I have to use SecureMyEmail™ for all my email or can I continue to use a favorite email client or webmail if I like?
You can use SecureMyEmail™ for all your email or just the email you wish to encrypt, while still using another email client or webmail for general use. You just must use SecureMyEmail™ to read your encrypted email.





Can businesses use SecureMyEmail™ too?

Yes.  Although we will be developing a business version that will provide organizations a dashboard to perform key and user management, Outlook integration, etc.,  SecureMyEmail™ fully supports any email address, including company domains.
I’m an old-school PGP user from way back. Is SecureMyEmail™ compatible?
Yes. You may even import your current PGP key into SecureMyEmail™ if you wish. We also provide methods to enable SecureMyEmail™ users to accept external PGP keys from their contacts if they so desire. 

This all sounds great, but is it easy? 
Yes. Very. If you’re using email currently, have no fear. 
How do I contact you?
You can contact us through Indiegogo, Facebook, or Twitter for a public question or feel free to email us at info@securemyemail.com for general questions, or perks@securemyemail.com for questions about perks.

story:
After more than a year of hard work, we are finally ready to introduce our latest project!  Meet the first truly useful smartphone mounting system with extremely fast Qi wireless charging! Mount it, charge it, love it! 






Incredibly Fast Charging for iPhone and Android (Qi enabled phones)

XVIDA Wireless Chargers are equipped with a next generation US Texas Instruments chip and proprietary electronics that allow for maximum transfer of power from charger to your phone. This allows us to provide a constant charge at an incredible 0.970A current which is almost 50% more than standard Qi chargers and almost identical to the max. possible iPhone wired charging current of 1A. In other words, it provides wireless charging that’s just as fast as an old-school cable, but with all the extra benefits of next-generation wireless charging.




Universal Mounting and charging

Already own a Qi- enabled smartphone? Then check out StickyPad, our universal magnetic adapter that allows your device to become compatible with all XVIDA Wireless Charging accessories. Simply apply StickyPad to the back of your phone and you will be able to magnetically connect to and charge your phone with XVIDA Mounts & Wireless chargers.




Flawless positioning- 100% Reliability

If you’ve got a wireless charger, you probably know how frustrating it can be to make sure your phone’s charging coil is lined up perfectly with the charger. Move your phone slightly off center, and charging can slow down or simply stop. But it doesn’t have to be this way! Our magnetic locking interface ensures your mobile phone always snaps into optimal charging position, whether it’s in portrait or landscape mode.


Remarkably simple to use 

Our unique magnetic mechanism self-aligns and locks the phone to the mounting point with zero effort. A simple tap is enough to mount your phone securely and start charging it. It is as intuitive as the smartphone itself and useful across a range of applications.


Designed for every environment

XVIDA Smartphone Mounting System with Qi Wireless Charging is a complete collection of functional accessories, designed for home, office and car. 


XVIDA HOME

The XVIDA Wall Mount with Wireless Charging is a small square with a magnetic interface and built-in Qi wireless charging.




The XVIDA Wall Mount with Wireless Charging can be affixed to the wall via slim metal pad with reusable adhesive sticker.



XVIDA OFFICE

XVIDA Desk Stand with Wireless Charging is a perfect combination of sleek, minimalistic design and the ultimate convenience of Qi Wireless Charging technology.



Our aluminum Desk Stand's design and unique magnetic interface make it easy to attach and secure your device, letting you use it effortlessly during charging, in either portrait or horizontal orientation.


XVIDA CAR

XVIDA Car Mounts with Wireless Charging  offer a safe way of charging on the go! Securely mount your smartphone on your windshield, dashboard  or car vent with one simple move!





Designed for horizontal or vertical orientation, XVIDA Car Mounts provide effortless and simple solution for hands-free navigation…and keeping your phone charged, too! 



The slimmest and lightest iPhone charging case

XVIDA wireless charging cases for iPhone 6/6S, iPhone 6/6S Plus, are the slimmest and lightest inductive charging cases on the market, period. They add zero bulk to your phone, yet offer full all-round protection from scratches and accidental drops.






Do you already have a Qi wireless charger at your home or at the office? Great, XVIDA Wireless Charging Case will enable you to use any Qi inductive charger to power your iPhone. You will also be able to use any Qi-compatible wireless charging mat, including the KoolPuck or KoolPad, and wireless charging mats found in such wide-ranging locales as The Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf chain stores in the US, integrated into select furniture from IKEA, in major US airports, and more.



Where are we at and why we need your help?

We’ve been working on XVIDA wireless charging for over a year and half now. All the products you have seen in the video are real, working prototypes, that have been tested for months. We started manufacturing the tooling and all it takes for the production to start, is your pledge. Your contribution will help fund:

  • Packaging design and tooling 
  • First production run 

With your support, we can finally bring seamless wireless power and effortless magnetic mounting to your home, office or car! We hope you’ll join us!



Engineering & Design Process

We started our mission to solve the problem of empty battery by exploring all the available wireless charging technologies and standards, and in the end decided to go with Qi technology as it is the most reliable and widely used among global smartphone manufacturers (Samsung, Nexus, Apple Watch, etc.). When designing XVIDA Wireless Chargers, there were quite a few challenges. The first was how to achieve fast charging and eliminate overheating, but still keep the charging unit very small and compact. This was problematic, because when the components are packed very closely together to reduce size, the result is overheating. And the second was how to combine our existing magnetic mounting system with inductive charging components, but at the same time prevent the magnetic field to decrease the efficiency of inductive charging.


We solved these problems by developing our very own wireless charging components, and by successfully isolating the magnetic field. The solution was then tested for several months and optimized until we achieved the charging rate, equal to the speed of wired charging and overheating was completely eliminated. The result is a complete system of Qi wireless charging accessories, designed according to the standards, developed by Wireless Power Consortium's specifications. Magnetic locking ensures effortless positioning and ensures your phone always aligns in an optimal horizontal/vertical position that allows for a constant maximum transfer of power to the battery.


Who we are 

We're a team of young, driven individuals who believe in constant innovation, European design & craftsmanship, high quality manufacturing and providing a superb customer experience. We are based in beautiful Ljubljana, Slovenia and sunny Los Angeles, California. We started XVIDA because we wanted to be able to do more with our favorite mobile devices, and because we believe mobile accessories should be versatile, easy to use, well made, durable and, above all, beautifully designed. 



- Uroš Čadež   #design #Innovation #kitesurfing 

- Marko Čadež  #software  #analytics #family

- Nejc Jamšek #prototyping  #3Dprinting #motorcycle 

- Maja Andlovic #hootsuite #digital #adwords #yoga

- Suzana Papež #logistics #manufacturing #dance

- Sanja Senveter #numbers #quickbooks #officewizzard

- Lan Orthaber #storytelling #gadgetguy #AppleForever 

With special thanks to Jure Pašič (electronics engineering), Nuframe (animation & postproduction), Bright Visuals (video production), Blaz Svent (video direction), Alysa Salzberg (copywriting)- you guys are awesome!



Press

Interested in featuring our story? On this page  you will find everything you need, including High Res. images. Missing something? Contact us at info@xvida.com

Disclaimer: iPhone, Apple, and Apple logo are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. Android logo is registered trademark of Google Inc.

story:
Get KEble for free by our referral system! Click the link button above and share your custom link! And get $10 discount for each successful referral.
What is KEble?
KEble is the World's first USB cable with built-in flash memory!     

 Designed for Apple Lightning or Micro USB connectors. Add memory to your  iPhone 5 or  Android phone whenever you need it via USB On-The-Go mode!                Charge your smartphone from any USB port.

*Special  blue KEble will be available only at the time of this campaign, all Spec Edition KEbles have 128GB flash memory.

KEble features:

  • Flash memory  8, 16, 32, 64 or 128GB
  • Supports USB OTG (On-The-Go) functionality
  • Expanded storage for tablets and smartphones
  • Compatible with Apple devices with USB OTG support*
  • Compatible with Android 4.0+ devices with USB OTG support
  • Compatible with  Windows mobile devices** 
  • Easily transfer and back up files, photos and videos to free up space
  • Great for storing large files, including movies and music libraries, while travelling
  • Charge phone/tablet from any USB device                                                                  
  • Sync content with computer                                                                              
 * iPhone 5/5s/5c, iPad (4th Gen), iPad mini, iPad Air,iPod touch (5th Generation)       **Charging/sync content, USB OTG not supported by manufacturer

Available in two colors black and white (color preference will be asked at the end of campaign). Choose between Apple Lightning and Micro USB connectors.


Transfer your data between computers like you do with ordinary USB flash        drive.

Make pictures or video and run out of phone memory!? Just plug KEble and 
free up space on your iPhone 5 or Android phone by backing up all your photos, videos and files.

 Works like your ordinary USB cable. Always on your key ring.  

 Always with you!

Charge and sync your phone with computer.   Only 0.8" (4.5mm) thin and 3" (7.5mm)long

      All listed prices is 30% off the retail price.

Free shipping to USA and UK!

Designed to be flexible.                                                                                                       Easy remove from key ring, and hang it back with slider lock.


                       

                         

FAQ

How do I choose the color of the KEble?                                                                      

Once the project is successfully  funded, we will sent a survey via email, and         you can choose you color of the cable.

I  forgot to add shipping!  What should I do?                                                    

Please contribute the shipping amount and select no perk.  We will match your contributions up.

Why KEble with Lightning connector cost $10 more than micro USB?

Because there is more complicated manufacturing process, plus  Apple fees   apply for each Lightning connector.

Will KEble works with Windows Phones?

Yes, you can use KEble to charge/sync content with computer, or like ordinary flash drive. Unfortunately at present time Windows Phone operating system not support USB On-The-Go mode.

I have more questions!

Please contact us by sending e-mail to: kedbi@kedbi.com
