story:
Killer Idea:

Instantly transform 140 characters of text into visually stunning images to Tweet or Retweet. Twitter branding 2.0 starts today!

Turn This: 

Into This:


The app will login to Twitter via the user. 
When a user wants to Retweet someone, or Tweet out on their own, they will choose our icon. It will take the profile pic & 140 characters and offer backgrounds, images and fonts. 
And then they Tweet! 

Market: 

Twitter is already established. Therefore, there is a market of potential advertisers for the freemium model of the app. 


In-app purchases will allow for unlimited Tweets/Retweets per month, premium backgrounds, fonts and pictures. 


We are already working on upgrade ideas for the next release. 

Impact & Reach:

The app can be marketed and used worldwide. 

The app will, primarily, be a boon for marketers, brands, celebrities and public figures. 

The virality potential of this app, in limited testing models, is more than 67% - higher if/when big name Twitter accounts pick it up. Up to 90%

There is already a precedence on facebook and Google+ for text-to-pic with e-cards, memes and other such graphics. Here, in Twitter, the focus, however, is not on a quote or saying, but on a user's actual words - tweets. 

Testing:

We have done some limited testing. The feedback has been amazing. Several people have already asked to join. We have established a Twitter handle, facebook page and domain name. 
We have a mockup of the app in the works. For proprietary and copyright reasons we do not want to publish it on this site - this, after much deliberation. 

Funding:

We need $6,500 to develop the app, edit it, test it and publish it to: Apple, Google & Windows. We have not made plans for Blackberry.  We have the great ideas. We have the marketing. The developer has the tech. YOU have the funding. 

We are already in contact with two top developers who are excited about the project. Here is our model for revenue from the app once published. 

From Advertisement: 

$150,000 - Within 1 year

Assumptions: 

There is already a powerful market of advertisers who want to display on Twitter & Twitter apps. With the virality potential of this app, advertisers and marketers will jump on board quickly!

All advertising formats will be available.

From In-App Upgrades:

Freemium Model

$448,500 (high) - Within 1 year

1. Download for free (with advertisements)

2. In free version, 10 Tweets/10 Retweets per month

   2a. Limited pics/fonts/backgrounds

3. Upgrade #1 for $2.99 

   3a. Unlimited Tweets & Rewtweets

   3b. Unlimted pics/fonts/backgrounds

   3c. Randomly feature user tweets on facebook & twitter account 

In-App purchase estimates based on 150,000 users upgrading over 365 days. 

Numbers:

-Twitter has over 271 million monthly active users 

-78% are accessing Twitter through mobile (where apps are available)

-Some numbers put 64% of those mobile users in a market to buy apps for Twitter that increase branding ability

-There is no other idea out there like this - the virality potential for this app is extremely high on its own. Once launched and used by a few big names & celebrities, the potential increases exponentially 

-Celebrities, brands & campaigners are going to jump at this app
story_txt:
Killer Idea: Instantly transform 140 characters of text into visually stunning images to Tweet or Retweet. Twitter branding 2.0 starts today!
Turn This: 


Into This:





The app will login to Twitter via the user. 
When a user wants to Retweet someone, or Tweet out on their own, they will choose our icon. It will take the profile pic & 140 characters and offer backgrounds, images and fonts. 
And then they Tweet! 
Market: 
Twitter is already established. Therefore, there is a market of potential advertisers for the freemium model of the app. 
In-app purchases will allow for unlimited Tweets/Retweets per month, premium backgrounds, fonts and pictures. 
We are already working on upgrade ideas for the next release. 
Impact & Reach:
The app can be marketed and used worldwide. The app will, primarily, be a boon for marketers, brands, celebrities and public figures. The virality potential of this app, in limited testing models, is more than 67% - higher if/when big name Twitter accounts pick it up. Up to 90%There is already a precedence on facebook and Google+ for text-to-pic with e-cards, memes and other such graphics. Here, in Twitter, the focus, however, is not on a quote or saying, but on a user's actual words - tweets.  Testing:
We have done some limited testing. The feedback has been amazing. Several people have already asked to join. We have established a Twitter handle, facebook page and domain name. We have a mockup of the app in the works. For proprietary and copyright reasons we do not want to publish it on this site - this, after much deliberation.

story:
Mipow Wireless Powerbank

Compatibility List

Flexible In Outdoor

Quality dual-use power bank

Wireless Power bank smart casing

Multiple charging methods

Parameter and specification

Safety and security charging

When connecting the device, wireless power bank will intelligently detect and provide the current size required by the device, to ensure safe and reliable fast charging. Built-in fault safety circuit to identifies over voltage, over current, leakage, over heating and other circuit failures, self-cutting power to achieve multiple protection.

Super fast response time : Contact to start charging immediately

Low standby current : Ensure minimum power at idle time

Foreign detection : Communicated with the device to ensure that the power supply is only sent to a compatible wireless device.

Choose your favourite color

story:
Let it successfully achieve 2-in-1, a quick transformation from wireless charger into  charger stand. Do you still need a bulky combo of charger stand and power bank to recharge your phone? Have you ever seen such a portable power charger? Let MOVER+ achieves transform between charger stand and portable wireless charger in one second, bringing you a whole new experience which is more technology than ever.

On-the-Go power for your Devices. Rejuice not only your power bank, but also your cell phone, you just need to put them onto MOVER+. Put and go-that is all that is needed to finish charging. When you leave your home to head out for the day, bring the Mover+ portable power bank along with. Quickly remove the Mover+ from the charging dock and transform it into a fully-portable 6000mAh portable charger to charge your devices wirelessly or through the built-in USB port.

With Mover+, you never have to meet the dead battery when you need it .Charge the battery whatever you want and keep it full.Super convenient charging dock allows you to charge the portable battery and the phone easily. Just put and keep charging anytime to experience power supply all the time.  

Instead of spending time fumbling with cables, losing them or dealing with broken cables, switch to a wireless solution and say goodbye to cables forever! The Mover+ dock only takes a few seconds to plug in and provides a simple and efficient charging solution for your new smartphone.

 

The Mover+ allows for simultaneous discharging and charging, meaning you can charge your smartphone while the Mover+ power bank charges. Because of pass through features, your phone will receive the most energy first so that you can get going sooner.

 

Qi wireless charging technology is the new standard for wireless charging among the most popular smartphones in the world. The Mover+ is Qi-certified to work with the latest smartphones including the iPhone 8, iPhone 8+, iPhone X, and Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+ and other Qi-enabled smartphones.

Get your phone to a full charge in half the time it takes for other wireless chargers, The Mover+ supports fast charging up to 10W, comparing with Apple charging 7.5W, for fast charge-enabled smartphones and will quickly reduce charging time for other devices.

It achieves fast charging for either fast charge support smartphones or standard charge compatible smartphone. Fast charge mode enables wireless charging up to 2⨉ faster(Note 8/ Note 5  S8/S8 Plus S7/S7 edge  S6 edge Plus), for standard charge mode, still up to 1.5x faster than traditional wireless chargers( iPhone X  iPhone 8  iPhone 8 Plus).

Say goodbye to bulky phone cases and portable power banks and say hello to the future with Mover+. The Mover+ is incredibly compact at only 0.4 inches thin, perfectly handheld for your next adventure.

Whether watching a movie in landscape mode or texting in portrait mode, you can set your device on the Mover+ wireless charging pad however you prefer. The power bank features two smart coils to make this possible, making device orientation no longer an issue.

 

 

Charging Dock

·      Input: DC 5V/2A, DC 9V/1.67A max

Power Bank

·      Rated capacity: 6000mAh/18.5Wh Input: DC 5V/2A

·      USB Output: DC 5V/2.4A max

Wireless Charging

·      Output: 10W

·      Transmission Distance: <8mm

·      Conversion Efficiency: ≥72%

We are a team of young people who are extremely curious about high-tech products. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags; Uniqueness is our philosophy. The life improvements and changes that are brought by new technology and products are the greatest pleasure for us. We are willing to be the earliest supporters and participants of creative products. We hope to gather a group of friends who are just like us, so that together we can seek the latest technology products, share the product experience, provide more suggestions for the products before mass production and help the product to become reality.

1. What type of smartphone is the MOVER+ compatible with?

The MOVER+ is compatible with all Qi-certified devices. For example, iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 8, Samsung S8, Samsung S8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 7, Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, Google Nexus 4、5、6、7 , Microsoft Lumia 950 XL, Blackberry Priv, Blackberry Z30, LG Lucid 1,  LG G6, Motorola Droid Maxx, Motorola Droid Mini, Motorola Droid Turbo etc.

2. How many devices the MOVER+ can charge at the same time?

The Mover+ gives you two options to charge your devices at lightning fast speeds; either set your Qi-enabled device on the power bank or plug your device’s USB charge cable into the full-size USB (5v/2.4a) output of the edge. The Mover+ also features a Type-C input port (5v/2a) with fast recharge capabilities.   

3. Is the power bank only can be recharged by charger doc?

There are two choices that you can recharge the power bank, by doc or by USB output.

4. What are the safety features of the MOVER+?

Each Mover+ is guaranteed safe for recommended usage with built-in safety functions to ensure you and your devices are protected from any unexpected jolts. Included in the Mover+ is over-voltage protection, short-circuit safety functions, over discharge, overcharge, over high temperature, and overpower safety protections. Quickly charge your smartphone or carry the Mover+ in your pocket all day without worrying about any stray electric charges or battery failure.

5. When you will be shipping the MOVER+?

We will be shipping out our perks in May, 2018.

6. What include in the box?

The box includes a wireless power bank, a charging doc, a user manual.

story:
Liquid Screen Shield is an inventive way of protecting all of your electronic screens by using an invisible nano coating on the surface of your device. The Liquid Screen Shield protects against scratches, bacteria, water spills, and dust. The Liquid Screen Shield goes on crystal clear and will not affect the sensitivity of your device unlike regular screen protectors that create awful air bubbles.


The Liquid Screen Shield works by using nanotechnology. The word Nano in Greek means small and we use them in the scientific sense. With Liquid Screen Shield, the coating is 2000x times thinner than a human hair.



Life Span: 1 year

Hardness: 9 Mohs scale of hardness

Invisible coating

Capacity: 3-4 Smartphones

Shelf Life: 18 months after opening

Non Toxic

Non Hazardous

Bottle size: 1ml

Flammability: None 

Odor: None


Liquid Screen Shield can be used on a wide variety of objects and screens, some of them include phones, tablets, Mp3 players, laptops, camera lenses, glasses.





Here is the timeline as it follows. We added in an extra week in case we run into a problem. Expect your rewards to be shipped out by the latest December 12th. 

October 1st - November 5th: funding

November 6th - November 20th: Payment processing

November 21th - December 11th: Manufacturing and packaging

December 12th: Ship out your Liquid Screen Shield

****Christmas wrapping is available upon request


If you have ANY issues at all with your pledge or questions, please contact us right away. We would be happy to help resolve any concerns you may have. Feel free to send us a message or email.
Email: support@liquidscreenshield.com

story:
What is woodster?Wood TypesWhich height?Ergonomic featuresSupported iMacsUSB 3.0/2.0Colors?Contribution PackagesBrandingYour brandingAll stepsWhy 6.000€?BitcoinPress releases



What is the woodster?

woodster is the natural solution of getting your iMac or Thunderbolt Display to a new level of view. Have you ever suffered from neck pain caused by not having the ergonomically optimal seat/desk-relation? Do you need your iMac or Thunderbolt Display in a higher position?

woodster made from local German wood lifts up your iMac or Thunderbolt Display to a higher position so you can work more comfortably. Even if you have never had neck pain issues, the woodster will add a modern natural touch to your working area.

Your woodster can be combined with two front 3.0 USB ports which make it easier to connect your USB-Drive on the front rather than on the back of your iMac or Thunderbolt Display.
 

Are there different wood types?

We would like to make it easy for you to choose the right wood-type that matches your work area. Three different wood-types can be chosen, each one in three different heights (3cm / 5cm / 8cm).


Which height do I need?

The perfect height for you depends on your chair-table combination. To help you find the height you need, open this page and follow the instructions. 

What does ergonomic mean?

Ergonomic denotes the relation between your chair, your table and your monitor resulting in your sitting position which is important for your well-being. Sub-optimal combinations can lead to pain in the neck, the shoulders or the back. woodster might help you improve your individual ergonomic working position. You have to consider that this is not a guarantee but a possible solution. Many factors contribute to your personal working place being ergonomic and healthy.

Just try it yourself.

Does it support my iMac/TBD?

During the future order process you can choose your iMac version (starting with iMac produced in 2009) and you will get the woodster matching exactly the stand of your iMac. Thunderbolt Display from 2011.

My iMac/TBD has no USB 3.0, can i use the USB-Version?

Yes, of course! USB 2.0 is also supported. It is just not as fast as USB 3.0 ;)

Are there different colors?

As the woodster is a natural product, we leave the wood as it is cut from the tree. Simple and beautiful. However, as there are three different wood-types, you can choose the type that is right for your iMac.

How can you contribute?


Branding

Every woodster gets a branding with our name holzgefuehl. Each branding is unique and will have a special look. 



Your Branding

If you order the "Six woodster Branded", "Twelve woodster Branded" or "Twelve woodster Branded USB" Package you get a custom branding on front of the woodster. We will later send you the dimensions which are possible and you tell us what logo or text you would like to have. The non-USB version has the branding in the middle, the USB-one on the left or right side of the front. Otherwise you can also tell us to put it on the side for example. 

 

All of the steps

Why does the project need 6.000€ to get started? 

Some things need to be purchased in a package of more than one hundred, for example the USB Ports. To get a good price I would need to order more than 500 pieces at once. Here are some more examples:

  • Product Packages
  • Packaging material
  • Wood in the three different types

In order to provide the woodster for this reasonable price, we need to produce at least more than 20-30 at the same time. 

And we still do not have the appropriate office that allows us to store the woodster and process orders you will make.

These are just a few examples as to why I need your financial support.

Otherwise we will not be able to start the woodster production. 


We are happy to get your feedback! If you like the project we are looking forward to see your contribution. Thank you! Without your help we won't be able to start!


Donate with BITCOINS

If you like you can also donate with BITCOINS. Here you find the adress:

1CXzQTKeP5P1Yv27CquRwM1FYSJ338my8W

story:
!!!This week only!!!

Exclusive price for Indiegogo supporters only!!!

 

We have renewed design a little. Its much more ergonomic now and morden.
Moreover, we have added few new colors! 
So, now you can choose any color you like, regardless of what your original preference was. 
​

 Z Technology is an absolutely new device!

 

It will turn your old iPhone/iPad into a video monitoring camera.
It has more features, than any other device on market: 
 
Z Technology has more features, than any other device on market: 
• Charger, up to 3 devices 
• Accumulator 10000 mAh
• Home Security Camera
• 360° Live streaming
• Spy Cam
• Baby Sitter
• Motion Allerts
• Detection Zones
• Face and time recognition
• Video Summary of the day
• Cloud Storage 

Charger, up to 3 devices 

Accumulator 10000 mAh 

              

Z Technology could be used as a charger for up to 3 devices. You don't have to keep it plugged in all the time - as Z Technology has a built in battery for 10000mAh. More over, to give you full view - it rotates 360 degrees!

 

Featured on the Gadget flow

 

360° Live streaming

 

 

Being away doesn’t mean you shouldn’t know what’s happening.  

Z Technology - not only provides you with a smarter view of your home, but also empowers smarter decisions that result in safer homes.
 

You will have a 360-degree view of your home, guarding everything from your home’s security to tracking its physical state.

Z Technology designed to fit elegantly anywhere: in your home or office.

Baby Sitter

Z Technology delivers no matter where you go with its free accompanying mobile app. Its real-time alert system, depending on your personal preferences it will alert you of irregularities that matter to you and your home, whether it’s triggered by unexpected motion that could signal an intrusion or a cat playing around .

Z Technology is as intelligent as you are!

A child monitor that you can view from all over the world!
Z Technology will alert you when your child starts to make noises or moves in the crib.

Home Security Camera
Detection Zones

Or you can merely enjoy these first steps your baby is making, even though you are away. Not to mention, monitoring your babysitter's work.

 

Let Z Technology know what to monitor with Detection Areas.

Detection Areas are a good way to cover out areas of the screen that you don't want to activate an alert for (ie: a curtain blowing in the wind).
Detection zones could be found in the settings menu of the device you're using as your camera. Draw a mask over the areas that you don’t want to trigger motion. The mask will remain on for all recordings until you remove it.

A push notifications or email alerts are set from your Z Technology’s settings menu. 

 

 

Face and time recognition

Thanks to its Face Recognition function, Z Technology is able to send the names of the people it sees directly to your smartphone.
The time of entrance and exit will be recorded.  

Furthermore, Z Technology will alert you when it sees a stranger.
You could use this feature both for your house and for your work!

 

Video Summary of the day

We know that you are extremely busy and to save you some time -
Z Technology will create a time lapse video for you! 

All you need to do is set it up and enjoy once you have time! 

 

Motion Allerts

 Z Technology is a great way to keep an eye on your pet.
You can see, hear and even speak to them in case they do something naughty or you just want to say hi!

Cloud Storage 

Z Technology sends your video straight up to the Z Technology's servers in 'the cloud'

All of the footage/activities recorded in a day will automatically get synced up to a Z Technology cloud. 

Our mission

With Z Technology, our mission is to make peace of mind for everyone.
Your pledge will contribute to our pursuit of this, and allow us to not only complete development and manufacturing of our flagship product, but also continue our work towards creating a complete system of Z Technology smart home products.

We will be taking the funds from Indiegogo to move directly into tooling and production, we already have agreements with Original Equipment Manufacturers in Taiwan, to begin production as soon as funding is secured. We expect Z Tech to retail for $85+.

As a thank you for backing our project, we would like to give you an opportunity to get ZTechnology for free!
Wondering how to get it? 
All you have to do is SHARE our campaign!
Once  5 of Your Friends pledge for device – You will get one for free! 

Steps to get FREE ZTechnology dock station:

Copy your unique URL link and SHARE on your social media accounts

5 of Your Friends pledge for device

You will get one ZTechnology dock station for FREE! 

      

We have designed simple yet attractive packaging for Z Technology.
Hope you will have nice experience whilst unboxing our product.
story_txt:
!!!This week only!!!
Exclusive price for Indiegogo supporters only!!!
 

We have renewed design a little. Its much more ergonomic now and morden.Moreover, we have added few new colors! So, now you can choose any color you like, regardless of what your original preference was. ​
 Z Technology is an absolutely new device!

 
It will turn your old iPhone/iPad into a video monitoring camera.
It has more features, than any other device on market: 
 

Z Technology has more features, than any other device on market: 

• Charger, up to 3 devices • Accumulator 10000 mAh• Home Security Camera• 360° Live streaming• Spy Cam• Baby Sitter• Motion Allerts• Detection Zones• Face and time recognition• Video Summary of the day• Cloud Storage 
Charger, up to 3 devices 
Accumulator 10000 mAh 


              
Z Technology could be used as a charger for up to 3 devices. You don't have to keep it plugged in all the time - as Z Technology has a built in battery for 10000mAh. More over, to give you full view - it rotates 360 degrees!
 
Featured on the Gadget flow



 
360° Live streaming
 

 
Being away doesn’t mean you shouldn’t know what’s happening.  Z Technology - not only provides you with a smarter view of your home, but also empowers smarter decisions that result in safer homes. You will have a 360-degree view of your home, guarding everything from your home’s security to tracking its physical state.
Z Technology designed to fit elegantly anywhere: in your home or office.


Baby Sitter
Z Technology delivers no matter where you go with its free accompanying mobile app. Its real-time alert system, depending on your personal preferences it will alert you of irregularities that matter to you and your home, whether it’s triggered by unexpected motion that could signal an intrusion or a cat playing around .
Z Technology is as intelligent as you are!

A child monitor that you can view from all over the world!Z Technology will alert you when your child starts to make noises or moves in the crib.
Home Security CameraDetection Zones
Or you can merely enjoy these first steps your baby is making, even though you are away. Not to mention, monitoring your babysitter's work.
 
Let Z Technology know what to monitor with Detection Areas.
Detection Areas are a good way to cover out areas of the screen that you don't want to activate an alert for (ie: a curtain blowing in the wind).Detection zones could be found in the settings menu of the device you're using as your camera. Draw a mask over the areas that you don’t want to trigger motion. The mask will remain on for all recordings until you remove it.
A push notifications or email alerts are set from your Z Technology’s settings menu. 
 

 
Face and time recognition
Thanks to its Face Recognition function, Z Technology is able to send the names of the people it sees directly to your smartphone.The time of entrance and exit will be recorded.  


Furthermore, Z Technology will alert you when it sees a stranger.You could use this feature both for your house and for your work!

story:
How many of you have an alarm system but forget to arm it before leaving the house? Hevo can detect intruders EVEN if your alarm is not armed.

You have an alarm system and would like to add smart home features like controlling your lights or locking your door with the press of a button. With Hevo, you can keep your current alarm system and add new age technologies.

SMART HOME CONTROLLER


With a smart phone device, you can control the lights, door locks, and electrical outlets in your entire house. HEVO allows you to create a series of commands that HEVO will execute. You could create a good-night scene that will turn on/off all lights, televisions and close all of the window treatments in the entire house. All that with a single click!


RETROFIT TO ANY ALARM SYSTEM

Control your existing alarm system with your smart phone and/or create a scene that would involve your existing alarm system. HEVO has the capability to connect directly to the BUS (communication system) of your current alarm system. This allows HEVO to be aware of any possible threats.


PATROL: THE OPERATING SYSTEM TO BEAT!


Most alarm system owners think that having an central alarm connection is imperative, what they don't know is that the alarm system relies on a single wire that is accessible outside your home. In the event, that the wire is cut or dysfunctional, HEVO with PATROL is still protecting your household.

PATROL is the operating system that drives HEVO. We developed an advanced OS that enables HEVO to be smarter and more clever.  PATROL offers a two way monitoring system. PATROL is installed on every HEVO and also installed on our server that monitors every HEVO installed in real time.

PATROL allows four (4) levels of security if a threat is detected:

                                                       

PATROL will try to send the alarm signal from your alarm system through the Internet; If for any reason, that level failed it moves to LEVEL 2.

                                                        

PATROL will try to send the alarm signal from your alarm system through GSM / Cellular Network. If for any reason, that level failed it moves to LEVEL 3.

                                                       

We monitor in real time each and every HEVO installed. If we detect that one HEVO is not connected, we alert you and/or the emergency services. 

                                                        

PATROL can detect intruders EVEN when your alarm is not armed. PATROL has the ability to detect family members inside the house. If PATROL detects movement and no family member is present, it will trigger stage one and alert you of a possible threat.


RADIO FREQUENCY (RF)

HEVO can control any device that operates at 315 MHZ. It has the ability to learn and send RF signal.

HEVO can control:

  • All of your window treatments
  • Fireplaces
  • LED Strips
  • Any other device that operate at the 315 MHZ


ADVANCED SMART PHONE APP.

We developed an advanced smart home application that will be available on Iphone or Android. Within that application you can control lights, audio-video equipment, create scenes...


CONTROL AUDIO-VIDEO


Out of the box, Hevo can control all of the audio and video equipment in your house. Within our application, you can control rooms and assign your audio / video equipment. Finally a solution to those 11 remotes... By the press of a button, our application will turn on your TV, your home theater, set all the right inputs and set the right channel...

PERKS!

Credit Card Protector - protect your identity.

SmartPhone Wallet $25

Fits all smartphone (Android or Iphone)

Backers Polo $50

Get our backers polo and be proud to be wear it anytime! Thanks to you guys, we are one step closer!


HEVO $499 with 12 month subscription.

For $499 you get the most advanced smart home controller!

What is in the box?
  • HEVO
  • 12 months subscription for our Interactive platform and cellular service (GSM)
  • Power Supply and cables.


Meet the team that made HEVO possible. Each and every one of us sacrificed a lot in the process of making HEVO possible. We built a very unique and versatile device that fits in a vast market.  We are dedicated, skilled and visionary... We are HEVO!


The last 3 years were not always easy, we worked hard and we managed to get to work done. Now that we have our first version of the Hevo... what's next?

Within our next milestone, we need to improve and add features to our interactive platform and allow Hevo to stay in front of the pack! Our team is dedicated and committed to offering a product that users will love using. Here's the estimated use of funds.


FAQ
If you have any question, please feel free to look at our FAQ. If your question is not answered here then please send us an email!

Q: Can I install HEVO everywhere in the world?

A: That is our goal, at this point, we support USA and Canada.


Q: What happens after my 12 months subscription?

A: If you decide to keep your services with us, you would need to get a monthly or annual package.  Those will be offered via our dealers.


Q: Is the shipping included?

A: YES! Shipping is included in the USA and Canada


Q: What kind of warranty does HEVO come with?

A: HEVO comes with a standard 12 months. If you have any problem with the product, please contact us and we will make sure we find a solution.


Q: Who installs HEVO?

A: Installing HEVO is very simple and straightforward. It can be done by any tech savvy person or if you would like, after your purchase, send us an email, and we can help find a dealer nearby!


Q: When will I receive my perks?

A: At the latest, 30 days after the end of our Indiegogo campaign


Q: Can HEVO connect to any alarm system?

A: HEVO can connect natively to any DSC and Honeywell alarm system. It can also connect to any alarm system that offers a network bridge.


There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn HEVO into a reality by sharing this campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons on the left of the campaign video and let the world know about our awesome HEVO. 

Thank you for your support!

story:
The Smartest Key Holder

The Ekster Key Holder is a minimalist solution that keeps all your keys organized, secure, and easy to access. 

 

 
 

1. Say goodbye to clutter

It's never been easier to access the right key. The Ekster Key Holder organizes all your keys in a compact, silent stack, which you can flip through with just one hand. Say goodbye to keys jingling in your pockets, or jabbing you in the leg. 
 

2. Never lose your keys again

Lost your keys? Just ring them, or locate them on a map using your phone, Google Home, Alexa or Siri. You'll receive alerts if you leave them behind, and you can use the tracker to ring your phone too. Bonus: use the tracker as a remote control for group selfies. 
 

3. Let there be light

A built-in LED light ensures that you'll always find the right key and that you won't scratch your car or door in the dark. The light flashes when you ring your keys, so you'll be able to find them even in the darkest of corners.   
 

4. Carry smarter

This Key Holder stores 3-8 keys comfortably and is built for easy assembly on the go; no tools necessary. It comes with a magnetic add-on, allowing you to attach larger keys (like car keys) without the hassle.     
 

 

Track Record 

 

The Key Holder

 

The Key Tracker 

 

Perks

 

Timeline

We're almost ready to go on this project. We have our mass-production plants up and running; we've tested these products for several months, and we're good to go. All we need to start mass production is funding. 

Prototyping
 

Ekster products are designed to hit the perfect balance of minimalism and function. We conducted thorough market research on current products like this. It was an extremely challenging project to conceptualize, with hundreds of other key organizers on Kickstarter alone.

Our process involved a lot of prototyping, working with 3D-printed micro-iterations in-house, and collaborating with engineers in other continents to design the best product possible. We were lucky to have a team that worked with us to push every possible millimeter, helping us to build the world's thinnest key tracker. 
 

 

Thank You

Here at Ekster, we're in the business of making your life easier. We started with upgrading the traditional leather wallet, making it easier to use and harder to lose. You trusted us during our first three campaigns, and that's a big part of why we're back here today with another essential upgrade: the Ekster Key Holder and Tracker.

In the last four years, we've gone from a dorm room in America to an office in Amsterdam's biggest tech hub; from a team of four to twenty employees; from an idea to the world's largest smart wallet brand. And we couldn't have done it without your support. After years of hard work and dedication, we’re once again ready to show you why you made the right choice in backing us.
 

 

Shipping

 

Our community's everywhere, and we ship almost everywhere too. Our worldwide shipping covers over 150 countries. Please note: in some rare cases you will be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region or country. For the EU and North America, all duties will be covered by Ekster.

This is a new project, built on the same philosophy we've always had: total transparency with our backers. We'll keep you updated every step of the way; we've learned a lot of lessons from three successful campaigns, so we know what you need to feel confident in this project. Since our last campaign, our team is bigger, our planning has improved, and we've nurtured strong ties with our fulfilment companies. We also thought ahead by ordering the materials for this project in advance, so everything's in place to get your products to you on time.

We're serious about quality control, and we stand by our products. If an issue occurs, we'll always replace products that have manufacturing defects. Please note: only products with manufacturing defects can be exchanged. We cannot give refunds, but we do offer store credit. Feel free to reach out to us at nest@ekster.com with any questions!

 

Complete your order

 

1) After your order, we'll send you a Backerkit Survey. You can pick out the color you want, add any other products you'd like, and confirm your address.

2) Your bank account or Paypal will be charged for your products. If you added any additional products through Backerkit, you'll be charged for those a few days later.

3) Your order is marked ready to ship as soon as you complete your survey. We'll keep you in the loop about the status of your shipment through our campaign updates.

4) We'll send you a tracking number as soon as your package is on its way to you.

Need help? We're here for you. If you need to get in touch with us at any time during or after our campaign, shoot us an e-mail at nest@ekster.com

story: two nights ago is when the issues started but it's now apparent that my laptop is on it's last leg. I need to get it replaced before it dies. Here's the hitch. I'm moving in 8 weeks to a new city and I need to save money for the move. With your help I'm hoping to get a new lap top that will allow me to keep working. Modeling have become so important to me. Not because of the money, but because I truly love what I do! I feel that is rare that a person loves their job, but I really do. With the money that is raised I'm looking to get a MacBook Pro. This would allow me so much more freedom in photo and video editing,storage, and not to mention it wont crash during a LIVE show!

story:
15 days only offered at dealer price = normal 449usd.



___________________________

___________ 

Folktek has admittedly often been inaccessible for many people as the incredibly small production and one-of-a-kind pieces have been both costly and time consuming to create. The intention with this piece is to get some Folktek into the hands of anyone who's ever wanted some. 

Folktek has been around for years and made hundreds of unique instruments, and here's another! In the design vein of the Folktek Triad (shown below) and made to work with any or all of three. More photos and details here; http://folktek.com/instruments/symbiotic/aethermateriamentalis-triad-overview


If you've somehow never seen folktek works, have a gander at the broad array at folktek.com

_____________________


The Conduit:

A symbiotic touch-based drone synthesizer based on a delay which then travels to a filter. Creating swells of oscillation that can delve into eternal noisy feedback territory as one desires. Connect to a sequencer to control the time/pitch and pull forth some powerful  synthesis.

Additionally the touch board is a control voltage generator/keyboard sending 0-5v in .5v increments. 

Note that the final will be slightly different than what's shown. The circuit's been redesigned to have the two outer knobs taken up on the panel to provide more space for the jacks with less interference.


______________________
Features:

  • touch pads; 8 polyphonic notes + noise + pitch: all sensitive to touch. These are synchronous with the delay clock, meaning delay time = oscillator pitch. All notes are tuned with one another so the pitch is a master control.
  • Oscillation and/or incoming audio sent through on-board filter: for further manipulation.
  • CV controllable: over delay time/master pitch (+0-5v).
  • Touch panels generate CV: signals from +0-5v in .5v increments to control your modular gear (it's a cv keyboard).
  • Audio input: to get your sound into some delay and filter goodness. Expect the delay to be a noisy little bastard (this is a drone synthesizer). For a clean delay and filter signal, however, one can disconnect the touch plates and use it strictly as an effects unit for synthesizers, guitar, etc. Cv controls delay time.
  • Delay: True vintage analog sound delay. The delay goes from extremely tight to some unspecified, very long, very noisy time. The range of the time knob has been allowed to extend to incredibly long times by allowing the degradation of quality beyond a second or so, allowing the sound to get into very lo-fi and grimy territory.
  • Filter: Single knob style filter with fixed resonance allows for a nice, rich sweep.
  • Adaptable with other Folktek works: Without sending the audio output anywhere, the oscillators will travel through the players' body and into Materia, Mentalis and/or Aether to be further manipulated (examples in videos).
  • All 3.5mm jacks
  • High quality parts, solid construction.
  • Bamboo box with dark splines.
  • 12v operation with included power supply

______________________


For the experimenter/designer/installation artist:

This circuit has been designed to be easily removed  if one desires - to be rebuilt or recreated in any number of ways if a person should choose to get creative. Connectors (headers) on the board are present for the touch points, CV in and out, audio in and out, LED power, and regulated voltage outputs, etc.

This allows for anything to be wired out to anything else without ever soldering to the circuit. One could do some slight dis-assembly from the body, create a touch-based sound installation, for example, and put everything back the way it came without ever having damaged or altered the circuitry.

Additionally, for those into modifying circuits, the circuitry is easily accessible and there are plenty of ways one could reroute things. 

  • Send touch connectors to anything metal to create new touch panels
  • Send the point to circuit paint and create playable art works
  • Add circuits and power them with this one circuit (12v and 9v power outputs)

_______________________


_______________________

About Folktek and production:

Over the years, there has never been any folktek work created with an initial production run of greater than 25. In fact, many folktek works are historically entirely one of a kind. Some, like the gardens (illuminist, luminist and micro) have gone through several small production runs of 25 or less created at one time over the course of months, while some others have taken just as long or longer to create a run of just 10!

How this piece differs slightly from other Folktek works;

This Conduit is offered here to help with production. Your contribution will determine the number of instruments being made. Currently 50 instruments are in production and set to be complete and ready to ship just 2 weeks after this short 2 week campaign. If just ten were to sell, we'd buy the parts needs for all 50 and stop production there. If people want more, we can make more.

The cost of the Conduit is low compared to other folktek works because we've dedicated ourselves to extending production, while still not overextending ourselves into mass-production (something we've always strayed away from). Our goal is set low because the funds needed to finish these works is for small parts like quality knobs and house-made lamps.

________________________

Spead the word:

Save 20 bucks by referring someone. If you buy a Conduit, tell someone else to buy a conduit and if he/she writes your name "message to campaign team" on the perk contribution page, we'll refund you $20 via paypal when all is said and done. One referral refund per person. But please, refer lots of people.

________________________

Keeping it simple:

We're keeping this campaign simple - no stickers, no downloads, no extra doodads...Just the quality built instrument.

Pay for one Conduit at this initial discounted price, get one. Want more than one? double the price, do the math and add it to the total on the total on the contribution page. Please include a "message to campaign team".

If you missed this, the Conduit will be available in limited quantities after this campaign is finished at a price of $449 via folktek.com.

Funding goes into production. 50 are ready to ship once the parts we need to buy are placed on the panels.

If we happen to exceed 50, we're set to go into further production - from the pcb manufacturing and part mounting, to the panel drilling and the woodworking. Files, Jigs and materials are ready to go. Beyond 50 to the next 50, the wait will be 1 month from the end of this campaign to ship. If, by chance, we exceed that amount, we'll be prepared to handle the higher load and the wait will jump by 2 additional weeks.

________________


Risks & Challenges

The initial 50 are in production now. Should we exceed 50, we are prepared to go into a larger production and hire a couple folks for the weeks after the campaign ends. Any delays will only come from pcb manufacturing and assembly. However, if it becomes clear we'll need more circuitry as the campaign goes on, we'll begin producing them preemptively.

Video:

Note that video showing only Conduit has no external processing.
Shown below, the first is the longer standalone Conduit version, second shows conduit pathways travelling through the player and into Aether, the third shows the Conduit pathways travelling through the hands of the player into Materia as well as some sequencing from both Materia and a simple cv sequencer.
story_txt:
15 days only offered at dealer price = normal 449usd.




___________________________


___________ 
Folktek has admittedly often been inaccessible for many people as the incredibly small production and one-of-a-kind pieces have been both costly and time consuming to create. The intention with this piece is to get some Folktek into the hands of anyone who's ever wanted some. 
Folktek has been around for years and made hundreds of unique instruments, and here's another! In the design vein of the Folktek Triad (shown below) and made to work with any or all of three. More photos and details here; http://folktek.com/instruments/symbiotic/aethermateriamentalis-triad-overview




If you've somehow never seen folktek works, have a gander at the broad array at folktek.com

_____________________




The Conduit:
A symbiotic touch-based drone synthesizer based on a delay which then travels to a filter. Creating swells of oscillation that can delve into eternal noisy feedback territory as one desires. Connect to a sequencer to control the time/pitch and pull forth some powerful  synthesis.
Additionally the touch board is a control voltage generator/keyboard sending 0-5v in .5v increments. 
Note that the final will be slightly different than what's shown. The circuit's been redesigned to have the two outer knobs taken up on the panel to provide more space for the jacks with less interference.




______________________
Features:



touch pads; 8 polyphonic notes + noise + pitch: all sensitive to touch. These are synchronous with the delay clock, meaning delay time = oscillator pitch. All notes are tuned with one another so the pitch is a master control.


Oscillation and/or incoming audio sent through on-board filter: for further manipulation.


CV controllable: over delay time/master pitch (+0-5v).


Touch panels generate CV: signals from +0-5v in .5v increments to control your modular gear (it's a cv keyboard).


Audio input: to get your sound into some delay and filter goodness. Expect the delay to be a noisy little bastard (this is a drone synthesizer). For a clean delay and filter signal, however, one can disconnect the touch plates and use it strictly as an effects unit for synthesizers, guitar, etc. Cv controls delay time.


Delay: True vintage analog sound delay. The delay goes from extremely tight to some unspecified, very long, very noisy time. The range of the time knob has been allowed to extend to incredibly long times by allowing the degradation of quality beyond a second or so, allowing the sound to get into very lo-fi and grimy territory.

Filter: Single knob style filter with fixed resonance allows for a nice, rich sweep.

Adaptable with other Folktek works: Without sending the audio output anywhere, the oscillators will travel through the players' body and into Materia, Mentalis and/or Aether to be further manipulated (examples in videos).


All 3.5mm jacks


High quality parts, solid construction.


Bamboo box with dark splines.


12v operation with included power supply

_______________________

story:
Behind the Scene



OWL combines camera adapter and exchangeable filter. User can change filters in a quick and convenient way during filming or photographing. It advances your workflow and cost saving. From now, you just need to prepare one filter to fit all your lenses. You will definitely have a total new experience in photography.


Share to Get OWL for free

1. Login Indiegogo
2. Get your unique link by clicking icons below video

3. Share link and refer to your friends
4. Your can get a gift if your referrals reach corresponding amount

Press and Review

DIYPhotography

PetaPixal

Photoblog.hk

4/3 Rumors
Famous YouTuber Nitsan Simantov

"It has potentially less reflection and flaring than most front mounted filter "



Famous Blogger Wim Arys

"The build quality looks and feels excellent and all parts are made from aluminium. The adapter lens mounts look high quality and durable, no lens wiggle here."

https://www.wimarys.com/deo-tech-owl-filter-adapter-review/


For more information : http://www.deoinfinity.com/


Usage's Features

OWL protect your camera sensor from dust, water and oil drops without affecting photo quality and have the effect you want at the same time. 


It is very easy to clear the filter. And because of it, Using OWL can avoid any damage by scratching while clearing. All we need is only to insert a filter. 

It also can substitute the rear cap to protect the rear lens while we take off the lens.



In another case, even if all of our lenses are in the same ring size, we tend to buy a filter for each lens because changing filter is really tired and time wasting.

Large filters are very expensive, but OWL is only using 52mm filter. It makes OWL save so much cost not only in avoiding buying numerous filters, also in using large filters.



The above special lens are impossible to install filters in traditional way. It limits the creativity of photography. However, OWL breaks it through. Only take one step to install OWL. We can create the effect we want easily. Nothing can limit our imagination anymore.


OWL is much smaller and lighter than traditional filter holder. And it is much easier to set up. It only takes one simple step to change filter. We will no longer feel troubled to reset the setting of filter after change lenses. With OWL, setting of adjustable filter, can be kept when change lens. Work efficiency will be greatly improved with OWL.


Click to Enlarge
Lens Mount, Tripod Mount, Filters Holder, and Filters, all above are changeable in OWL, Hundreds combinations to aim your unique situation. More useful accessories are coming.

Filters

Filter is the heart of OWL. The quality of filter will definitely influence OWL directly. To create magical effects, we are choosing series of high quality filter for you carefully. You can use the filters we provided to achieve below effects freely.

Effects

Polarizer (C-PL) oblique reflections from non-metallic surfaces, can darken the sky in colour photography , and can saturate the image more by eliminating unwanted reflections.



Color Filters are widely used in Black and White photography and portrait photography. Yellow can absorb blue light, darkening the sky to more closely match what the eye would see. Orange reduces the appearance of freckles and blemishes, giving the skin a healthy, smooth look. Red can give bold and dramatic effects to many photographs and marked penetration of haze and fog. Green is mainly used for photographing plants as it helps separate the green foliage from the brightly-coloured flowers and buds. Blue can really add “mood” to a photograph and reduced contrast can be useful for giving a shot a calm, soothing atmosphere. 



Variable ND Filter (VND) works by placing two polarizing filters together at least one of which can rotate. The rear polarizing filter cuts out light in one plane. As the front element is rotated, it cuts out an increasing amount of the remaining light the closer the front filters comes to being perpendicular to the rear filter. The advantages to this are that you get multiple ND filters in one package.


How to install and change filter of OWL?


How to use Polarizer with OWL?



Changing Filters will be very fast


Don't worry filter drop out, We have tested many times



Also replace your rear cap



Stretch Goals and Rewards

To thanks all of your support, if the fund raising meets certain amount, gifts will be given to whom select early bird or upper perks. Goals are accumulative, which mean if the fund raising meet higher level target, lower level reward will be also given out together. Higher Goals more Rewards.

It's all depend on you. We want to create more revolutionary products for you. If you like our product, please do not hesitate to support us. Your support is our motivation to turn impossible into possible.

OWL

* We provide 4 types of OWL in this stage. Please E-mail to us and let us know what type of OWL you want.

1. Canon EF mounting lens to Sony camera E mount

(start shipping in April, 2015)

2. Nikon camera F mounting lens to Sony E  mount 

3. Canon camera E mounting lens to M43 mount mount 

4.  Nikon camera F mounting lens to  M43 mount

(start shipping in June, 2015)


Starter Kit included MC Protector, IR(680,760), Color Filter(Green, Blue, Red, Yellow), Soft Filter


Advance Kit included MC-UV, ND(4, 8, 16, 1000), CPL

PremiumKit included Color Grad filter(Red, Orange, Yellow, Blue, Green & Grey), Variable ND(ND2-400) 

Available this June, 

Price to be confirm

You can order filter separately in our web store, we will ship it to you this June:

DEO Online Store

* If you are outside Hong Kong and need international shipping, please add     USD$25   in the                          "Additional Gift (optional)"    after you select a perk. Thanks.


Where we are?

We’ve spent over a year on designing the product, making, testing and revising the prototypes. And now we finally ready to production. Our manufacturing partner have built and tested the prototype with us. We are great certainty about the manufacturing process to come.


Timeline


Where your money goes?

Your support will go into OWL project directly. Mainly, the funding will be for production and development. We are developing the next generation of OWL. We are doing our best to make more impossibility happen.


Participate with us

OWL is ready on production. However,our company is tiny and limited budget. We are exciting of OWL and have confident on it. Place your order and shows support for OWL. Your support will makes it come true and a vital spark in growing a company. For the future of OWL’s product line, please feel free to let us know which model/filter you may needs and improvement for further development. Your participation is our motivation; you comment will make it better.


FAQs

Q: Can I adjust the aperture of on my camera body by using OWL?

A: Because electric parts is under development, you cannot adjust the aperture with OWL. But Canon CP lens and all manually aperture control can be used undoubtedly.

Q: If I have filters, can I use my own filter on OWL?

A: As long as your filter physically fit the filter holder (52mm filter thread, diameter of filter ring within 54mm and the thickness of your filter within 5mm), it is all OK! But we do not suggest to use Cross filter and Star filer. The effect is not good.

Q: Will OWL affect the quality of image?

A: Yes, bad quality filters may cause color shift, flare, sharpness reducing and internal reflection. However, DEO filters have been repeatedly tested. You can use DEO filers without any worry. But if you want to use your own filters, you need to choose filter carefully to avoid above problems.

Q: How to install the filter into OWL?

A:

1.Install filter onto the filter holder (OWL filter adapter).

2.Insert holder to OWL.

3.Install lens and attach to camera body.

Only DEO excusive CPL, VND, color temperature and color grade filters can use with OWL.

Q: Can I use OWL without filter?

A: Sure, OWL is at good finish. You can definitely use OWL as an adapter.

Q: Can OWL apply on DSLR?

A: Because OWL is designed for Mirrorless Camera only, it won’t have for DSLR version.

Q: Is there any lens cannot use with OWL?

A: All DSLR lens can use OWL, only if the lens with rangefinder (Leica M lens). And if the rear lens is extend over 12mm, it can use OWL without installing filter.

Q: Will OWL have light leaking problem?

A: Light leaking problem will not happen on OWL unless user take off the filter holder during exposure.

Q: Will OWL have another color?

A: No.

Q: I am outside of Hong Kong, How can I add international Shipping?

A: After you select a perk which is on the right side of the webpage, you will go to another page. In the second column, you can see "Additional Gift (optional)". Please add extra USD$25 to the contribution for your international shipping charge.

Q: What camera mounting and lens mounting does OWL provide?

A: OWL provides 

1. Canon EF mounting lens to Sony camera E mount

2. Nikon camera F mounting lens to Sony E  mount 

3. Canon camera E mounting lens to M43 mount mount 

4.  Nikon camera F mounting lens to  M43 mount

Q: How can I select my OWL mount?

A: After you select a perk, we will contact you by email to specify what mount do you need. 

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. 




To know more detail of OWL, or to get OWL and the accessories filters by your own choice

Please visit OWL's website:    http://www.deoinfinity.com/



If you have further inquiry, feel free to contact us by,

Email: info@mxcamera.com

Tel: +852-3996 8254

Address: Room 406G, Block A, Hong Kong Industrial Centre, Lai Chi Kok, Kowloon, Hong Kong

story:
The Theia and the Pharos Lamps


How many times have you been in your favorite restaurant, and thought to yourselves: "I've got 1/2 charge on my phone and it's not as if I'm going out the whole evening ... but..."

  • It was the lack of such a product on the market, and a series of improvements on the ideas of others, that have led me to create this luxury lamp with usb ports, providing enough power to charge  two phones and tablet or up to three or more USB devices simultaneously.
  • I have been working on custom made loudspeakers for over 25 years. Immerged in the beauty of the Portuguese countryside, my products were born in a deep-rooted high quality handcraft tradition.

  • Together with an innate and nostalgic passion for traditional and classic décor, the idea of lighting, together with technology, both as a vital need as well as a form of art, has enabled the rise of a new, captivating series of exquisite products, characterized by nostalgic designs combined with long-lasting high quality materials.

    Since 1980s I have worked for myself as a qualified customizer of home audio products, and by 1987, I had already started creating my own finished products. 

    Later, due to high market competition, I accepted to move on, and started work at a very big and nearby, loudspeaker manufacturing company. Eventually the company also closed down. 

    Today, it is back to the roots, and, with a small private workshop, where all the production stages are carried out on-site, I will be able to offer the client a wide variety of finishes and colors. (stone, cristal, alcantara, leather, suede etc.)

    The product will start up as a High End Lamp with usb ports, but, will eventually evolve into other possibilities. Additional high end audio, omnidirectional, active speakers and even wireless audio capabilities are some of the ideas my contributors will help me achieve by launching this product. 

  • Because I place particular value on the appearance and quality  built of these products, aswell as their performance capabilities, I will need to buy and test new and different paints, glues, cables, power supplies for the 3 or more independent usb ports. And to be able to keep costs to a minimum I have to order, in some cases, more than one item.

    The value I am asking for is for the development and the manufacture of the first products

    Only the glass crystal, which is supplied locally, all other materials will be either ordered from other countries (eg: alcantara is from Italy) or from suppliers that I will have to choose and hand pick, personally. This will imply some travel and a lot of time.

  • This will be an unique Lamp, handcrafted to order for each clients choice in either color or finish materials. The aim is to reach a worldwide recognition and clientele!
  • The risks in achieving this piece of functional art, are practically non existent.  There may be some glue that might react negatively on a particular color. There may be a problem with the heating up of some power supplies inside a closed environment, but after the developing stage, all these risks will be solved,
  • The funds will go into the development of the product, even if I don't reach my entire goal. The only difference is, that I will not be able to dedicate 100% of the time on the project and my own funds will only allow me to proceed at a much slower pace.

Together with an innate and nostalgic passion for traditional and classic décor, the idea of lighting, together with technology, both as a vital need as well as a form of art, has enabled the rise of a new, captivating series of exquisite products, characterized by nostalgic designs combined with long-lasting high quality materials.

Because I place particular value on the appearance and quality  built of these products, aswell as their performance capabilities, I will need to buy and test new and different paints, glues, cables, power supplies for the 3 or more independent usb ports. Only the glass crystal, which is supplied locally, all other materials will be either ordered from other countries (eg: alcantara is from Italy) or from suppliers that I will have to choose and hand pick, personally. This will imply some travel and a lot of time.
 This will be an unique Lamp, handcrafted to order for each clients choice in either color or finish materials. The aim is to reach a worldwide recognition and clientele!

story:
↑    CHECK OUT THE VIDEO   ↑                   

 

BEST IDENTITY THEFT PROTECTION EVER!  Tired of a wallet full of cards with PIN numbers for SECURITY, those frustrating usernames and passwords for SECURITY, and what about cloud storage SECURITY, all of which don't really work?

Help Is Almost Here!!  But we need YOU to get The Community Card on the open market!

What is The Community Card?

The Community Card is a smart card, that works with apps capable of securing passwords, financial accounts, PIN numbers, and medical information for an individual, a spouse, and up to three children. Parents can have identical cards storing the entire family's medical information. Additionally, a child or elderly dependent can be issued his own card storing only his information, which is helpful when parents are not present.

The Community Card is unique and provides identity theft protection by encrypting and splitting sensitive data, i.e. account numbers, then storing the split data in separate locations - part on the card and part in the cloud. If the card is lost or stolen, no one can benefit from the encrypted and split account data contained within the card. The Community Card is powered by Exodus technology and works like a safety deposit box with two keys. To retrieve and unite the stored data pieces, the system requires your Community Card and confirmed identity--your BioPIN.  This level of security has never been available to consumers, until now!

 

What is the BioPIN?

A BioPIN is a secret PIN number which the customer does not have to remember created from the customer's fingerscan image.  

Exodus uses an algorithm to map a biometric image, like points on a graph. Then, the map (or points) is turned into a BioPIN (personal identification number) and the image is discarded. The BioPIN is stored in a database instead of the biometric image, and is never stored with account or credit card numbers. Unlike PIN numbers that people memorize and share, a BioPIN can only be generated by the original biometric image being presented, which is read by a finger scanner and compared to a BioPIN on file.  See video for details. 

 

Current Apps

The Medical App is consumer friendly and securely stores your personal information--like prescriptions, allergies, and general medical history--that you may need to have handy in case of an emergency or a simple visit to your physician’s office. Medical providers, schools, and daycare facilities can easily accept your card just by registering and purchasing an inexpensive smartcard/fingerscan reader. No additional fees are incurred to read your medical information. Optionally, consumers can print their information to hand deliver to their physician. You can easily change your personal information by using a PC or a smart phone and logging into the web.

The Financial Account App allows you to safely store all of your checking, credit and debit card and PIN number information all on one card. When using your Community Card your account numbers are never seen by clerks. With full market penetration you will be able to leave your other cards at home. Additionally, you can give children access to accounts and assign spending limits without ever giving PIN numbers away. With a smartcard/fingerscan reader at home you will be able to shop on line and never again worry about someone stealing your account numbers. Because all transactions are secure, merchants who accept The Community Card will receive reduced fees on processing through approved credit card processors.

This card is different than others because the information is locked away and YOU are the only one that is able to control the stored data and how the data is used. The Community Card offers a level of security that is better than anything on the market to secure your information.

WE NEED YOUR HELP TO:

1.  Port the health application to a mobile first responders unit.  Many first responders have shown interest in The Community Card but they need a unit that is mobile and easy to use for emergencies and natural disasters.  The unit we have chosen to build our application on is inexpensive, yet very durable.

2.  Build a Password Storage & Use App.  We want The Community Card to be very useful to you while we build market share.  The Medical Storage App is useful to you right now.  But, by adding a consumer friendly Password Storage and Use App, your card will become valuable and useful to you on a daily basis. Retailers and medical providers already like The Community Card, but to help drive market share, they want to know that consumers value and use their card every day.  The Password Storage App will accomplish this goal with security not currently available in the market place. 

 

What will the password storage application hold?

You will be able to store site links, usernames, passwords, special tokens you may have to remember, security questions, and a contact number.

How will the password application work?

When logged into The Community Card web portal, you will see an application called “Password Storage and Links”. The application will contain links and a help button for your favorite sites. The links can be used for easy access to these sites. Additionally, if you need any security information, as long as your card is present and in the reader, you will be able to click on the help button and your information will be retrieved from your card, reassembled, and displayed. This will eliminate your need to search for usernames and passwords. Additionally, this app could be further developed by the IT community to enhance security of single sign-on applications.

What are the Benefits for the Consumer?

            1.         Remove Frustration. Consumers are tired of trying to remember PIN numbers, usernames, and passwords, The Community Card relieves this frustration by replacing these other security measures with a BioPIN.

            2.         Increased Consumer Satisfaction.  Smart cards and BioPINs increase consumer satisfaction by raising their confidence that their information is secure.
 
            2.         Reduced Fraud.  Only YOU can access your information.
 
            3.         Reduced Paperwork.  The Community Card sends to the customer’s email account a copy of all receipts from transactions that are secured with the BioPIN.  This allows customers to have a simple method for keeping receipts.

 

PERKS

Each package over $100 comes with at least one card, annual subscriptions, and a smartcard/fingerscan reader and has a retail value over $200.00.  Perks with annual subscriptions vary from 5 YRs to lifetime subscriptions.  The Community Card is presently compatible with Futronics FS-82, Sagem Morphotrak MSO350 and 1350, and Secugen ID-USB/SC and purchaser of the Perks recieve a choice of either a Futronics or a Secugen reader.   

 

We want Distributors in every community!

Welcome to a unique opportunity to become an exclusive distributor of Exodus Payment Systems, LLC.  As a distributor of Exodus products, you can earn exclusive rights to your designated territory and provide consumers true identity protection and reduce fraud at merchant locations within your community, while alleviating the need to remember PIN numbers.  Distributors develop territories by marketing and selling Exodus products to merchants and consumers.  Territories are defined by business licenses within a market.  Each territory has between 10,000 – 15,000 business licenses and distributor packages are specialy priced for Indiegogo fans.

Exodus specializes in proactive fraud and identity protection at the point of transaction. Exodus has developed methods of account and user authentication, and data storage that is superior to all standing systems in the market. The Company offers a variety of solutions involving point of sale transactions for government agencies, retailers, financial entities, and insurance companies. Its flagship products are the BioPIN-Gateway™ and The Community Card.  Our products are supported by several licensed patents and a pending patent application owned by the Company.  

What are the Benefits of being an Exclusive Distributor?

1)         You receive exclusive rights to your designated territory by maintaining a minimum quota of adding 15 new merchants and 100 new consumers per quarter.  Exodus distributors make revenue off the sale of products, gateway services, subscription fees, and transactions fees.

2a)       Included in the Exclusive Distributor Package for $7,000.00

  • Branded Landing Webpages
  • Twenty-five (25) Family Safety First Packages
  • 100 Community Cards & 5 YR subscriptions for each
  • Four (4) Fingerprint Scanners
  • One (1) Dejavoo Credit/Debit Card Terminal Unit with applications and licenses
  • One (1) Morphotrak Fingerprint reader for Dejavoo Terminal
  • 40 Hours of On-Line Product Training
  • Support
  • Sample Videos, Sales Brochures and Merchant Materials
  • Sample Videos and Training Materials for Resellers

OR 

2b)       Included in the Exclusive Super Distributor Package for $12,000.00

  • Branded Landing Webpages
  • Forty (40) Family Safety First Packages
  • 200 Community Cards & 5 YR subscriptions for each
  • Six (6) Fingerprint Scanners
  • One (1) Dejavoo Credit/Debit Card Terminal Unit with applications and licenses
  • One (1) Morphotrak Fingerprint reader for Dejavoo Terminal
  • 40 Hours of Product Training including accommodations (Hotel for 6 days & 5 nights, flights not included) or On-Line class training is available. 
  • Support
  • Sample Videos, Sales Brochures and Merchant Materials
  • Sample Videos and Training Materials for Resellers
  • Pebble Card printer
  • Exodus Carrying Case for Card Printer

 

3)         Multiple-market opportunities – wide range of industries and applications

4)         Represent market changing technology – patented and patent pending in U.S. and other countries

5)         Exclusive Pricing for you and your resellers

 

Distributorship subject to company approval.  See

application under Gallery documents or call

912-449-3355 for more details.

 

FAQs:

Is there a problem with the cloud?

No, actually the cloud is good and allows our information to be accessible when you need it.  How is storage currently a problem?Most products store sensitive information in one location.  For example, storing consumer’s financial accounts in a database so the consumer does not have to re-enter account information when shopping on line the next time.  While this is convenient, it leaves the consumer vulnerable if the company’s database is breached.  Consumer information can be stolen from 3rd party intrusion or simply from a disgruntled employee.

How does The Community Card solve the storage problem?

The Community Card solves the storage problem because sensitive data is never stored in one location.  The information is always encrypted and then split with  part being maintained by the consumer in The Community Card and part being maintained on the host database.  Neither part is useable or readable without the other part; therefore the consumer always maintains control of their own information.

What are the security risks for credit/debit cards?

The most important factor in protecting your security and preventing identity theft is ensuring YOU are the only one given access to YOUR information.  Current credit card designs, including the new EMV design, stores personal information on the card and assumes the consumer has control of his/her cards.   However, when the card is stolen the information is vulnerable and easily accessed.   Consumers are required to remember PIN numbers that have been added for security, but these are often stolen and can be manipulated on the cards themselves. 

How does The Community Card solve security problems?

The Community Card requires the consumer to authenticate their identity as the true card owner by using a fingerscan which is unique to them.  The fingerscan is turned into a BioPIN and the BioPIN is stored with a random number assigned to The Community Card.  This number is stored on the host system and never on the card.  Systems that store both the account information and BioPIN on the card leave the consumer extremely vulnerable if the card is stolen.  Additionally, the BioPIN is never associated directly to anyone's account information because the account information is split between the card and the cloud.  

Why is The Community Card useful to employers, daycares, and schools?

Employers are looking for inexpensive ways to offer benefits to employees.  The Community Card is a benefit for both employees and employers. Securing passwords in the workplace does not need any explanation. However, The Community Card Medical app is a benefit also.  Employers are often concerned about work related accidents and when an employee is hurt at work, up-to-date accurate emergency medical information becomes essential.  Accurate information prevents errors and can reduce workers' compensation cost.  However, many employers do not want to store medical information because of liability and security risks.  The Community Card solves this problem by allowing employees to have emergency medical information available when they need it. A priceless benefit. Daycares and Schools have similar problems.  If a child is hurt on the premises, having up-to-date and accurate information can save lives. 

The Community Card allows parents to easily update and maintain accurate emergency information for their children, and allows daycares or schools to access this information in a secure manner if the child is hurt while in their care.  Parents who have children with even slight medical needs are concerned about proper care when their children are not with them. Additionally, The Community Card is proving to help in situations where parents speak a different language.     

How secure is this system?

Exodus’ technology uses the highest standards applying recognized industry practices. Military grade encryption is used throughout the data transmission and data storage sections of the system.  Exodus does not store account numbers in the system.  The Community Card offers consumers a level of security superior to other methods available. 

How does Exodus’ biometric recognition work?

Exodus uses an algorithm to map a biometric image, like points on a graph.  Then, the map (or points) is turned into a BIO PIN (personal identification number) and the image is discarded.  The BIO PIN is stored in a database instead of the biometric image, and never stored with account or credit card numbers.  Unlike PIN numbers that people memorize and share, a BIO PIN can only be generated by the original biometric image being presented, which is read by a biometric scanner and compared to a BIO PIN.Are you keeping fingerprints in your database?No. Using a mathematical formula, the unique fingerprint design of each individual is converted into a numeric code, or secret BioPIN. This secret BioPIN is saved in the database. The actual image of the fingerprint is not saved. 

Which smartcard/fingerscan readers work with The Community Card?

Futronics FS82, Secugen ID-USB/SC, Sagen Morphotrak MSO350 and 1350.

How can my business accept The Community Card for payments?

Send us an email at payments@exodusps.com and we will send you  information. The process of registering a business to accept payments is easy and your business can begin to save money within weeks.

Who do I contact if I want to accept The Community Card for medical emergencies?

Send us an email at medical@exodusps.com and we will send you the information to become a medical information partner which will allow you to read The Community Card's medical information when authenticated by the consumer.   

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends about The Community Card and the BioPIN Gateway!  They will be glad you did!
