A priceless benefit. Daycares and Schools have similar problems.  If a child is hurt on the premises, having up-to-date and accurate information can save lives. 
The Community Card allows parents to easily update and maintain accurate emergency information for their children, and allows daycares or schools to access this information in a secure manner if the child is hurt while in their care.  Parents who have children with even slight medical needs are concerned about proper care when their children are not with them. Additionally, The Community Card is proving to help in situations where parents speak a different language.     
How secure is this system?
Exodus’ technology uses the highest standards applying recognized industry practices. Military grade encryption is used throughout the data transmission and data storage sections of the system.  Exodus does not store account numbers in the system.  The Community Card offers consumers a level of security superior to other methods available. 
How does Exodus’ biometric recognition work?
Exodus uses an algorithm to map a biometric image, like points on a graph.  Then, the map (or points) is turned into a BIO PIN (personal identification number) and the image is discarded.  The BIO PIN is stored in a database instead of the biometric image, and never stored with account or credit card numbers.  Unlike PIN numbers that people memorize and share, a BIO PIN can only be generated by the original biometric image being presented, which is read by a biometric scanner and compared to a BIO PIN.Are you keeping fingerprints in your database?No. Using a mathematical formula, the unique fingerprint design of each individual is converted into a numeric code, or secret BioPIN. This secret BioPIN is saved in the database. The actual image of the fingerprint is not saved. 
Which smartcard/fingerscan readers work with The Community Card?
Futronics FS82, Secugen ID-USB/SC, Sagen Morphotrak MSO350 and 1350.
How can my business accept The Community Card for payments?
Send us an email at payments@exodusps.com and we will send you  information. The process of registering a business to accept payments is easy and your business can begin to save money within weeks.
Who do I contact if I want to accept The Community Card for medical emergencies?
Send us an email at medical@exodusps.com and we will send you the information to become a medical information partner which will allow you to read The Community Card's medical information when authenticated by the consumer.   
Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends about The Community Card and the BioPIN Gateway!  They will be glad you did!

story:
Buy Now!

Who am I?

I am an electronics engineer that works designing heavy construction machinery and as a hobby wants to design and manufacture electronic gadgets. 

 

What does your product do?

In short: it lets Arduino 'talk' on the phone. You know those sounds you hear when you press buttons on your phone? Those are DTMF or touch tones. Arduino cannot make sense of those 'noises'. My DTMF Module let Arduino 'talk' that language. That is, my module takes those sounds and let Arduino know which button you pressed. Also, my module let Arduino generate those tones. Watch my demo videos (under gallery) and visit my website for further info.  

Here's a simple functional diagram:

 

Why a campaign and Why important?

My goal is to have a production run of the DTMF modules that I designed and built prototypes. I want to gain experience in turning an idea into a product that is available to everyone at a reasonable cost.

This is my first crowd-funding project! Contributors will help me execute my plan and will enable me in the future to have other crowdfunded embedded projects of increasing complexity. In other words: I want to start small, with something I'm really confident I can achieve.

 

What I need?

So my goal is to raise enough funds so that I can contract a company to manufacture and assemble the boards. In order to have a cost effective production run I need a batch size of at least 100 units. My estimate expense for this project is:

  • Printed Circuit Board:  $200
  • PCB Assembly: $400
  • Components: $200
  • Fees & Overhead: $100 to $200

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Folks, please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Share
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

 

Shipping:

All perks include US shipping. For FAST US shipping add $5. For Canada add $5, and other countries add $10.

 

FAQ: 

Q1. What if you don't reach your goal? Do I get my perk?

A: Yes. If I don't raise enough money for the production run I will personally assemble & test your board. So no worries you will get your perk! :)

 

Q2. Which Arduino pins it uses?

A: If you plug the module into Arduino, it will use pins 6 to 12:

  • Pins 6 & 7 are for DTMF encoding
  • Pins 8, 9, 10, 11 and 12 are for DTMF decoding

 

For further documentation on what the board does and how to use it please visit my Website.

 

3D Renderings

Here's the latest rendering of the Module. Prototypes revision2 have been ordered on 2-21-2013 should be here in a few weeks.

 

 

Below is a 3D rendering showing how the DTMF Module will look when connected to Arduino:

(Arduino board not included) 

Schematics for board revision 2

story:
Post Campaign Update

Wow! Thank you to all who contributed to our extremely successful campaign!

For those who missed out, have no fear...SafeSleeve is AVAILABLE NOW on our website currently for a great deal: http://www.safesleevecases.com/collections/sleeves


Update (5/4)

Color and size selection: Thank you for all your orders! I just wanted to let you know that we will be contacting you soon for your size and color preference.

What the Experts are Saying

 

Development Process

After hearing from a professor that using a laptop on your lap may be harmful to your health and later confirming this with some thorough research, we made a profound realization:the convenience of being able to use a computer anywhere, anytime often causes many of us to ignore the associated consequences.

With You and Yours in Mind

 

Since not using a laptop on your lap is an unrealistic option, we searched for some existing solutions. We found several attempts that didn't quite hit the mark:

These radiation blocking underwear only block certain frequencies of EMF. And they retail for around $70. At least they look cool...

 

 

That Led us to Develop SafeSleeve. 

A fastidious design process and many iterations of prototypes later, we finally realized our vision of a feasible yet fashionable answer-- 

"a revolutionary solution to an emerging threat"

 

What is it?

SafeSleeve (patent pending) is a multi-functional laptop accessory that provides protection for your computer when on the go and in use; a useful workstation for your desk; and most importantly, personal protection from Electromagnetic Field (EMF) Radiation. 

Place SafeSleeve underneath your computer. The Military Grade, lead-free shielding material inside will block EMF radiation and heat emissions from the bottom of your laptop

 

Recent research suggests that any EMF exposure above 3 milliGauss may be linked to diseases such as:

 

  • Leukemia in Children
  • Certain types of Cancer
  • Infertility in Men and Women
  • Neurological Disorders
  • Toasted Skin Syndrome
  • more...

 

 

SafeSleeve also provides a desktop workstation that includes a mouse pad and is optimized to allow airflow to your laptop on any surface

A lightweight, sleek and stylish sleeve that will fit and protect most laptops

This combination of features, sleek and stylish design, and premium quality makes SafeSleeve a must own for any laptop user.


Where we Stand

After many months of designing and optimizing, we were ready to start making some prototypes. We searched all over the world for the combination of materials and manufacturers that would be able to realize our vision most effectively.

Eventually, after many failed attempts, we found a shielding material that fit our requirements:

Then, after many less than ideal prototypes, we found a manufacturer that matched our stringent standards.

We now have several samples of fully functional product. Our factories are ready to go, so we wanted to give you a chance to be one of the first owners of this exciting, revolutionary product!

Alternate Versions

Non-Radiation Blocking "LapCase"

Want all the beauty and some of the functionality of SafeSleeve, but can't quite afford the Radiation Blocking feature? Pre-order a LapCase for the Indiegogo exclusive price of $35/39 (shipping and tax included) for the 13"/15" size in your choice of color. 

Perks Breakdown

Like what you see? Here is a breakdown of how you can get in on some SafeSleeve action. Once you know what you want, click on the corresponding reward to the right.

 

*Click Here for other T-shirt Colors

 

 

Functional

The bottom of a MacBook with and without a SafeSleeve

 

 

 

Design Oriented

Our lead designer, Matteo Padovani, hard at work. Check out more of his work at www.padovanidesigns.com

 

What the Public Thinks

We've taken this product to several trade shows, coffee shops, college campuses and other places where people commonly use their laptops to see what the public thinks. 

We showed off some prototypes at our booth at the Travel Goods Show 2013 in Las Vegas

Phil K.

Phil Keoghan, host of the amazing race was a fan

 

So far we've received an incredibly positive response and overwhelming demand. 

How You Can Help

The public is excited about SafeSleeve and, after over a year of development, our factory is ready to go. There is just one missing piece...You!

With your help, we can reach our goal of $16,500 and place our first order to start fulfilling this demand. This also means that you can be one of the first to own this exciting and revolutionary product.

Thanks for your support, and please help us spread the word by telling all your family and friends! You can also like us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/safesleeve) and follow us on twitter and instagram @SafeSleeve

 

DISCLAIMER: SafeSleeve greatly reduces EMF exposure (to <3 mg on most, not all laptops), but is not guaranteed to reduce your risk of disease. Research suggests that there is a correlation between EMF exposure and certain diseases, however it is up to you to determine the validity of this research.

Thanks for your support, and please help us spread the word by telling all your family and friends! You can also like us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/safesleeve) and follow us on twitter and instagram @SafeSleeve

Research suggests that there is a correlation between EMF exposure and certain diseases, however it is up to you to determine the validity of this research.

story:
FAQ from potential donors.

 

Q: Are these machines less costly than existing computers?

 

A: These systems will be competitive for cost / performance. ($1,100 to $1,300) depending on memory and hard drive size.

 

Q: Are they faster?

 

A: Going green is not going to be a punishment. We will not sacrifice speed for fake gains in efficiency.

 

Q: What is the benefit to the consumer besides helping the environment?

 

A: It won’t just be that we are carbon neutral we will also be wallet neutral. Our “secret sauce” will be that while the environment is always a great tag line to advertise, the difference between our systems and someone else’s will be that the energy savings will pay for our systems through its life.

 

Q: You have created a colorful computer. Do you think it will sell?

 

A: It sets us apart from other companies and it’s also a very functional case for heat dissipation and efficiency. We like to think of it as beauty and form meets function.

 

Q: Are your computers available in any colors other then green?

 

A: Yes they are. For our first year we are offering them in stone gray as well as green.

 

Q: Have you created a face book page for this?

 

A:  Yes.  Please like us on facebook. 

 

Green PC

A project by Thomas Henz and Krisztian Katona, their dream is to create an environmentally friendly computer company with goals of carbon neutrality. They also feel progress doesn’t have to be at the expense of the planet, and they are here to offer you that solution.

 

Green PC is based upon simple guiding principles:

 • Being environmentally responsible does not have to be a sacrifice

 • Environmentally friendly, low power full feature computing

 • Renewable and recyclable sources

 • Carbon neutrality

 • High quality, performance, stylish, affordable machines

 

What is Green PC?

The concept for Green PC is simple; a low power computer containing quality parts and materials from environmentally friendly sources such as factories compliant with ROHS (Restriction of Hazardous Substances) and low or no carbon emissions. All from a company that aims to be the first completely green computer manufacturer.

 

What are we going to do differently?

 

When you purchase a Green PC, we will offer to recycle your old computer for free and a tree / trees will be planted at our own expense to offset any carbon released during the production and lifetime of your new computer. Each year, we will strive to improve our product, increasing energy efficiency and the appeal of the low power full featured desktop pc. We shall maintain a commitment to overall quality and to the community by creating jobs here in the US, and if there is a better, cleaner, or greener way to do it, we will find it.

Our computers will be attractive and well put together; our cases have a foot print of only 8x8x16" and are specially designed to optimize cooing efficiency by way of specialized cooling elements and maximizing air flow. In addition our hardware will be optimally calibrated for maximum cooling efficiency. Bamboo will be featured heavily in our products and where ever possible, as it is far more renewable and environmentally friendly than plastic.

                        

 

Why Indigogo?

The reason that we are asking for crowd sourced startup capital, is that we feel that to allow investors into this project would cause us to lose a degree of control that could negatively impact the operation and goals of this venture due to outside influence (silent partners end up being not so silent); In other words, for this to work we feel that it must remain as close to its lofty ideals as possible.

 

What do we get out of this campaign? 

The purpose of this campaign is to raise the capital to make this Goal a reality. The funds will be used to cover start up expenses such as producing our prototype, buying our domain, paying for our website, and incorporation. Once we have our prototype and have shown what we can do, we will start our marketing campaign to fund the first run of machines.

                                                                

 

 

What do you get out of it?

 While it’s true that we are looking to produce a self sustaining company, we feel that ultimately it will benefit everyone, simply from the lower power consumption, recycling, and trees planted. However, we pledge to donate $1 dollar for every $25 dollars obtained to the National Forest foundation. http://www.nationalforests.org/connect/plant

 

In addition, once the company is turning a profit, we will give back to the community that helped create us, we pledge to give back the total sum of money we receive from our campaigns to future projects hosted on this site, that further ecologically friendly ideals.

story:
BACKGROUND
Every day thousands of people snap a picture of something they might want to buy, push to a dozen social media platforms, and ask “Is it a yes?” The problem is answers aren't aggregated anywhere. Votes, ideas and feedback from friends are lost among platforms. 

I want my app to streamline that experience. Easily take a pic, categorize the shot (with event, style, or brand) and push out to your close friends, and your social media peeps. Quickly collect votes and know instantly if you should buy or pass. 

WHY BUILD IT?
I’ve been playing around with this idea for a while. I’m a tech geek (I’ve worked in startups and marketing my whole career) and I’ve floated this idea to dozens of people, always getting the same response – I’d use that! Build it!

So here I am asking for your help to get it built. I received a number of quotes for design and development of the app, and settled on the SeattleAppLab up here in Seattle, WA. All money raised goes to designing and building a beautiful app. I know the importance of a gorgeous, effective user experience, so the money raised will all be put toward that.

I also figure, I’ve lived most of my life in the social graph at this point, and I can’t think of a better way to get creative then to ask you all for your help and ideas as I build this.

HOW IT WORKS

WHATS THE PLAN
I’ve given myself four weeks to raise the money. If I succeed, design and prototyping starts immediately. The design/development schedule is broken into three phases and the goal is to have the app in the App Store in the next two months. This means people will be shopping with ISITaYES in time for the holiday season!

This will be a free app. I haven't thought too much about what happens after its up in the app store, and {hopefully} it has some adoption. I have a few ideas. Either way, I think this idea has real legs, and I appreciate your support!


THANK YOU LIKE WHOA
Doing something like this (getting an idea out there, being vulnerable in the social world, and asking friends/family for monetary support) is WAY out of my comfort zone. I’d like to say thank you…times a million. I am super excited to see where I can take this!

WANT TO LEARN MORE

Feel free to ping me with questions @joannalord, or check out the site - www.isitayes.com. There you can sign up to be notified when the app launches!

story:
Introducing Shell2D

Let’s be honest, few things in life are as truly frustrating as running out of power on your smartphone. It always seems to happen at the worst time and can cause lost connections, lost time, and lost money! It's a pain that we can all relate to and that's why the Shell2D battery case is the answer for all iPhone 6/6s users who want to free themselves from one of life’s most common irritations.

Presenting the Shell2D, the first in a line of intelligent smartphone battery cases that represent the latest in Slim Power technology to keep your phone safe, secure and full of juice!


A case that was not only thin, but also made from the highest-quality durable materials, with a unique magnetic frame built-in!... allowing your phone to sit easily in many environments, such as your car!

A case that allows you to get rid of the tangled lines while you are driving.

Take A Closer Look:

Shell2D not only supports the most common features, but comes with a few unique ones too!

Easy Installation

Using a simple and quick 2-piece design, the Shell2D installs on your iPhone as easy as 1 – 2 – 3! Simply slide the phone onto the Lightning adapter and fit snugly into the case. Then, add the protective bumper for 4 corner drop and bump protection. Because the case is made of advanced polymer plastics rather than metal, it prevents audio interference for clear calls.

A Thinner Profile

The Shell2D is almost twice as thin as similar cases from Apple and at less cost. This ultra-slim design makes it perfect for comfort and easy to access from a pocket or purse.

Built-in Magnetic Insert

Even though the Shell2D is incredibly thin, we knew that having a convenient mounting solution for driving was essential so we added a version with a built-in magnetic insert for mounting on metal surfaces. Together with a customized car mount that fits any vehicle, the Shell2D allows your phone to safely and securely mount in a convenient viewing location for hands-free calls, messages and navigation. Since the Shell2D carries its own power supply with it everywhere it goes, it eliminates the need for cheap aftermarket car chargers and the tangle of cables that go with them. With the Shell2D your car stays clean and clutter free.

2400mAh On-board Battery

The highly efficient on-board battery effectively doubles the use time of your iPhone which means more talk time, video or internet browsing for you.

One Button Charging

The Shell2D lets you choose when and where you re-charge your phone. Simply press a button and Shell2D does the rest. Is your friend’s iPhone dead? You can save the day by using your Shell2D on your friends iPhone 6!

LED Power Indicator

No more wondering if your backup power is ready or not, a multiple LED readout tells you at a glance how much power is available in your Shell2D.

Home Charging Dock

Your phone and Shell2D will remain charged and safely stored at home or the office with the handsome, low profile home charging dock which uses a standard Lightning cable to keep your Shell2D ready to go.

A Wild Splash of Colors

Choose your color, choose your style. Our four colors: Space Black, Light Pink, Coral Blue and Royal Blue give you the chance to let your individuality shine.

Recharge with Lightning Cable

No more proprietary cables, connections or adapters. The Shell2D recharges using any certified Lightning cable without removing the phone from the case. Your Shell2D and phone will be powered up and ready when you are.

And, A Few More Things:

Protective Test

Material Test

Fit Your Pocket

Help make Shell2D a reality with your pledge!

“I noticed how almost everyone carried a power bank, it solves a problem sure, but created an issue of portability in the process” - Vincent, Lead Engineer

That’s the idea that inspired the development of the Shell 2D and why after 6 months of development, the product is near completion and ready for the early birds who act now.

Shell2D has undergone a great deal of development and its successful evolution represents months of hard but satisfying work.

Of course the concept that has pushed development has always remained the same - Keep is simple, keep it thin, keep it functional.

Early birds get the worms.


Risks and challenges

Before settling on a manufacturer, we thoroughly considered every manufacturing process available to us, and searched the entire length of the United States for the best manufacturer that fits all of our production needs. After a long and meticulous search, we are confident that we have enlisted the best manufacturer for the job!

However, we also recognize that certain risks and challenges are inherent with any first run production of a new product. We are prepared to handle any unforeseen circumstances in a manner to minimize potential delay while maintaining our commitment to high quality and sustainability. We are confident in our abilities to overcome the foreseeable delays and unforeseeable risks related to tooling, manufacturing, packaging, distribution and fulfilment.

Shell2D has undergone a great deal of development and its successful evolution represents months of hard but satisfying work. 
Of course the concept that has pushed development has always remained the same - Keep is simple, keep it thin, keep it functional.






Early birds get the worms.


 


A team built for success, young and passionate... roll call please






 






Risks and challenges
Before settling on a manufacturer, we thoroughly considered every manufacturing process available to us, and searched the entire length of the United States for the best manufacturer that fits all of our production needs. After a long and meticulous search, we are confident that we have enlisted the best manufacturer for the job!
However, we also recognize that certain risks and challenges are inherent with any first run production of a new product. We are prepared to handle any unforeseen circumstances in a manner to minimize potential delay while maintaining our commitment to high quality and sustainability. We are confident in our abilities to overcome the foreseeable delays and unforeseeable risks related to tooling, manufacturing, packaging, distribution and fulfilment.

story:
Reviews :

Compatible With ALL Micro USB Devices


 

 

 

Compatible with All Standard USB Ports

 

 

 

 

Meet MicFlip – the world’s first ever reversible Micro USB and Standard USB cable [ Both plugs U.S patented with safety certifications ]

USB cables are a part of our everyday existence – we charge our phones with them, we use them to transfer files, and we connect crucial gadgets like printers, scanners and cameras to our networks using them. But it seems today’s USB cables and plugs just aren’t meeting the needs of the millions of people that use them daily.

 

 

 

 

 

No Matter What They Say , We Have Years Till The Type-C Will Be Our Standard... 

 

 

It's the world's first reversible Micro USB cable 

 

Featuring an ultra-strong braided nylon lead, a robust aluminum shell and gold plated plugs to prevent corrosion, the MicFlip represents a new era of intelligence for mobile accessories. To fast-track the product to smartphone owners across the globe we are aiming to raise $6000 

As the first product of its kind the MicFlip USB cable offers mobile users a whole new level of functionality. Thanks to the intelligent design smartphone owners can now connect their next generation devices in any direction.Rather than risk damaging components by accidentally forcing standard micro USB plugs in the wrong direction, the MicFlip can be seamlessly inserted at any angle. For smartphone owners wanting to maximize charge time and efficiency it’s a must have accessory.  With this flexibility comes complete convenience and significant time saving benefits – just plug and go. There is no hassle and no frustration when ports don’t match and no need to spend hours searching for specific connectors. The MicFlip makes connection seamless. 

 

 

 

 

 

  • 2 Meter 
  • Aluminum Shell 
  • Gold Plated Plugs
  • Braided Cable
  • Reversible Micro USB
  • Reversible Standard ( Type-A ) USB
  • Supports QuickCharge

 

We reckon the MicFlip is a rare thing – 100% unique. No other company on the planet has developed a reversible USB cable that offers smartphone owners the flexibility to charge and connect in dual directions. There is a huge demand for this cutting edge technology and we’re anticipating a huge amount of interest from both Indiegogo supporters, and the public mobile accessories market.We asked a multitude of people: what would you change about your micro USB cable? The answers were resounding. 75% of people said that they wished the plug at the end of the cable was reversible, to prevent those irritating moments where you can’t seem to get the cable inserted properly into the Micro USB port, no matter which way you turn it! 

 

 

This seemed like such a simple request – and we were staggered to learn that no other company in the world is creating USB ports in this way. So we set to work! The MicFlip slots seamlessly into any USB port, so instead of risking damage to components by accidentally forcing your USB plug in the wrong way, you can just plug and go!

This is a real world first – and we’re bringing it to you right here on Indiegogo!

Of course, the angle of the plug was not the only important thing to regular USB cable users. 25% of respondents to our survey said they wished their cables were more reliable. Many people find that, with such heavy usage day after day, their USB cables can become faulty fairly quickly, with connections becoming loose and proving unable to charge gadgets or transfer data.

 

We wanted to make the world’s most sought-after, efficient and durable USB cable – so as well as making the plug totally reversible, we covered the wires in an ultra-strong and flexible braided nylon lead. The cables also have a robust aluminium shell, and gold-plated plugs to prevent corrosion and ensure that the MicFlip will outlast all of your other USB cables. 

 

 

 

The MicFlip cable will work with all standard micro USB devices such as smartphones , powerbanks , wearables , earphones , speakers and more .

     

     

    Founded in 2012, Winnergear has quickly carved itself a name as an innovator in cutting edge mobile phone accessories. Driven by professionalism, innovation and simplicity, the company pioneers products that cater to the dynamic needs of its tech savvy market. The MicFlip Fully Reversible Micro USB Cable is the company’s latest revolution and reflects its commitment to enhancing the day to day lives of its customers.

     

     

     

     

    We are using Indiegogo to interact with our customers at the earliest stages and thanks to your feedback we can create much better products .

Founded in 2012, Winnergear has quickly carved itself a name as an innovator in cutting edge mobile phone accessories. Driven by professionalism, innovation and simplicity, the company pioneers products that cater to the dynamic needs of its tech savvy market. We are using Indiegogo to interact with our customers at the earliest stages and thanks to your feedback we can create much better products .

story:
WE HAVE MOVED: Now we are part of the Air for Mobile Complementation Initiative



[ANE] USB Serial for Android - Adobe Native Extension

Our principal motivation for creating this native extension is to exploit the great possibility to connect mobile apps to serial enabled devices, for example: Arduinos, LCD screens, Serial to USB adapters and more, this coupled with the Adobe AIR platform that allows compile a project for iOS and Android, open a world of possibilities for apps developed in the Flash Platform.


What is an AIR native extension?

"Native Extensions for Adobe AIR are code libraries that contain native code wrapped with an ActionScript API. Native extensions provide easy access to device-specific libraries and features that are not available in the built-in ActionScript classes. Examples of native extensions include making a mobile device vibrate, integrating ad-networks and in-app purchasing systems into your games, and using the iOS Game Center in your iOS games."

You can find more information from Adobe Developer Connection.

Adding an ANE to your favorite IDE is quite easy, we will provide a guide for several IDEs.

Compatibility

So far our first prototype was tested with several usb-serial devices: cp2102 and FTDI adapters, and generic Arduino pro mini from eBay. We will extend our compatibility as much as we can.


Current state

Beta v0.3 is already available for supporters, which include full functionality. We are working hard on making it compatible with more usb devices. As Android devices concern every devices we have tested works, as long as they have USB Host capabilities; a good quality OTG cable or adapter is recommended.


API

Functions: 

  • Connect(bauds, port); Parameters are optional, we will try to guess the port if it's nor provided.
  • Autoconnect(); Starts trying to connect and stay connected to any usb serial devices.
  • Disconnect();
  • Send(data); Sends a string to a connected device.
  • List(); Lists available serial devices.

Events: 

  • Connected, Disconnected, Error, DataReceived


When do I get the ANE?

  • After you pledge a fulltime license you will receive an email in less than 24 hours, you will receive credentials to access the website where you can download the latest version available.

What's next?

  • [Done]We will open a micro website where you can access the samples, latests updates, and support.
  • We are working on better samples, and complete the API.
  • Documentation and user manual.

Can I buy the ANE after the campaign is over?

  • Sorry, we will not sell the ANE after the campaign ends, only supporters will be able to get the extension.

What happens if the goal is not reached?

  • We pledge to bring a functional extension to our supporters, the more we make the more time we can spend on improving the extension, polishing samples and documentation.

Does this ANE require any special permissions?

  • None, Android will display a dialog asking permission to the user at the moment the app tries to connect. There are some information on internet on how to ask for this permission on installation instead of on connection, but we haven't tested it yet.

Can it control an Arduino or Raspberry pi?

  • Yes it should, we will add a sample on how to control an Arduino using Flash Professional, this was our primary goal at the beginning and already acomplished it.

Is there a sample app to test compatibility?

  • Yes, we already published an app using the beta version of the ANE, you can install it to check if your current hardware is compatible. You can download the app from Google Play:

story:
Working Prototypes

A Video Conferencing Remote Health Care Application

See Future Health Care Application for THYMEWARP

First ThymeWarp Prototypes


From Concept below to Working Prototypes above, ThymeWarp now exists as it is a system of integrated services place all into one new App.

We Define a ThymeWarp As:

Being able to view one-side of someone's earlier video-conversation to you, an on going dialogue or business meeting, in the "now time!"

Short Scenario

Imagine you and your two business partners have a meeting and all of you are  located around the world in different timezones. The problem is you now have to find a time that works for all three (3) of you - spread across three (3) continents. What a hassle perhaps, and each of you have very busy daytime operations.

Well with ThymeWarp that problem can be now easily solved. Even though when it is 4 p.m. in Japan for instance, and to one of your partners in USA it's 3 a.m in New York but it is 7 a.m. in London. You can send them one video message and they can reply back to it when either they wake at 7 a.m. in the morning, or later that day. For your third business partner maybe he or she will be busy at 10 a.m. and needs to prepare when they saw the message come through but now at noon over lunch he of she can catch up and reply back to the same message also. This is the power behind ThymeWarp. You can have a delayed conversation or conversations anywhere, anytime but they appear the same as if they were all in realtime. There will be no more having to base your conversations around a clock, carry on with your day and get to the conversation at the time that is most convenient to you.  

Social Scenario:
Imagine wanting to speak with family members spread across time zones, or friends spread across different break times in your day? You send a ThymeWarp video conversation to all of them in just one moment, they see your conversation when they have their break.

One conversation can be sent to one, two or more friends or family members at the same time instance, and when they find time they can all get back to you at different times.

ThymeWarp allows you to no longer have to wait until each person has a break to conduct a phone conversation, it allows each party the convenience of not missing an important moment with you or you not being able to share your important moments by let others become part of it as well.


ThymeWarp is what "Selfies" sometimes wish they could be, except "Selfies" are "still life." There are many other apps with similarities qualities to a ThymeWarp but where ThymeWarp differs is it focuses on the simplicity of just letting you record your own video conversation and sending it in whole through ThymeWarp Servers who are registered to receive it. People in your social or business group only, who have already been setup as designated receivers by you and are part of your circle of friends, so you only select one, few or all when you press send. 
Perhaps ThymeWarps can also be used to accumulate special memories, moments you wish to have captured and  preserved over time so that they can be brought back to life whenever everyone is together. For this one reason answers why ThymeWarp conversations should never be stored on ThymeWarp servers, and ThymeWarp servers should remain configured so that ThymeWarps all operate purely in fast dynamic RAM and shadow memory which are used for transmitting them as fast as possible to your receiver's devices as soon as they come in. This is also why you must store them, in order to keep the special ones you want to keep, and discard the ones you choose not to keep and ably save room in your storage.
Lastly, ThymeWarp is not a "do everything" app server, it is designed to one thing and that one thing extremely well.  In business as with social, ThymeWarp is different and unique from other apps because it is being designed to place quality first, then expand. Every smartphone or smart device comes with a video recorder, so there is little need for ThymeWarp to create one, and the simplicity is to use what you have differently and cost effectively with the highest quality.

This Thyme-Warp⫀ miracle (code named P4), is a video conversation app service (VCS), with apps for computers, smartphones and smart devices. We will have a limited launch date of January 15th, and from set-up fess have a broad world-wide launch within 30 - 45 days following the limited launch date. This will be the testing date for a live "dry-run". Soon after they will be available for everyone in a limited capacity for three months, and after in a full capacity in three countries.

ThymeWarp will not and does not use advertisers, does not collect personal data, and will always be free to use, why?  ThymeWarp is simply an awesome global telecommunication tool, a Time-Router which allow you to send video conversation only to your friend who are registered in your social group and no one else. This provides the user a way of connecting with others anywhere in the world "free of costs", "free of loss of privacy" and "the freedom to communicate for as long and for as often as you like".  As technically capable people, it is the least we can do towards achievement of a greater good. Hope others will catch on to this wave!


The ThymeWarp services & Apps run on technology you already have. ThymeWarp cuts your phone costs by using the Internet like a Skype, and increases the inherent quality of how you connect with others.  What started as a fun project called "project four" or P4,  grew into what may very well become a new generation in the telecommunication of how we communicate.

T-Apps

C-U - Receiving earlier sent video conversation from a Social Group Member
U-C-Me-C-U - You see Video recording of my response to your Video-conversation.
C-ALL
C-ALL-C-Us
ALL-C-Us-C-Them


Today P4 is running on five (5) high performance servers. This is the ThymeWarp P4 service and P4's "C-U" "C-Me" Apps project. Applets being designed to use their own Internet protocols so that your conversations can be as long as you would like them to be, without limits of how long. (This is why we think you would like to help us develop this phenomena, and create a whole new way of social interaction in today's complex society.) We could use your financial help, and you will receive unlimited suppiy of finish-product apps as we design more to accompany this service,

Each computer server has quad-core CPUs, (4 brains per chip) and high speed Ethernet connections with dual network service providers connect-ups for fail-safe connections. These servers are where we run and provide "the ThymeWarp" routing service, the core, that allows people to connect and send out video conversations across the internet back and forth in  zone free space, thus replacing the need every time for toll phone calls which costs money. P4 is free, and we think it should remain free because it is made from “white noise” technology (technology you already have in use and already owned by you for other purposes).   
                                   
     The ThymeWarp Cloud        

Brief Introduction and Background.
Hello, I am Ernst B. Carter, an innovator accredited with 8 patents: (3) in the USA, (1) in Canada, (2) in Japan, (1) in Israel, and (1) in China. I am excited to introduce a new way millions of people will choose to connect and communicate using the same devices we already use, but in a different way.  While I am currently responsible for setting up, managing and directing operations for Exit-Cube (Hong Kong) Ltd. a Patent Technology & Licensing Firm preparing to conduct business in the China, it recently occurred to me how a ThymeWarp would ease the pains of Spam-emails, Mal-tweets, and harmful images posted places we wish not to see, when we just wish to communicate with those we know and love. Well this is the new telecommunication service called ThymeWarp which allows everyone affordable communication across the Internet in ways that increases quality of conversation and cost nothing to use.
My Aerospace Career & Background:
My background in computer science started in California,  an Aerospace Company named Rockwell International (later acquired as part of The Boeing Company). I handled assignments for missile guidance and control systems' BMO program: (a.k.a. Peacekeeper MX missile during the 1980s).  Completed five Aerospace projects during my tenure of 1984 to 1991, as an Aerospace Systems Engineer, and was often drafted by other managers for lead and revival of difficult projects that ran into trouble. 
  1. Rescued an Expert Test & Diagnostic System for guidance computers, although successful, required serious ingenuity for redirection; 
  2. Spent three years under design and development of a Radiation Hardening & Assurance Test project, which also required a major overhaul and re-invention to increase both performance and accuracy within budgetary guidelines. As an engineer nothing generates more pride than completion. 
Inventions
Two Aerospace Inventions, both successfully proven, yet losing one to internal politics at the hands of a high-ranked mentor, led to my resignation from aerospace to start my own companies. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Patents and Patent Pending Applications

The Thyme-Warp⫀ (C-U C-Me) Today

Self Authentication

P4 Thyme-Warp⫀ is a global Video Conversation Technology Service with Apps that uses a long lineal decent of Exit-Cube’s Patented and Patent-Pending Security technology dating back as far as 2001, in San Francisco California. For Social and Business Group Authentication, administrators first are fully authenticated, then they can add whoever to their micro-societies. They simply present the potential member with a TW-Key to allow the member to register for their society. Even if someone registers for the group, family group, or social friends group, they cannot be registered until invited by administrator who must present them with a key to register. Administration of groups are performed usually by the members who register and form a particular business or social society group. All members including the administrator self-authenticate themselves so we are never provided their names or birth dates or any form of information other than a username, and key for the authentication module we run on ThymeWarp computers. ThymeWarp computers use technology from  US Pat 8,219,823 Technology incorporated into the operating systems and a Security Operating System called "EOS", Patents US 7,810,133 & US 8,407,761 technology. (see diagram above).


The Thyme-Warp⫀ (C-U/CMeCU) 

(future Apps)



The Impact

ThymeWarp Services are excellent for businesses
Imagine presenting a discussion to someone who is out of the office, and doing so with clarity covering all the major points, well a video conversation means you can have this and lots more instead of leaving a flat voice mail then wait for a returned call, with ThymeWarp - you cover all the major points and expect results! ThymeWarp refines businesses approach from an action item - check list approach to action-results!

                   


ThymeWarp Services are excellent for Business Teams
Teams with a strong need to communicate either jointly or separately can do so with little inconvenience from distance and time.  ThymeWarp App Services eliminates both costs and time involved or the need to always formally have a two-way telecommunication video conference at the same exact time. ThymeWarp also eliminates the timezone difference problem when teams are split on different projects across the world. Formality is also still an option with ThymeWarp, but also a choice!

                       


ThymeWarp Services are excellent replacements for formal Telephone-conferencing between Companies
Imagine retaining formality, but losing the burden of time zones differences, and work schedule operation differences. Politely, others listen when others are speaking, and only on rare occasions this may not be a true statement, but when considering the differences altogether, ThymeWarp conversations are conducted in the same manner. ThymeWarp services into your business operations, lowers the number of phone calls to vital and clear points to connect and clearly from which two parties need to agree. All initial arguments being made across ThymeWarp sessions. 

                     

ThymeWarp Services are excellent for Attorneys and Bankers
Distance is always a factor in legal professionals, banking, marketing and real estate. Becoming up close and personal is just one way ThymeWarp can really prove it is here for the good, and serves to cut down on automobile travel and greenhouse emissions. Without going as far as to call ourselves green and proactively seeking to serve the Earth, the obviousness of the truth never requires emphasis or overstating.

           

Great For Family Sharing Moments!


ThymeWarp Services are excellent for Family Groups
Imagine presenting a discussion with someone who is out of the office, and doing so with a clarity cover a number of points, well a video conversation not only means you do not have leave a flat voice mail and wait a call back, you cover all the points and expect results.

                       

An Excellent way to have a video conversation with extended family, in-laws, parents, grandparents, friends and other couples. Quick, effective and more fun!

                                

ThymeWarp Services are excellent for socially responsible parents
Teens during impressionable years need to communicate, with the ThymeWarp Service, they get the chance to select a complete telecommunication network for specifically for their friends. Should one person decide not to continue to engage as a member, simply cancel their registered device without fee to no longer receive video conversations from and within that particular group. The loner can choose to start a new social group and invite new and different friends. Social Bullying can only be performed by invitation only, whereas even if invited, no one is forced to choose to register for such a social group.

              


ThymeWarp Services are excellent for Young Adults
Often times, young adults who wish to communicate intimately between one another try to find creative ways to cut costs, and in this case ThymeWarp would be awesome because it allows people to become closer with the burden of costs and or distance.
ThymeWarp Services are excellent for University and College Students
Distance is always a factor in student life, and often times this factor is present in all aspects of the student life in the same way as budgeting money. ThymeWarp provides an awesome new foundation upon which could start a new wave of how we choose to bridge the gaps of time, distance and costs, and students would provide the wider range of early adopter to this service, to explore the many benefits from which they could gain aside from just cutting costs.

ThymeWarp(s) are excellent for Keepsake Memorable(s) ?
We don't pretend to know what people will want to do with ThymeWarp, we do not pretend to be that smart, but what can be done is ThymeWarp can also create a "ThymeCapsule" for memories on your storage, or Grandmother's storage to be retrieved in private and played over and over again on computer. Moments which can live forever in the privacy of your home or environment, but not on our servers!

Simply Imagine The Magnitude of ( what you can help us achieve!)
An Alternative for Teenager online bullying and (The Friday Night Solution) with spent with Friends.  ThymeWarp can simply present alternative choices for ways to connect online (with their real friends) across our ThymeWarp Solution.

My team and I are humbled by what we are sure the impact P4 will have on the solution for the problem of online Bullying. No one should have to endure this inhuman treatment, regardless of where. Our approach is simple, an alternative form of connecting with others offers a greater solution against online abusers in all global communities, even brings a limits SPAMs, and provides choice over unwanted exposures to negative materials from the Internet at large.  Offers a variety of greater quality for all of those who value maintaining their privacy. Why should your age be calculated by the Internet as if you need to be tracked for some reason? Global governments appear spellbound to legislate control, while bystanders feel helpless when witnessing atrocities committed by those who lack the decency and respect for human life. 
An impact of a P4's ThymeWarp can now level the plane for the Good to no long stand by idle but embrace a choice of action. P4 provides both parents and loved ones - a choice with a tool to either to do nothing or increase the quality in how we choose to connect with others by limiting ourselves to those we allow to connect with us. Define our micro social societies from ground up.

Almost All Initial Equipment For Starting-up ThymeWarp System!


         

My Launch Date Check List Includes Cisco Router:
CISCO2911-SEC/K9 Cisco 2911 SECURITY BUNDLE
We could use your help as a community, but you have my word. This project is so very interesting, even without your help we will make it happen! Exit-Cube made another large investment in the ThymeWarp program to bring it forward, so we were able to adjusted our goal.


Limited Launch Date: January 15 2015


CEO Track Record
  • Today Eight (8) Patents granted for Inventions, with six patents that will become part of P4's ThymeWarp and used to secure data and provide self authentication protection.
  • University Mainframe Migration Project 1991. Took assignment to migrate University Data Sets from mainframe computers to distributed networks for three University departments under Provost. Led efforts on design from concept to point of "going live" on ARPANet (pre-Internet) with a 100% accuracy completion. Introduced scaled growth designs to cut costs, and succession follow-on phases to conserve spending. Provided a solution estimated at $580,000 US by their Computing Center, for phase I at 80% for $59,000 US, which included all key and necessary equipment forming a base for Phase II. Performed all within 4 months, which had been estimated to take up to five years.
  • Successful patented inventions which are used today in familiar operating systems and mobile phones operating systems around the world. (sensitive issue).

Video Conversation Transaction Security

P4 Society Group Administrators (SGAs) invite friends into their Society, each SGA is issued 40 keys at the time SGA registers for setting up a group or groups which we call societies. Each SGA authenticates self and only then can the SGA sets up the Social, Business or Professional Society Group members. Each key is encrypted by a society group code and can only work with and for that specific society group. When a friend or member joins, the SGA must issue one of the Society Group's keys, and only then can the friend use the same key to obtain membership rights to register with ThymeWarp for that specific society group, otherwise by registering with ThymeWarp, the only option would be set up an independent Social Society Group which means become a SGA and inviting the original SGA to join this group. (Bullying is filtered by this passive construct, where the Bully often times will have null memberships in their group). ThymeWarp receives each key and match it to SGA's Society's Group, and only then permits a member's registration to proceed as a member of the particular Society's Group.



Our Security Restores Confidence in Both Privacy & Data Security
The use of patented technologies with the ability to secure both privacy and security integrity for your transmission data, P4 uses US Pat 8,219,823 Technology for self-authentication incorporated into the operating system which is also a Security Operating System called an Encrypting Operating System EOS based on US Patents 7,810,133 & US 8,407,761, Israel Patent 167014, and Japan Patent 4777651 Technologies which secures data and will restore confidence in doing just that.
To support this effort, bringing privacy back to social connections, we need your extreme support, and in return we will be a bit more than happy to show an extreme generosity, not just once but continuously.

Risks & Challenges.

Qualifications for overcoming risk pale in comparisons with those who only take calculated risks,  nonetheless my qualifications stand out over the norm. ThymeWarp is "a walk in the park!" Many concepts and technology required make ThymeWarp work as well or better than my very first invention has been around for over two decades.  There are no tremendous hurdles that can't be overcome. Let's face it, it is not expected to be simple but after clearly researching the entire concept from front to back the only risks assessed were whether people would like to have it free or not.
 

Campaign Team.

Ernst B. Carter, Exit-Cube (Hong Kong) Limited, Hong Kong (Asia)
Computer Scientist,Technologist, Chief Scientist, Analyst, Former Aerospace Engineer, & Me?

Exit-Cube Companies
 Exit-Cube (Japan Co.) Ltd in Umeda, Kita-ku, Osaka-shi, Osaka Japan

| Exit-Cube, Inc.  in USA | Exit-Cube (Hong Kong) Ltd  In Hong Kong| |Encrypthentica Hong Kong Ltd  In Hong Kong|


Steven R. Thorne, Retired Rockwell International Aerospace Engineer, Hills Air Force Base, Utah  - "My Former Mentor", "The type of Guy who has seen everything at least once"


Carlos M. Salazar,

 Management inS.F. Bay Area (USA) Team Director (USA) "Deliverer of the world"

Dr. Corinna Gamez, MD

Our Wisdom Coach - S.F. Bay Area (USA)   "Team's (Global) Coach"


Esteemed Sharon Miller, 

Distinguished Care-Giver/Consultant, Western (USA)

"Team Morale Consultant"

Varvara Salazar

 Stanford University Alumni 

Team's Extreme Business Director (Silicon Valley) (USA) (Europe) (Canada) - Team's "Business Coordinator of large-scaled proportions" 


Systems and Equipment Vendor References
China
  • David_QF_Huang, Dell Company China (Asia)     -  Responsible for providing High Performance DELL Servers 

Hong Kong BroadBand Internet Consultants
  • Lawrence Kam                                                                                                       Senior Manager - Technical Sales & Business Development Specialist Edison Global Networks Ltd. Hong Kong, High Speed Network Expert for Hong Kong
  • Carol Kong  Network Specialist - Edison Global Networks Ltd                                  Direct line: (852) 2668 7703 Tel: (852) 2668 7777


The Business Side of P4


Financial Charts
Set-up fees Estimates' say Break-Even (in 4 Months)
                    Social Societies Registration Fees Only

                                      Est.d Net Earnings


Summary of Financial Analysis:

We anticipate a wide acceptance of this new service in parts of Western Europe, and especial in parts of Asia where easy access to the Internet is norm, and eventually in other parts of the world as services become more popular by word of mouth. We won't advertise and we will not use advertisers, but we will need to be ready to embrace demand growth.

Sales are automated through Paypal, and registrations need to be automated through computers, so we need your support to put these systems in place. Our financials are based upon the most conservative model, however this whole operation will probably go "viral" since it's proven the first of its kind.

Our charts may seem impressive even though they are built from very conservative growth estimates, because the growth of a truly great free service may be very difficult to predict. The Chart above is taken from  a linear growth forecast, one which takes five (5) server user capacity and start at 2% of this capacity for the first month using number of users and their registration fees in social categories only. Each month following, growth is 150% of the month before across twelve months. For example, five servers with maximum capacity set at 200 society groups of 40, will be 8,000 users. 2% would be 160 different users, and 8 different Society Group Administrators(SGAs). The next month at 150% rises to 240 users and 12 Society Group Administrators. 

One-Time Set-up Fees are:

  1. Society Group Administrator - someone who can invite others, and who can start a group: A one-time Setup Fee:   $2.50
  2. Society Member - someone who gets invited into a societal group by Society Group Administrator: A one-time Setup Fee:   $1.50

Business Society Groups are divided into three categories: Small to Medium Enterprises Society Group - 20 (SME-20s), Small to Medium Enterprises Society Group - 40 and Large Corporate Conglomerate Society Group - 200 (LCCSG-200). All work a little differently as businesses from the social classes and therefore must purchase the entire group of sizes 20, 40 and 200 under each SMEs and LCCSGs before filling them with members. This is advanced fee revenues for P4 and will largely be the revenues which replaces any need for advertisers. At any time the only charge will be a one time fee for self registration which provides an avoidance use of any information of any kind albeit private or non-private, the one-time fee creates a contractual bond between P4 and the users to maintain security and information privacy within each society. No other fees are required, and fees act as the contract between the user and P4, which is why they are so small.





Help Us Go out and make something Really Great!!
story_txt:
Working PrototypesA Video Conferencing Remote Health Care Application See Future Health Care Application for THYMEWARPFirst ThymeWarp PrototypesFrom Concept below to Working Prototypes above, ThymeWarp now exists as it is a system of integrated services place all into one new App. We Define a ThymeWarp As:
Being able to view one-side of someone's earlier video-conversation to you, an on going dialogue or business meeting, in the "now time!"
Short Scenario 
Imagine you and your two business partners have a meeting and all of you are  located around the world in different timezones. The problem is you now have to find a time that works for all three (3) of you - spread across three (3) continents. What a hassle perhaps, and each of you have very busy daytime operations. Well with ThymeWarp that problem can be now easily solved. Even though when it is 4 p.m. in Japan for instance, and to one of your partners in USA it's 3 a.m in New York but it is 7 a.m. in London. You can send them one video message and they can reply back to it when either they wake at 7 a.m. in the morning, or later that day. For your third business partner maybe he or she will be busy at 10 a.m. and needs to prepare when they saw the message come through but now at noon over lunch he of she can catch up and reply back to the same message also. This is the power behind ThymeWarp. You can have a delayed conversation or conversations anywhere, anytime but they appear the same as if they were all in realtime. There will be no more having to base your conversations around a clock, carry on with your day and get to the conversation at the time that is most convenient to you.  


Social Scenario: Imagine wanting to speak with family members spread across time zones, or friends spread across different break times in your day? You send a ThymeWarp video conversation to all of them in just one moment, they see your conversation when they have their break. One conversation can be sent to one, two or more friends or family members at the same time instance, and when they find time they can all get back to you at different times. ThymeWarp allows you to no longer have to wait until each person has a break to conduct a phone conversation, it allows each party the convenience of not missing an important moment with you or you not being able to share your important moments by let others become part of it as well. ThymeWarp is what "Selfies" sometimes wish they could be, except "Selfies" are "still life." There are many other apps with similarities qualities to a ThymeWarp but where ThymeWarp differs is it focuses on the simplicity of just letting you record your own video conversation and sending it in whole through ThymeWarp Servers who are registered to receive it. People in your social or business group only, who have already been setup as designated receivers by you and are part of your circle of friends, so you only select one, few or all when you press send. 

Perhaps ThymeWarps can also be used to accumulate special memories, moments you wish to have captured and  preserved over time so that they can be brought back to life whenever everyone is together. For this one reason answers why ThymeWarp conversations should never be stored on ThymeWarp servers, and ThymeWarp servers should remain configured so that ThymeWarps all operate purely in fast dynamic RAM and shadow memory which are used for transmitting them as fast as possible to your receiver's devices as soon as they come in. This is also why you must store them, in order to keep the special ones you want to keep, and discard the ones you choose not to keep and ably save room in your storage.

Lastly, ThymeWarp is not a "do everything" app server, it is designed to one thing and that one thing extremely well.  In business as with social, ThymeWarp is different and unique from other apps because it is being designed to place quality first, then expand. Every smartphone or smart device comes with a video recorder, so there is little need for ThymeWarp to create one, and the simplicity is to use what you have differently and cost effectively with the highest quality.This Thyme-Warp⫀ miracle (code named P4), is a video conversation app service (VCS), with apps for computers, smartphones and smart devices. We will have a limited launch date of January 15th, and from set-up fess have a broad world-wide launch within 30 - 45 days following the limited launch date. This will be the testing date for a live "dry-run". Soon after they will be available for everyone in a limited capacity for three months, and after in a full capacity in three countries. ThymeWarp will not and does not use advertisers, does not collect personal data, and will always be free to use, why?  ThymeWarp is simply an awesome global telecommunication tool, a Time-Router which allow you to send video conversation only to your friend who are registered in your social group and no one else. This provides the user a way of connecting with others anywhere in the world "free of costs", "free of loss of privacy" and "the freedom to communicate for as long and for as often as you like".  As technically capable people, it is the least we can do towards achievement of a greater good. Hope others will catch on to this wave!
The ThymeWarp services & Apps run on technology you already have. ThymeWarp cuts your phone costs by using the Internet like a Skype, and increases the inherent quality of how you connect with others.  What started as a fun project called "project four" or P4,  grew into what may very well become a new generation in the telecommunication of how we communicate. T-AppsC-U - Receiving earlier sent video conversation from a Social Group MemberU-C-Me-C-U - You see Video recording of my response to your Video-conversation.C-ALLC-ALL-C-Us ALL-C-Us-C-ThemToday P4 is running on five (5) high performance servers. This is the ThymeWarp P4 service and P4's "C-U" "C-Me" Apps project. Applets being designed to use their own Internet protocols so that your conversations can be as long as you would like them to be, without limits of how long. (This is why we think you would like to help us develop this phenomena, and create a whole new way of social interaction in today's complex society.) We could use your financial help, and you will receive unlimited suppiy of finish-product apps as we design more to accompany this service,Each computer server has quad-core CPUs, (4 brains per chip) and high speed Ethernet connections with dual network service providers connect-ups for fail-safe connections. These servers are where we run and provide "the ThymeWarp" routing service, the core, that allows people to connect and send out video conversations across the internet back and forth in  zone free space, thus replacing the need every time for toll phone calls which costs money. P4 is free, and we think it should remain free because it is made from “white noise” technology (technology you already have in use and already owned by you for other purposes).                                             The ThymeWarp Cloud         Brief Introduction and Background.Hello, I am Ernst B. 
Carter, an innovator accredited with 8 patents: (3) in the USA, (1) in 
Canada, (2) in Japan, (1) in Israel, and (1) in China. I am excited to 
introduce a new way millions of people will choose to connect and 
communicate using the same devices we already use, but in a different 
way.  While I am currently responsible for setting up, managing and 
directing operations for Exit-Cube (Hong Kong) Ltd. a Patent Technology 
& Licensing Firm preparing to conduct business in the China, it 
recently occurred to me how a ThymeWarp would ease the pains of 
Spam-emails, Mal-tweets, and harmful images posted places we wish not to
 see, when we just wish to communicate with those we know and love. Well
 this is the new telecommunication service called ThymeWarp which allows
 everyone affordable communication across the Internet in ways that 
increases quality of conversation and cost nothing to use. Performed all within 4 months, which had been estimated to take up to five years.
Successful patented inventions which are used today in familiar operating systems and mobile phones operating systems around the world. (sensitive issue).

P4 Society Group Administrators (SGAs) invite friends into their Society, each SGA is issued 40 keys at the time SGA registers for setting up a group or groups which we call societies. Each SGA authenticates self and only then can the SGA sets up the Social, Business or Professional Society Group members. Each key is encrypted by a society group code and can only work with and for that specific society group. When a friend or member joins, the SGA must issue one of the Society Group's keys, and only then can the friend use the same key to obtain membership rights to register with ThymeWarp for that specific society group, otherwise by registering with ThymeWarp, the only option would be set up an independent Social Society Group which means become a SGA and inviting the original SGA to join this group. (Bullying is filtered by this passive construct, where the Bully often times will have null memberships in their group). ThymeWarp receives each key and match it to SGA's Society's Group, and only then permits a member's registration to proceed as a member of the particular Society's Group.Our Security Restores Confidence in Both Privacy & Data SecurityThe use of patented technologies with the ability to secure both privacy and security integrity for your transmission data, P4 uses US Pat 8,219,823 Technology for self-authentication incorporated into the operating system which is also a Security Operating System called an Encrypting Operating System EOS based on US Patents 7,810,133 & US 8,407,761, Israel Patent 167014, and Japan Patent 4777651 Technologies which secures data and will restore confidence in doing just that.To support this effort, bringing privacy back to social connections, we need your extreme support, and in return we will be a bit more than happy to show an extreme generosity, not just once but continuously.Risks & Challenges.Qualifications for overcoming risk pale in comparisons with those who only take calculated risks,  nonetheless my qualifications stand out over the norm. ThymeWarp is "a walk in the park!" Many concepts and technology required make ThymeWarp work as well or better than my very first invention has been around for over two decades.  There are no tremendous hurdles that can't be overcome. Let's face it, it is not expected to be simple but after clearly researching the entire concept from front to back the only risks assessed were whether people would like to have it free or not.  Campaign Team.

The Business Side of P4
Financial ChartsSet-up fees Estimates' say Break-Even (in 4 Months)                    Social Societies Registration Fees Only
